story:
Welcome to Ten Restaurant. 

Why Ten? With this restaurant we want to boil fine dining to it's core; providing great food and amazing hospitality. Concentrating on fewer people a night and instead focussing on the quality of each guest's experience, we believe that will we be a needed addition to Canada's food scene. The menu is vegetable forward showcasing the amazing products we have here in Ontario.

                        

This restaurant is the dream of 24 year old Chef/Owner Julian Bentivegna. Up until now he had been working in some of North America and Europe's best restaurants and earlier this year he decided that it was time to go on his own. He felt that his age could offer a fresh take on fine dining that is needed. Having someone as passionate as he is at the helm means that this is more than just a restaurant, this will be a home.

What makes us different is not only how few people we plan to serve a night but how we plan on running our restaurant. We believe in paying our employees a liveable wage and not working them to their early graves. If we take good care of our staff, they in turn will take good care of our guests. Once we open, we will also be working with organizations that deal with food insecurity in Toronto. We want to create a model that utilizes our unused food product to tackle hunger in our community. Ideally, we want to see hunger eradicated in Canada in our lifetime.

In the end, fine dining is about creating a space where you can concentrate on every single detail of a guest's night. We take this attention to detail to heart in everything Ten does. We are just shy of the final amount needed to complete construction which is why we have launched this campaign. 

The magnitude of what your support means to us is unparalleled and is something we will strive to pay back every single day we are open. We don't have any deep pocketed investors so any amount pledged is monumental.

What We Need

We are so close to opening! However we still need to raise a bit more funding to get the restaurant up and running. 

The 10 000 goal will be spent on the last bit of leasehold improvements needed to be made to our space. This includes everything from chairs and lighting to millworking and plumbing.

& What You Get

We want to show you how much we value your support! To get you excited about our opening, any amount that you pledge between 50 and 2000 will be rewarded with a e-gift card for 50% that amount on top of previous perks. The perks range from shout outs and signed menus/merch to dinners and special events. If you pledge more than 2000 we will basically consider you a god and the restaurant is yours for any night of your choosing once we open. 

The Impact

This restaurant aims to not only be valuable to pushing Toronto's food scene forward but we will be working to make a positive difference in our community. We believe in the power of food, wine and hospitality to change the world for the better. 

This summer and fall we have been putting on a series of successful pop-ups out of different locations around the city. We have used these as a great way to R&D our menu as well as introduce the public to our food. The fun atmosphere of the pop-ups will be translated into our eventual space. We take what we do very seriously, however we are doing this because we love this industry so we are creating a strictly no-ego workplace.

Ten is meant to be about a fine dining restaurant built and supported by it's surrounding community. Building a restaurant of this caliber is expensive and we have faced and overcome every hurdle that has been laid before us so far. Now we are in the home stretch and can't wait to be able to start hosting people. Let's make this happen!

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks when you’re talking about restaurants. It's expensive, there are low profit margins and it's a lot of hard work. That said, most restaurants fail because they don't understand the industry or miss the mark on their concept and business model. We have done everything possible to overcome these obstacles, including raising the majority of our funds already.

We have also worked relentlessly with industry leaders to create a business model that allows us to stay profitable with only 10 seats a night. This model borrows from high-end Japanese chef counter/table restaurants. Even if this campaign does not reach its goal we will still open, although it might just take a bit longer. Quitting isn't in our vocabulary and we know that this restaurant will be an exciting and valuable addition to Toronto's food scene.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you would like to support our campaign but can't afford to contribute right now please share this campaign on social media and tell your friends about our opening! We appreciate all the help we can get.

story:
What is TodoBenefits?

 

TodoBenefits is an online to-do list and task management tool to reward your team with benefits and boost productivity and motivation. It is also available on iOS and Android markets.

It works with a few simple steps.

 

 

Todo Benefits allows to:

-  Create and share projects with a team (colleagues, employees, friends or family)

-  Assign a benefit to each member. You can choose whatever benefit you want or you can choose from a list of categorized deals (food, travels, tech, fashion, charity, e.t.c).

-  Set goals (e.g. assign the benefit when the user complete 100% of the  assigned tasks 5 days early the Estimated End Date).

-  Plan tasks, assign them to your team, set due dates, prioritize activities.

-  Check  day-by-day the working progress and the benefit status of each member.

-  Receive helpful alerts and reminders.

 

 

 

 

 

 

When to use Todobenefits?

TodoBenefits is dead simple and can be used for a whole range of projects, from business to spare time. Here some examples to get started.

 

 

Deals for Brands and Merchants

 

 

If you are a business owner, you can promote your company and expose your professional services or retails products. They could be attractive benefits for your Country or for your local zone. 
The purchasing process is independent of TodoBenefits but even when the benefits are not achieved, you will have got the visibility you need.

 

 


Nonprofit benefits

Charities can promote their activities and their projects. A few dollars and a good cause can be an important milestone for those who are attracted by the social projects.

 

Features

Here's some of the great features you can expect from  TodoBenefits.

 

Different Subscription Plans

 

The benefits purchasing process is independent of TodoBenefits, therefore we don't charge any fees in addition to subscription.
 

Let’s collaborate to make the most efficient todo list ever!

To reach our goal, we need your support, thoughts and comments on the project. Select a perk and order a subscription in advance. Perks will allow to get LIFETIME subscription with early bird offers or to  get YEARLY subscription with a low price you will never pay in the future.

  • LIFETIME Personal subscription. Be the first who open this campaign and never have to pay again. Use the app with all features and invite unlimited friends and colleagues
  • 1 YEAR Personal subscription.  You can save 40%.  Use the app with all features and invite unlimited friends and colleagues. Support us and make this happen.
  • LIFETIME Standard subscription.  Be the first who open this campaign and never have to pay again. Extend the subscription up to 10 users.
  • 1 YEAR Standard subscription. You can save 57%. Use the app for 12 months and extend the subscription up to 10 users.
  • 1 YEAR Professional subscription. You can still save 23%. Extend the subscription up to 25 users.
If you are merchant or a business owner or a charity you can use these perks:
  • LIFETIME Merchant Sponsor. Publish  your deals forever in benefits section. You can publish one deal/year - forever!
  • 1 YEAR Merchant Sponsor. Publish up to 5 deals for 12 months in benefits section.
  • 1 YEAR Charity Sponsor. Publish your charity project for 12 months in benefits section.

 

 


Where will your money go?

 

 

  • 5% will go to Indiegogo
  • 5% will go to Paypal
  • 90% will go to Tech / UX development team

 

Project timeline

 

 

More about me and TodoBenefits

I'm a Project Manager with more than 15 years experience in website, e-commerce, social apps and contests. I love Planning and Organization and I'm very excited to share this project with you. 

 

I am building a brand-new international team which consists of several creative designers, software engineers, project managers and UX designers.

After 15 years of Project Managament, I believe I'm well organized and I will strive to deliver TodoBenefits at a high standard of quality. I will be very happy for your support.
 

 

Backers

For your convenience you can ask questions or leave your feedback in the “comments” tab of our main page. Please also feel free to send us a message at manager@todobenefits.com and we will be sure to get back to you as soon as we can.
 

 

Investors

We are looking for reliable business partners. If you are interested in working with us, please get in touch  at investors@todobenefits.com
 

Thank you

We'd like to say thanks to our families, friends and loved ones. Your ideas, feedback and patience have allowed us to make this idea real and we're so excited to be sharing this project with you.

If you have a spare second then please help us spread the word. Remember to use the Indiego share tools! Every extra person who knows about TodoBenefits really helps!

story:
Who We Are


Cupcakes by Tish is the vision of owner / executive pastry chef, Tish Leonard & has quickly become THE leading destination for gourmet cupcakes in the River Region. Tish & Quincy are co-owners of the award-winning cupcake shop, which opened its original location in Old Cloverdale in December of 2011. After the first year of serving Montgomery’s Midtown community, an overwhelming demand prompted us to open our second Cupcakes by Tish location in East Montgomery. Since then we have added a location on Maxwell Air Force Base & added the "Tish Mobile", our popular cupcake truck.

Our menu offers over 100 different cupcake flavors to choose from, including Tish’s Signature Red Velvet, as well as unique flavors such as Chocolate Pomegranate, S’mores, Sweet Potato, & her award-winning original “Cheesecake Cupcake” line.


We are passionate about our product & want to share its deliciousness with the world. Our goal is to successfully bring our award-winning cheesecake cupcakes, sauces, & syrups into homes across the United States!


What We Need & What You Get

We need your help to cover the expensive costs of mass producing our product using a distribution company while sustaining our local business. Once we have been able to successfully produce, package, distribute, & market our cheesecake cupcakes we will then be able to continue production & expand the product reach. Ultimately being able to facilitate our own production company.

As a way of saying "thank you", please select one of our perks when making a contribution.


For Those Who Have Watched Our Video...

This is our Lauryn Olivia currently:


As stated in our video, our daughter Lauryn was one of the inspirations that led to opening Cupcakes by Tish. Now we are proud to say that Cupcakes by Tish has inspired Lauryn to work hard at her dreams of becoming a championship golfer. She is the only little girl from Alabama that will be competing at the Masters this Spring at the annual Drive, Chip, & Putt Championship in Augusta, GA. Her drive & determination definitely keeps us motivated in our pursuit of taking Cupcakes by Tish onto a nationwide platform.


Thank you for your support!
--Tish & Quincy Leonard

story:
Who We Are

We are Spreading Pawsitivity, a student group at the University of Tennessee Knoxville advocating on behalf of Little Ponderosa Zoo and Rescue in order to build and maintain habitats for exotic animals. As members of Spreading Pawsitivity, we are excited to support a local rescue in order to provide a loving home for beautiful, innocent animals that do not have anywhere else to go.

Each of the animals placed at Little Ponderosa have had their own story pertaining to hardship and triumph. Thanks to their zoo and rescue, our furry friends have been given a forever home where not only the workers can show their compassion, but the surrounding Anderson and Knox counties as well.

Why Do I Matter?

In order to provide homes for the many exotic animals (including camels, kangaroos, foxes,  monkeys, zebra, and many more) they need specific habitats to be built. These habitats are extremely expensive and can range anywhere form $10,000 to $50,000 to construct and maintain. The money that you donate will go directly toward building these enclosures for the rescued animals of Little Ponderosa. We cannot give these animals homes without you!

What is the Little Ponderosa Zoo and Rescue?

The Little Ponderosa Zoo and Rescue is a a nonprofit 501(c)(3) organization that is located in Clinton, Tennessee. What started originally as a zoo soon also became a rescue as people were soon asking for them to take in their exotic pets. Over the years, Little Ponderosa soon grew to have a population of animals that are 98% rescues!

Challenges

One of the main challenges that we face is showing people why they should care about a small town zoo when compared to a larger one, such as Zoo Knoxville. After all, wouldn't a larger zoo be more qualified in the care and housing of rescues than Little Ponderosa? The recent renovation of their fox habitat has demonstrated that they are more than capable in caring for their beautiful exotic animals, and, more than anything, Little Ponderosa's enthusiasm and dedication is like no other. Despite the devastation and heartbreak they have experienced over the years, this non-profit is fully committed to saving animals, one rescue at a time. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you cannot make any monetary donations, you can still support our cause. By visiting https://littleponderosazoo.com/partner/ , you can view a wish list of items that you can donate in order to help with everyday operations. These items can range anywhere from power tools to cleaning supplies to high quality animal feed and medicine. On top of donations, you can even sponsor an animal by making monthly contributions!

story:
Have you always wanted to own a major professional sports team?  Now you can!

  • I am a current Panthers' PSL owner
  • I am concerned that new ownership could potentially re-locate the team.
  • Together, we can become the first 100% fan-owned team in major professional sports history and keep the Panthers here in NC!

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

  • This is a MASSIVE undertaking but also a MASSIVE opportunity.  NFL franchises are among the most valuable and most profitable sports franchises in the WORLD. 
  • For each $100 contributed, you get 1 voting share of the corporation we will set up.
  • If we don't reach the goal, all funds will be refunded.

 

Risks & Challenges

It will likely cost somewhere in between $2.5 Billion and $3.5 Billion to make the transaction happen.  It will also be subject to the approval of the other 31 team owners. I am not going to fluff this and say it is an easy task.  It isn't.  It is not impossible though!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, share this campaign.  Let's make it go viral. Who knows?  We may just wind up owning an NFL franchise!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
LET’S MAKE THIS TOGETHER! HELP US TO RISE!

 

We are an imports shop, we want to import any product from anywhere in the world to Colombia and sell it at an affordable price with an excellent service. As an aggregate we believe that through what we do not only can change our future and of our decendents, but also of the people who will be our employees changing their perspective about life showing them their potential to grow and change their family and social environment with work and effort.


 

Why an imports company?

It's one of the things we do best. It is profitable for all, employees, customers, suppliers and us. We want to leave a better future for the ours, but at the same time the added value of which we speak is that, just as someone can be kind, tolerant, enterprising and efficient in your work with your clients for money, also can be it out of work with their family, With their neighbor, with people on the street AND IN THE TRAFFIC JAM without waiting for something in return. It is clear that we want our family business to grow, we have to see for our owns, but with this we also intend to give something more to the lives of others, something that gives them expectations of a truly better life. We do not currently have employees, but we know that when we grow up we will have to hire them and we don't want them to simply come to work to make money, but also to improve as parents, neighbors, children, spouses and citizens. We don't say this by posing as morally perfect, we are not perfect, we have mistakes, but we believe in the love, loving others, is a decision that we all can take, also the tolerance, to make with your neighbor as you would like they to do with you. These are things that we want to continue strengthening in us at the same time that we teach to those around us. 

 

 

Why do we feel this responsibility?

Because we are in Colombia, an extremely beautiful country, but plundered by bad policies, besides we have only to look at reality, about 30 Colombians are killed every day, that is, a murder every hour and a half; last year 248 people were injured daily in quarrels and 328 complaints of domestic violence daily. A lot intolerance and lack of love against which we are willing to give our seed.
The global change is in each person and how it relates to those around him, so while we work for our people, we want those who are linked to us (employees, suppliers and customers) to acquire something positive that is not just money or a discount.

(To have a better view of the infography, please make right click in the image, then choose "save image as" and finally see it in your downloads with more zoom)

 

Which are our obstacles to get bigger?

There are several obstacles. Mainly we want to grow and survive as family business, but because of the following things this wish is pretty difficult.

We started with $ 500, thanks to some friends and mostly to banks we have reached a working capital of $ 10,000, but the problem is that we must pay quotas and interest of that money every month, so it is not a 100% of capital of our own. Therefore reinvest is complex. We want to invest the 100% of the funds of this campaign, then, with the earnings we will kill the bank bills!

The second problem is that our growth has been very limited because with that money the products we can buy are very few, about 40 kinds of products, therefore, we reach very little public and we constantly sell almost the 90% of the products while the rest of the cargo arrives in the country, then sometimes we have lasted almost 1 week without selling anything. Because the lack of variety.

The third problem is totally proportional to the two previous ones, and is that we want to change the way that we use to bring the merchandise worldwide. We currently bring the goods by air, but it is extremely expensive! It's crazy! In addition, the weight we can handle at the moment is 40kg aprox, which makes the shipping cost even greater because between more weight, cheaper cost per pound. By sea the costs in general are very low, but the "minimum load" by sea is 1.2 tons or 1 cubic meter, to achieve this one must buy a lot more merchandise, and that represents money that we do not have...

Also over the merchandise, transport and insurance (CIF) we must pay several taxes that the Colombian government charges us for the importation of the merchandise, VAT or VAT is 19% and tariffs range from 5% to 50%.

More than problems, they are goals that we have identified and we want to achieve in order to reach what we want. We know that if we solve all this things to make a investment capital and enough merchandise, we will not only be able to survive as a family business, but we will also be able to fulfill our added value, employ many people and contribute to change their future. About debts, we plan to pay them off with reinvestment proceeds, the ideal is to invest 100% of the money we get through this campaign.


What we need?

Simple! Your collaboration! Any amount, $ 1 or $ 1000 makes a difference. We believe in the power of agreement and union. With your donation you will really mark our life until the last day of our lives and it will spread to all who surround us now and in the future! We are enterprising and workers. We know that this opportunity should be handled with great intelligence and wisdom and we can not waste it. Give us your vote of confidence and believe us, just as we believe in you. Let's do this together!


Are $ 100,000 sufficient to finance the entire company?

Of course not! With this amount we can cover the initial expenses to take the first step to becoming a relevant importing company spreading a pretty positive influence in each actor of the family and society. The $ 100,000 will allow us to bring our cargo by sea occupying 35% of space approximately in a 20GP container, expand our range of products, decrease costs of taxes, fees and shipping cost. Make a good investment to reach a healthy level of development and competence for the company. Once we reach this, will be able to help much more people with the philosophy that drives us, we want to focus mainly in our employees.

 

Here are the perks!

Of course! This is the list of benefits, but you know that the greatest will be to know that you helped us change our future, that of our generations and that of the people who will work with us. We know that we will make a change with you! The perks won't be things that we import to our country, because are goods that you maybe could find in your country. But we want to give you something unique of us! Parts of us and our country!

 

Once the goal is reached, we will make weekly updates of the progress of the project,
both the obstacles we will overcome and the absolute victories!

 

Perks shipping!

  1. When does shipping starts? November 2017.
     
  2. When can I expect it to arrive to my home? December 2017 - January 2018.
     
  3. To where we send the perks? Worldwide! But it depends of the customs house imports laws of the destination country.
     
  4. Customs house tafiffs and VAT: Please ask to he customs house of your country which are the tariffs that can be charged for the import of the goods to your country (if apply, you pay that cost).

 

Where do the funds go if we do not complete the overall goal?

  1. First to pay the banks the credit amounts. We want to be free of bank interest and monthly installments.
     
  2. Second to reinvest in new products to further open the market.
     
  3. If it is not possible to raise enough money to buy 1.2 tons of merchandise, we will negotiate with the sea shipping company to handle an acceptable rate for less weight.
 

 

Also you can help us to rise making this!

 

1. Donate funds to the cause.

2. Share our Indiegogo campaign on social media: 

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/let-s-make-t...

3. Follow and share us on:

    Instagram: @jymstore

 

"The soul of the sluggard desireth, and hath nothing: but the soul of the diligent shall be prosperous."
story_txt:
LET’S MAKE THIS TOGETHER! HELP US TO RISE!  We are an imports shop, we want to import any product from anywhere in the world to Colombia and sell it at an affordable price with an excellent service. As an aggregate we believe that through what we do not only can change our future and of our decendents, but also of the people who will be our employees changing their perspective about life showing them their potential to grow and change their family and social environment with work and effort.
 
Why an imports company?
It's one of the things we do best. It is profitable for all, employees, customers, suppliers and us. We want to leave a better future for the ours, but at the same time the added value of which we speak is that, just as someone can be kind, tolerant, enterprising and efficient in your work with your clients for money, also can be it out of work with their family, With their neighbor, with people on the street AND IN THE TRAFFIC JAM without waiting for something in return. It is clear that we want our family business to grow, we have to see for our owns, but with this we also intend to give something more to the lives of others, something that gives them expectations of a truly better life. We do not currently have employees, but we know that when we grow up we will have to hire them and we don't want them to simply come to work to make money, but also to improve as parents, neighbors, children, spouses and citizens. We don't say this by posing as morally perfect, we are not perfect, we have mistakes, but we believe in the love, loving others, is a decision that we all can take, also the tolerance, to make with your neighbor as you would like they to do with you. These are things that we want to continue strengthening in us at the same time that we teach to those around us. 
 
 
Why do we feel this responsibility?
Because we are in Colombia, an extremely beautiful country, but plundered by bad policies, besides we have only to look at reality, about 30 Colombians are killed every day, that is, a murder every hour and a half; last year 248 people were injured daily in quarrels and 328 complaints of domestic violence daily. A lot intolerance and lack of love against which we are willing to give our seed.The global change is in each person and how it relates to those around him, so while we work for our people, we want those who are linked to us (employees, suppliers and customers) to acquire something positive that is not just money or a discount.

story:
Short Summary

Hello everyone! 

Website: https://www.vandal.beer/

My name is Austin Nielsen and I'm the founder of Vandal Beer LLC. After working in the beer industry for the past 7 years, I decided to turn my passion into my mission. I set out to create more than just another beer.  Can you imagine a beer making a positive impact everytime you bought it? That concept blew my mind and I knew it could happen. 

This is where Vandal Beer comes in. With every purchase of Vandal Beer, we will donate a percentage of the proceeds into two different funds. 

- Scholarship Fund 

- Community Fund 

The beer industry brings people together. It allows us to create, enjoy, and share something with others. Why not share positivity, community, and selflessness? 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need, more than anything, people who believe in doing something great. This is the breakdown of how our campaign funds will be used. We want you to know that with each contribution, you become a part of our tribe. We will openly share updates and keep you in the loop about the great things Vandal Beer is accomplishing with your help. 

Our goal is $10,000. It will be used to help with the costs of: 

- equipment (canning line, brewing equipment) 

- packaging (bottles, cans, kegs, labels)

- local ingredients (hops, wheat, grain, barley, etc)

- licenses, fees, expenses (city, county, state)

- working capital 

Whether our goal is met or not, the above is where the money will go. 

The perks you can get! (Click on each item picture for more info) 

- Custom bottle opener, coasters

- Custom engraved horn tankard 

- Tickets to the exclusive release and launch party (location and time TBD) 

- Mead Hall Membership (all members will receive 22oz beers instead of 12oz) 

- Label Legend (be forever incorporated in our story by getting to help with the design of our next beer label) 

- Conquest (collaborate with us on the next beer release. This includes getting to be apart of the production process) 

 

 

The Impact

We are all on this earth for a reason. A huge part of this life is the connection and impact we make with others. Human relationship is something unlike anything else. We want to connect with people and our community. This is only possible with your help. 

Vandal Beer is going to make an impact by helping others pursue their passion and helping others do positive things in the community. Your contributions directly help accomplish these goals. 

“The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well.”

— Ralph Waldo Emerson

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate or don't want to purchase any of the perks, we understand! We still value you and want you to be a part of this journey. We even have a donation tab on our website, as well as links to all of our social media pages. 

- Tell people about this. Let's create a buzz and trend. Together we can make a difference!

- Share this campaign, our website, and our social media accounts. Like, follow, share!

- Stay connected and sign up for our email list. We are only as strong as our tribe! 

Website:

https://www.vandal.beer/

story:
Who I Am and Why I Am Here

Welcome all. My name is Kit. I want to be able to provide a safe place for LGBTQ+ individuals or Allies, to be able to have photographs of their authentic selves taken in a safe, secure and comfortable environment by someone within their community. This is important to me because I have friends who are trans and they told me how they don't always feel comfortable using a photo studio like Target or other mainstream studios because they have been discriminated against or made to feel less by disparaging comments against them in the past.

As a contributor you will help me be able to provide this safespace in order for people to be their authentic selves. 

I am 36 yr old genderfluid, bisexual single parent. I have been a photographer for a few years now and have at times taken pictures of people not comfortable with going to mainstream stores. I also have a site where I sell different types of photos such as landscape, animals, live action and so forth. 

 

What We Need

My goal is to reach $4000. This amount will cover the cost of a new laptop that will allow me to process their images immediately after the photoshoot. This will allow me to be able to give them printed photos before they leave. Some of the funds will be used to cover advertising costs, this will allow to inform the community at large that I am there for them. It will help cover the cost of ink and photo paper which can run about $100 every time I need to refresh my supplies. My current printer can only print about 25 photos before needing an ink change. It will allow me to get new unique backgrounds. The funds will also allow me to cover at least two rent periods, the room I can rent is $300 for 3hrs, that way I can provide my services without my clients not being able to afford the full cost.. Any money over my goal will help me buy a higher-end printer to be able to print better quality photos, and print more photos from one cartridge, on site. A high-end professional printer cost around $1000. The money over my goal will also go into creating a fund to allow people of lesser means to be able to have pictures of themselves even if they can't afford the photos the whole price of a photo shoot. Part of the money will also be going to provide the perks for those who donated. 

Perks

Images with perks are examples. All images that can be chosen for perk found at kitvonnipphotography.pixieset.com

If My Goal is Not Met

This campaign is a flexible fund account, therefore no refund will be given if my goal is not met. Any funds I receive will still be going towards this endeavor, as it will take place whether I make my goal or not. Anybody who donated, even if the goal is not met, will still get their voucher for a photo from my gallery or other option of their choosing.

The Impact

It is important for people to gain confidence in expressing their authentic selves. I want to help my community by providing a space that will help grow that confidence.

I have been a photographer for a few years now and have at times taken pictures of people not comfortable with going to mainstream stores. They all have expressed how comfortable I have made them feel and were very glad for the experience and the results. 

Risks & Challenges

A challenge is not being able to provide this service without requiring my subjects to either have to come to my home or having to be ok with me in their home. 

In order to avoid this, I am currently in contact and working with my local LGBTQ+ Community Center to be able to rent the space needed to provide this service in a safe environment.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate yourself there's still ways you can help me out. You can do this by spreading the word about my campaign. If your sharing leads to three friends or family donating, I will provide you a voucher for an 8x10 image of your choosing from my website. I just require that you email me at kitvonnip@gmail.com to provide the names of the donors in order for me to verify their donations. Once verified I will email you the voucher. Higher amount donations from friends and relatives will be given vouchers for images greater in price. 

Please use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
Project 917

Project 917 is all about our passion for the most famous race in motorsport, Le Mans. 

This amazing race attracts huge global audiences today but for us it is the past history of the cars and drivers that evokes our passion and ultimately our dream to bring to life a recreation version of the iconic Porsche 917. 

I've been fascinated by just how brave and skilled drivers were to race at Le Mans and no more astounding as the time of the early 1970's which saw the Porsche 917 scream along the Mulsanne at 239 mph, simply amazing.

We have brought a team together who are not only passionate about this project but who have the experience, skills and knowledge to help ensure this project can be realised. Building the car is not enough and so what will provide fuel and energy to project 917 is our desire to inspire and encourage young engineers and designers to get involved directly with the project.

What we also want to achieve is to re-imagine the 917 into a modern contemporary version, unique and not just a facsimile of the original, something like this...

 

So realising a dream to build a contemporary version of the Porsche 917 is phenomenal but this project will also nurture engineering talent and help smart young engineers of the future. There is something very special about providing an opportunity to engage with young talent eager to learn and benefit from a unique project like this especially as the UK is seeing fewer young people enter the field of engineering.

At the heart of Project 917 and during each step of the process from funding to build completion, we will engage young talent to develop and learn from our team who will coach, develop and help find the engineers of the future.

On-line competitions will be launched during the build process to ignite a spark and locate the engineers who will be part of the team and instrumental in how it is completed. 

Additionally, the whole project will be documented as part of a socially focused e-learning portal (917 e-Portal) dedicated to help keen engineers to learn from the project but also from investors and people interested in seeing how the project is progressing. 

 

Video updates and skills Tutorials on the ePortal by Puddl.

We will include young creative people to help provide the content and feel of the portal which will help them create portfolio pieces and will be accompanied by contributions from mentors and special guests presenters.

The juice for us at Project 917 will be the engagement with young talented people but with an additional benefit of seeing a fantastic and unique road car come to life... does that sound like a cool idea?

So, if you, like us are a fan of Le Mans, motorsport, Porsche 917 or like the idea of helping the young engineering talent of the future or maybe you just want to grab some unique and collectable rewards, then go ahead and invest....

What We Need & What You Get

To achieve our goals we need your help in raising £50,000 to purchase the chassis and body of the 917 from Bailey Cars, this will be built to order and delivered to us in Coventry where Advanced Manufacturing will provide a stunning facility for us to work in.

 

 

Example chassis and body from Bailey Cars.

 

 

The team at Bailey cars have years of experience and have shipped 15 917's for customers around the world.

ADV in Coventry, home for Project 917 when the chassis and body arrive from Bailey..

The funds will also be used for the Bill Of Materials, parts, components, engine etc. as well as the creation of the '917 e-Portal' the e-learning element plus an e-commerce sister website that will provide sales of Le Mans and 917 related products.

So of course, the majority of the funding will go to support the component needs of the project with the pricing applied to the overall costs being over estimated as we anticipate that some components will be lower cost, but also gratis as the project will showcase manufacturers and suppliers, benefiting all.

The project will likely take 9-10 months to complete before we can showcase the car and prepare for its sale. This will give us ample time to build a credible vehicle but also ensure that the experience of our engineering stars will be maximised.

The project will therefore have assets that could be sold on should the project fall way short of its objective, but the momentum will be supplemented with the e-commerce sales.

Our Perks

Our perks are really cool and have been selected to showcase highly creative and desirable and collectable Le Mans and Porsche 917 related gifts and products.

Superb 1:18 and 1:8 Porsche 917 Scale models, stunning 917 framed photographs, unique sculptures, promotional watches all unique and some with signatures of Le Mans racing hero's.

Check our perks out here...

 

And recently added...

Awesome prints by Unique & Limited 

 

 

 

 

 

And more...

 

 

Fantastic and exclusive 1:10 sculpture from DCD 

Project 917 Omologato exclusive watch

 

917 1:8 scale model by Javan Smith  

Le Mans 'Beverage' Bag

 

Steve McQueen artistic print by Art48

 

 

 

3D Le Mans Circuit - signed by Derek Bell

Rob Overy Photography 
 

917 Artistic Print by Art48

1:43 scale McLaren F1 GTR - signed by Derek Bell

917 1:12 Sculpture by DCD

We will also have a fantastic coffee table book showcasing the project as it is completed with contributions from Le Mans superstars plus the chance to have your name etched into a plate that will sit behind the drivers seat of Project 917 chassis #1! 

    The Impact

    Our team is unique, but it is also hugely experienced and connected in the automotive manufacturing industry. ADV for example are specialists in hand built coachwork and one-off builds for some of the most prestigious car makers in the world! Neil at Javan Sports cars  has build low volume cars for a number of years and acts as a consultant for many niche car ventures, but the great thing about Neil is that his is  totally passionate about nurturing young engineering talent.
    Meet the team...

    Ian Howe - Self confessed Le Mans and car nut and thrilled to be part of this project and to work with some of the best guys in the business...

    Neil Yates - Niche car supremo, heads up Rally Prep and consultant to the very best of British car manufactures and skills developer.

    Helping us raise the funding to build Project 917 will also ensure that young talent can use the experience to promote there skills portfolio to help them get a great job or inspire them to build their own business. Project 917 will help the engineering entrepreneurial stars of the future!

     

    We will set up competitions to design the interior and exterior trims re-imagining the 917 for a contemporary version, like nothing before!

    Winners will be invited to be part of the build process but ultimately we will seek 2-3 talented passionate engineers to join the team. Our mentors will encourage this new team to excel in all aspects of the build creating a unique exposure to skilled technicians and a motivated team.

    The ultimate goal is on completing the build of 917 that we repeat the exercise when the 917 chassis #1 is sold and secure an agency agreement with Bailey Cars to sell and build cars to order.

    This whole exercise will be documented and promoted online via a unique update and e-learning portal (917 e-Portal) so that we can showcase the skills we have but also build a fun creative environment to excite people into engineering and just maybe encouraging the next world renowned engineer! We will also be showcasing creatively talented people to help us create videos and tutorials as well as photography for the accompanying book by young photographers who we will embed in the project.

    So how fast will Project917 be? Well, for us the ultimate speed is not so important as creating a contemporary road going version that can be shown off on the streets, as well as a race track. The target weight will be below 1000kg using a Porsche 993 normally aspirated engine rated at 280bhp so she should be quick! 

    The interior will be snug, but we will bring some touches that will make the driving experience exciting and comfortable.

    The exterior shape will be largely unchanged, however we will incorporate unique styling trims to make the 917 stand out in a crowd... all to be designed and imagined by our competition winners!

    The finished car will be a result of professional build skills, creative styling and an eye for detail and ultimately a very desirable car for a new owner.

      Risks & Challenges

       
      Being passionate is not always enough and especially in a project as complex as 917 and so I have built up the partners based upon previous working experience and uber respect for their skills. Plus these are people who I trust and respect.
      This project could not be carried out with as much passion and purpose without the inclusion of these partners especially Advanced Engineering and Javan Sport Cars, who have history and huge track record in the automotive industry.
      At each stage there will be challenges of course, converting a design, for example, of the interior will take some effort, however, coach working specialists will be on hand to help maintain the design integrity but ensure 'fit for purpose'.
      Getting the 917 approved for road use will be a challenge to, though with guidance from our partners we can ensure that their experience with the DVLA and the many cars they have submitted for approval, will be invaluable. 
      Managing young talent in a new environment may also present challenges, but again the experience of our mentors with apprenticeships and new hires will be invaluable. It is our obligation to ensure each member of the team gets a properly exciting and positive experience from the project.

      People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

      • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
      • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

      Other Ways You Can Help

      If you have got this far in reading the campaign, then I would suggest that you might have been inspired to help, and that is awesome and it would be great to have you as part of the success.

      Any level of help either via the perks, or indeed just spreading the word would be so helpful indeed, if you are an engineer who would love to be part of the competition then keep following our progress on Indiegogo share tools as well as social media so that you don't miss out.

      By joining our journey you will be helping us realise a dream to bring to like one of the iconic shapes in motorsport, but also to help boost young engineers to build experience, confidence and entreprenerial-ship. 

      This is so exciting, lets all be part of it!
story_txt:
Project 917
Project 917 is all about our passion for the most famous race in motorsport, Le Mans. 
This amazing race attracts huge global audiences today but for us it is the past history of the cars and drivers that evokes our passion and ultimately our dream to bring to life a recreation version of the iconic Porsche 917. 
I've been fascinated by just how brave and skilled drivers were to race at Le Mans and no more astounding as the time of the early 1970's which saw the Porsche 917 scream along the Mulsanne at 239 mph, simply amazing.

We have brought a team together who are not only passionate about this project but who have the experience, skills and knowledge to help ensure this project can be realised. Building the car is not enough and so what will provide fuel and energy to project 917 is our desire to inspire and encourage young engineers and designers to get involved directly with the project.

What we also want to achieve is to re-imagine the 917 into a modern contemporary version, unique and not just a facsimile of the original, something like this...
 

So realising a dream to build a contemporary version of the Porsche 917 is phenomenal but this project will also nurture engineering talent and help smart young engineers of the future. There is something very special about providing an opportunity to engage with young talent eager to learn and benefit from a unique project like this especially as the UK is seeing fewer young people enter the field of engineering.
At the heart of Project 917 and during each step of the process from funding to build completion, we will engage young talent to develop and learn from our team who will coach, develop and help find the engineers of the future.
On-line competitions will be launched during the build process to ignite a spark and locate the engineers who will be part of the team and instrumental in how it is completed. 
Additionally, the whole project will be documented as part of a socially focused e-learning portal (917 e-Portal) dedicated to help keen engineers to learn from the project but also from investors and people interested in seeing how the project is progressing. 
 
Video updates and skills Tutorials on the ePortal by Puddl.We will include young creative people to help provide the content and feel of the portal which will help them create portfolio pieces and will be accompanied by contributions from mentors and special guests presenters.
The juice for us at Project 917 will be the engagement with young talented people but with an additional benefit of seeing a fantastic and unique road car come to life... does that sound like a cool idea?
So, if you, like us are a fan of Le Mans, motorsport, Porsche 917 or like the idea of helping the young engineering talent of the future or maybe you just want to grab some unique and collectable rewards, then go ahead and invest....
What We Need & What You Get

To achieve our goals we need your help in raising £50,000 to purchase the chassis and body of the 917 from Bailey Cars, this will be built to order and delivered to us in Coventry where Advanced Manufacturing will provide a stunning facility for us to work in.
 
 

Example chassis and body from Bailey Cars.
 
 

The team at Bailey cars have years of experience and have shipped 15 917's for customers around the world.

ADV in Coventry, home for Project 917 when the chassis and body arrive from Bailey..
The funds will also be used for the Bill Of Materials, parts, components, engine etc. as well as the creation of the '917 e-Portal' the e-learning element plus an e-commerce sister website that will provide sales of Le Mans and 917 related products.
So of course, the majority of the funding will go to support the component needs of the project with the pricing applied to the overall costs being over estimated as we anticipate that some components will be lower cost, but also gratis as the project will showcase manufacturers and suppliers, benefiting all.
The project will likely take 9-10 months to complete before we can showcase the car and prepare for its sale. This will give us ample time to build a credible vehicle but also ensure that the experience of our engineering stars will be maximised.
The project will therefore have assets that could be sold on should the project fall way short of its objective, but the momentum will be supplemented with the e-commerce sales.
Our Perks
Our perks are really cool and have been selected to showcase highly creative and desirable and collectable Le Mans and Porsche 917 related gifts and products.
Superb 1:18 and 1:8 Porsche 917 Scale models, stunning 917 framed photographs, unique sculptures, promotional watches all unique and some with signatures of Le Mans racing hero's.
Check our perks out here...
 
And recently added...
Awesome prints by Unique & Limited 
 
  
 

 
And more...
 
 

Fantastic and exclusive 1:10 sculpture from DCD 

Project 917 Omologato exclusive watch
 
917 1:8 scale model by Javan Smith  
Le Mans 'Beverage' Bag

 
Steve McQueen artistic print by Art48  
 

3D Le Mans Circuit - signed by Derek Bell

Rob Overy Photography 
  917 Artistic Print by Art48

1:43 scale McLaren F1 GTR - signed by Derek Bell
 917 1:12 Sculpture by DCD
We will also have a fantastic coffee table book showcasing the project as it is completed with contributions from Le Mans superstars plus the chance to have your name etched into a plate that will sit behind the drivers seat of Project 917 chassis #1!

Our team is unique, but it is also hugely experienced and connected in the automotive manufacturing industry. ADV for example are specialists in hand built coachwork and one-off builds for some of the most prestigious car makers in the world! Neil at Javan Sports cars  has build low volume cars for a number of years and acts as a consultant for many niche car ventures, but the great thing about Neil is that his is  totally passionate about nurturing young engineering talent.
Meet the team...

Neil Yates - Niche car supremo, heads up Rally Prep and consultant to the very best of British car manufactures and skills developer.

Any level of help either via the perks, or indeed just spreading the word would be so helpful indeed, if you are an engineer who would love to be part of the competition then keep following our progress on Indiegogo share tools as well as social media so that you don't miss out.

story:
I have a passion for gardening but I am stuck in the corporate world. I grew up with a large family garden and even today hobby farm to supplement my life. I have shared the surplus produce with neighbors and coworkers and canned for future use.  I also teach friends and co-workers how to can and dehydrate foods.

I have spent my life living from paycheck to paycheck in jobs that offer me a wage but no personal satisfaction or purpose; I just exist/survive.  I want to live my dream and help society become aware of permaculture farming and provide organic produce to the community, not just existing within my community but actually contributing with purpose, on purpose.  I would love leave the corporate world (allowing a young, college graduate a corporate job opportunity with my vacancy) and fulfill my dream of a permaculture organic farm with a Bed & Breakfast!

What is Permaculture? Permaculture is consciously designed landscapes that mimic the patterns and relationships found in nature while yielding an abundance of food, fiber and energy for provision of local needs. People, their buildings and the ways in which they organize themselves are central to permaculture. Thus the permaculture vision of permanent or sustainable agriculture has evolved to one of permanent or sustainable culture.

I am not alone in this desire; my son has struggled through school, graduated with the help of special education resources, attempted college to find that it was not a direction to his future success unless he burdens himself with more student loan debt than he will ever be able to payoff. He knows he wants to farm - he has spent his life in the garden with me and he has a passion for growing and cultivating crops. He wants a sustainable life, and he wants to be self-sufficient.

And my daughter, currently a single working mom and award winning manager with a passion for people and adventure, she would thrive managing the B&B, partnering with local businesses to introduce people to all North Alabama has to offer, from organic produce, local creameries, and bakeries, to vineyards and museums.  And her son would benefit from being part of a hard working family, sharing in the community and learning the family business.

Raising my children in survival mode is not enough. Just existing doesn’t matter. What I desire the most is providing a way for my children to be a successful, self–sufficient, satisfied, contributing members to the community in areas they have passion for. I want this for me as well - to work for satisfaction, contribution, passion, and purpose. And this farm would a personal growth opportunity for my family, for my son, this is how he can overcome his challenges in the workforce, for my daughter a way too work within her passion and teach her son valuable life skills.  However, we don’t have the means to do it; even if we sold everything we would come up short… very, very short.  What we have is the drive, desire, ambition, will, tenacity, and perseverance; we just don’t have the funds.

Your contributions will help to:

•  Increase the amount of locally grown organic food available - our produce will be sold through U-Pick, farmers markets, Community Supported Agriculture (CSA) produce subscriptions, and a street side stand

·  Train young urban food growers by providing learning opportunities and help to support the urban permaculture movement

·  Provide those interested with education in food growing and sustainable living - the farm will host volunteer days, offer hosted visits and a wide range of food preservation learning opportunities in canning, pickling, and food dehydration.

·  Provide local shelters and food pantries with gleaning opportunities

·  Move into further areas of small animal husbandry and beekeeping, providing pastured eggs and local honey to the community

·  Be financially sustainable through a combination of growing and selling organic produce and operating a Bed & Breakfast

To make this happen startup funds are needed to procure the house and land; a 20 acre farm including a house and greenhouse.  Then prepare the land with natural irrigation by directing the water [into purpose built structures such as small ponds or dams and implementing other supports structures such as a network of swales, canals and food forest systems] allowing us to passively direct the water where we want it to go.  This will eliminate the need for pumps and mechanical irrigation. This is followed by cultivating the land with companion plantings [including nut and fruit trees, berries, some vegetables, herbs and beneficial flowers], and erect a barn for storage of tools and equipment.

This is a big change so there will be risks and challenges to overcome, and not a get rich at any time scheme. Nut and fruit trees take years to come to maturity so income from their produce harvest will not immediate.  And a small percentage of the initial plantings may not produce and will need to be cut down and replanted. However bed & breakfast berry, vegetable and herb crops will be available near term. 

However the risk, if this is my calling, my family’s sustainable future, then I am willing to take a large leap of faith in this venture and make this an all or nothing campaign.

story:
Hi!

Coffee! The wonderful beverage that has been among us for centuries. We love coffee and we think it deserves better.

As Argea, our primary job is project-based machine manufacturing (www.argea.co). But we also have a desire to make our projects in different fields such as Meliya Coffee real.

Innovation is the most important value that keeps us vigorous in our different projects. Innovation enables us to rediscover things and it opens new roads to us. However, innovation sometimes can damage a natural thing and turn it into something else.

In fact, what we want to do is be on the natural one’s side as long as technology enables us to do. It is possible to bring together innovative, natural and modern products in one product. We want to achieve these goals with Meliya Coffee.


Natural, pure, long-lasting and shaped Turkish coffee.

Turkish coffee is especially one of the rare products which remained natural and pure in the field of beverages. Although there is instant coffee or instant Turkish coffee on the market, we were able to produce a new type of coffee that is as functional as them and also served natural and pure.

What you see in my hand is not a coffee bean. We reshaped powdered coffee into a coffee bean. The amount of coffee you use when making coffee is at a guess. It might cause differences in the taste of coffee. With these coffee tablets, you will always make your Turkish Coffee with a consistent, perfect taste.

Besides, Shaped Turkish Coffee Meliya will not stale or spoil and it will not lose its perfect coffee smell for months.


How is it brewed?

For one cup of coffee, you put a tablet of Meliya into a coffeepot and cook it at a low heat until it has a thick foam. (125 ml / 7 gr coffee) Natural, pure, long-lasting and shaped Turkish coffee.

As Meliya Coffee, we begin this adventure with Turkish coffee. By taking consumption amount of coffee and new consumption habits into consideration...

Arabica is medium-roasted and finely ground Turkish coffee. If we grow and develop our business model with your support, we can reinterpret and offer you instant coffee and even 3-in-1 coffee in a natural way.


What did we do?

The idea of Meliya Coffee came out in January, 2014. In June, we executed our prototype manufacturing. We tested our coffee for 6 months. We got excellent outcomes.

In a technical sense, we have done our work about manufacturing method, packaging choice and manufacturing site. At this stage, we need your support. We want to put Meliya on the market at the same price as its counterparts.

Thank you for your support!


We begin our adventure with Turkish Coffee!


So there is Shaped Turkish Coffee but no Instant Coffee? The next stage is Shaped Instant Coffee! Drinking an all natural, pure, carcinogen-free coffee is possible with Meliya!

What have we done so far?

1-  We have determined the location we will get the coffee from and the coffee type.

2-  We have determined the way we will manufacture the coffee.

3-  We have determined our packaging and we have tested it.

4-  We have tested our end product for 6 months.

5-  We have planned logistics and distribution.

6-  We have had pre-interviews with supermarkets.

What will we do?

a) We will buy a two tons of coffee for $10,000.

b) With $25,000 we will buy two tons of coffee, 50,000 packaging material and we will cover labor expenses.

c) With $50,000 we will buy a ton of coffee and 100.000 packaging material; we will cover labor and advertising service expenses; and we will have the necessary machine and manufacturing equipment. In short, we will be able to put the product on the market shelves. 

Issues about Meliya Coffee.

1-


We compress the coffee in our special manufacturing form with our compressing machine (photo is figurative, not real.) and we do not put the coffee through any other process. (Coffee which is compressed and shaped like a coffee bean will maintain its freshness even when left open.)

2-

Ground coffee beans turn into their original form…

3-

4-


The joy of Meliya Coffee in a copper pot…

Sugar preference in Turkish Coffee is as follows:

Little sugar:  1 sugar cube/1 teaspoon (top full)

Medium sugar:  2 sugar cubes/2 teaspoons (top full)

A lot of sugar:  3 sugar cubes/3 teaspoons (top full)

5-

 For a tasty Turkish coffee,

When you boil the coffee, distribute the foam to the cups with a teaspoon, and then boil the coffee again. Your coffee is ready…

6-

 We did our publicity shooting at the Horse Bazaar Square in Fatih, Istanbul.

(The Horse Bazaar Square is famous for its modest and quiet decorated cafés where you can smoke the best hookah in Istanbul.)

7-

 We while working…

(Co-founders of Meliya Coffee: Mansur Acuner on the right, Ömer Kaya on the left)

8-

Selfie with our production crew… :)

(We want to thank Hakan Çelik, Deniz Boz, Mehmed Zahid Balta and Bedirhan for their help.)

9-


We are also grateful to Hanegah Café and its staff for helping us during our shooting!

10-

We love coffee and we know that it deserves better.

11-


Thank you for your support!

a)
We will buy a two tons of coffee for $10,000. 
b)
With $25,000 we will buy two tons of coffee, 50,000 packaging material and we will
cover labor expenses. 
c)
With $50,000 we will buy a ton of coffee and 100.000 packaging material; we will
cover labor and advertising service expenses; and we will have the necessary
machine and manufacturing equipment. In short, we will be able to put the
product on the market shelves. Issues about Meliya Coffee.1-We compress
the coffee in our special manufacturing form with our compressing machine (photo is figurative, not real.) and
we do not put the coffee through any other process. (Coffee which is compressed
and shaped like a coffee bean will maintain its freshness even when left open.)
2-Ground
coffee beans turn into their original form…3-
4-

The joy of
Meliya Coffee in a copper pot…
Sugar
preference in Turkish Coffee is as follows:
Little
sugar:  1
sugar cube/1 teaspoon (top full)
Medium
sugar:  2 sugar cubes/2 teaspoons (top
full)
A lot of
sugar:  3 sugar cubes/3 teaspoons (top
full)
5-
 For a tasty
Turkish coffee,
When you
boil the coffee, distribute the foam to the cups with a teaspoon, and then boil
the coffee again. Your coffee is ready…
6-
 We did our
publicity shooting at the Horse Bazaar Square in Fatih, Istanbul. 
(The Horse
Bazaar Square is famous for its modest and quiet decorated cafés where you can
smoke the best hookah in Istanbul.)7-

 We while
working… 
(Co-founders
of Meliya Coffee: Mansur Acuner on the right, Ömer Kaya on the left)
8-
Selfie with
our production crew… :)
(We want to
thank Hakan Çelik, Deniz Boz, Mehmed Zahid Balta and Bedirhan for their help.)
9-
We are also
grateful to Hanegah Café and its staff for helping us during our shooting!
10-
We love
coffee and we know that it deserves better.
11-
Thank you
for your support!

story:
Curvilux is the reinvention of the bedside table with a new smart design. It incorporates features like chargers for your devices, and lights to illuminate your room in a clever new way, it also incorporates a high quality audio system, all packed in a beautiful and comfortable design that your 21 st century room deserves.

Wireless and USB charger.

Curvilux allows you to charge up to 3 devices at the same time, taking advantage of the wireless charger and the 2 USB outlets that are comfortably located.                  No more tangling cables let Curvilux organize the charge of all your devices.

Smart lighting

Including two lighting modes, Curvilux has an ambient light, perfect for reading your books and magazines or have breakfast in your bed. It also has a floor focused light which allows you to walk in the dark room without waking your roommate up or hitting the furniture.


Bluetooth audio system + NFC connection

Say goodbye to those uncomfortably large audio systems and alarm clocks.

Curvilux incorporates a high quality audio system and Bluetooth connection. Just approach your phone or tablet to the NFC zone and that’s it, connection established!

Enjoy your favorite music while you relax, or get ready to go to work. You can even answer your phone calls with the build in microphone or make your phone alarm go off on the Curvilux and never again run late to your appointments. 

Style and modern design!

Manufactured in protected curved wood which lasts forever.

Modern and sober design that includes two drawers with a system that makes them pop up when you push.

Curvilux comes with removable legs, so it’s your choice to use them, or hang it on the wall making Curvilux levitate.

The contrast between wood and pure colors gives Curvilux a unique personality. You can choose the style that suits you in our 21 modern color combinations.



Our special edition is dedicated to those who have the opportunity to give us a big push.This is why we developed a bedside table with an exclusive design in which you will be able to choose the color, the engraved text and the 3D pattern between the options we have to offer. We will be here waiting for your orders! Thank you much!



Shipping is require on Perks that includes at least one Curvilux bed table; special editions are excluded. 

Curvilux is a Start-up, technology based, project focused on reinventing and bringing innovation to the bedside table. It combines beautiful designs, clever solutions and technology to make your room a little bit more comfortable and organized.

We are two brothers from Argentina, passionate about design and new technologies, who created Curvilux. We devoted the past year to develop and test different Curvilux prototypes and now we are ready to spread it around the world. Our experience learned from the Industrial Specialized High School, Juan Manuel’s engineering career, and Rodrigo's knowledge on start-up business helped us make this project come to life.

We need your support to move forward

After months of developing and prototyping, we have now fully functional prototypes of the Curvilux. We have been able to define manufacturing and time processes, it has also helped us give special attention to the details and improve the design to provide the best user experience. We have made our biggest effort to bring you the coolest night table for your bedroom.

While we were on the developing process, we contacted suppliers ready to be part of this project and work by our side, now for the next step to bring Curvilux to the market we will need your help.

We have created this campaign, not only to get the founds, but also to let everybody know about Curvilux; so if you like the idea, help support us by contributing with this campaign and share it with your friends and coworkers to help us build a big community.

We really appreciate every single contribution; your comments or suggestion will also be welcomed

THANK YOU VERY MUCH FOR YOUR SUPPORT!!


Can I charge any device on it?

Any device with a 5 volt input can be charged on the USB outlets. Also you can use the wireless base to charge any phone or tablet compatible with this system.

How big is the Curvilux?

Specifications:

Height: 13'’ (35cm)

Width: 16'’(40cm)

Depth: 13'’(35cm)

Weight: 26 lbs.

Are legs included? Does it comes with the wall mounting bracket?

Legs comes with the Curvilux, we've design an easy mounting mechanism, to use them or not depending your preference. We also includes a wall mounting bracket to hang Curvilux on the wall and make it levitate.

Is the Curvilux assembled out of the box?

The Curvilux comes almost fully assembled, the only thing you need to define is whether to hang it or stand it on its legs. You will also have to choose the side of the table you would like to connect the power cable, either on the right or left side of the table.

How many colors are available?

You can choose between 3 colors options for the side panels, and 7 for the bridge and floor lights, giving you 21 combinations to have the perfect Curvilux for you. Don't worry We’ll be reaching out after the campaign closes to confirm your shipping details and color choice.

How do I mount it on the wall?

Just mount the special bracket on the wall with the screws provided and then hang the Curvilux on it, this makes the Curvilux design brings out.

Do I have to plug it in?

Yes, to be able to use all functions of the table you should plug it in with the cable provided, you can connect either on the right or left side outlet of the Curvilux and then to 110/220 V house current on the other side.

How is music play?

Music is played by connecting the Bluetooth of your device to the Curvilux. Then you can play any song you want. Curvilux also includes a built in microphone to answer phone calls.

Does the wireless charger meets the health regulations?

The built in wireless charger responds to the standards required by the health regulations. Designed under the QI charging standard, this device complies with part 15 of the FCC Rules. Operation is subject to the following two conditions: (1) This device may not cause harmful interference, and (2) this device must accept any interference received, including interference that may cause undesired operation.

this device operates with a current of 5 volts.

Am I supposed to add shipping?

Yes shipping must be added, only on perks that includes a Curvilux table. The amount you should add is U$D 20 for United states, U$D 60 for CAN/EU and U$D 80 for international shipping.

I already contributed but forgot to add shipping.

No worries! You can add shipping by placing a new contribution. Just add the shipping amount depending on your country or choose the perk specially created to add shipping for your country.

How do i select the perk of my preference when contributing with U$D 50?

When contributing  on perk of U$D 50, you wont be able to select the reward you would like to receive, but don't worry, we will reach you by mail asking you to select the one of your preference.

When do I get my reward?

Perks up to U$D 50 will be sent by April.

If you ordered a Curvilux table, you should expect it by September.

We are doing our biggest efforts to bring Curvilux as soon as possible.

How can I contact Curvilux team for more answers?

Feel free to leave us a comment at the comments section.

Also you can contact us by:

Facebook: /Curvilux

Twitter: @Curvilux

Email: info@curvilux.com

story:
VEGFRESH is an agriculture based E-Commerce Startup  

"A system that brings farm products direct  from field to homes" 

This campaign will enable us to make our dream come true with the proceeds we will Rent the delivery vehicles, and travel to Residential Homes,Gated communities,hotels,Food processing industries and other places where Fresh & Farm products are consumed.
                 www.vegfresh.in

An E-commerce portal which serves the consumers at their door step high quality fruits and vegetables through a system that brings farm products direct from field to homes by which consumer can save their precious time and money. 

Vegfresh will actively engage in three key-activities- Online Sales & Marketing,Post Harvest Logistics and Promotion of Organic Farming and we understand that 75 – 80% Indian farmers are small and have a marginal revenue. With the increasing costs of cultivation, crop failures, lack of post-harvest logistics and inadequate storage facility, we decided to take steps towards improving the lives of farmers and provide service to even those farmers who do not relate well with English language & the Internet.


As a solution, we came up with an online market for farm produced products and dedicated team will work offline to find the right customer. It is easy for farmers to register with Vegfresh to make an online market for their produce.

The procedure to use the website service is quite simple. The Farmer gets registered with Vegfresh, his agricultural products are verified by VegFresh and are published. Vegfresh will find the right customer and will deliver goods to customer

POST HARVEST LOGISTICS

In India between 50% to 70% of Fruits & Vegetables is lost post-harvest between farmer and consumer. This occurs through poor handling or bio deterioration by microorganisms and insects. Fruits and vegetables are most at risk due to poor standards of refrigeration. Most fresh produce is transported in an unpacked form and is often sold at markets, where handling dramatically reduces its life.

Upgrading transport infrastructure, better trucks, better packaging would have immediate supply chain benefits. 

Improving post harvest logistics in India does not just have humanitarian implications. It would also decrease the need for additional areas to be cultivated, which would reduce the environmental impact of agriculture. It would also reduce the level of farming intensity, meaning fewer pesticides and chemical fertilizers required.

VEGFRESH ORGANIC FARMING

Organic farming system in India is not new and is being followed from ancient time. It is a method of farming system which primarily aimed at cultivating the land and raising crops in such a way, as to keep the soil alive and in good health by use of organic wastes (crop, animal and farm wastes, aquatic wastes) and other biological materials along with beneficial microbes (biofertilizers) to release nutrients to crops for increased sustainable production in an eco friendly pollution free environment.

VEGFRESH Organic agriculture is a unique production management system which promotes and enhances agro-ecosystem health, including biodiversity, biological cycles and soil biological activity
Where The Money Goes

The most important thing we need to start serving customers: Basic resources and The Delivery vehicles. We have been working with local freight forwarders and monitoring other sources to rent and own used vehicles.

If we exceed our goal we will put funds toward Promotion of Vegfresh, Purchasing delivery vehicles and Renting Cold storage units.

If we do not meet our campaign goal, all funds that are raised will go toward the Basic resources. We will pursue additional debt or equity financing, in order to make our dream a reality.

The Impact

Your contribution will create impact that is both local and global. By facilitating better solutions to consumers and farmers, you will become a part of the solution to the health crisis in this country. Local, organic vegetables and fruit sourcing is better for the environment and ensures food diversity. Also, you will be supporting many of unemployed and part time working students who is working for their basic needs.

What if you don't choose any PERK

Be an Investor for us with flexible amount of $100 to $1000 
Risk free Investment
Return on Investment :6 months
Minimum Assured profit : 12% /Annum
Maximum Profits up to : 30% /Annum
"Friends and Vegfresh supporters are eligible for investment plan"
Other ways you can help 

If you are unable to contribute but want to see Vegfresh (Farm to home) become a reality then please like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Vegfresh-395019660676430/ and don't forgot to use to the Indiegogo share tools to tell your friends about us!

story:
Short Summary

I’m Gary, and this summer I worked alongside Ulli and Mark, and together we set to understand changing consumer preferences in the alcoholic drink space.  

Through 40 in-person interviews and a global survey of over 200 people, we discovered that millennials have a very specific idea of what they want in their ideal alcoholic beverage: it means low-cal, it means low-sugar, and natural ingredients.

We’ve brewed up a new, lighter, full-alcohol alternative: Agaté.

Brewed from just three simple ingredients - tea, water, and agave - Agaté is naturally gluten-free, and only has 100 calories and 5g of sugar per serving.

At 4.5% ABV, Agaté offers all of the social benefits of existing alcoholic beverages with significantly fewer calories, the health benefits of tea, and a crisp and refreshing taste.

What We Need & What You Get

We’re looking to raise $35,000 so we can produce (called “co-packing” in the biz) our first commercial-sized production run to bring this drink to the market.

  • Since Agaté is literally designed to share (both in its 6-pack and 750mL format), all sponsorship will include Agaté for you to try!
  • Unfortunately, since we cannot execute the production run without all of the funds, we can only commit to the run if we make our goal; otherwise, your funds will be returned to you

The Impact

We believe Agaté will change the way you drink:

  • It’s naturally gluten-free so it won’t leave you feeling heavy like beer
  • Unlike cider and other sugary beer-alternatives, it’s low in sugar (only 5g)
  • It offers all the health benefits of tea (antioxidants, L-theanine, polyphenol, etc.)

Risks & Challenges

We’ve done a lot of work over the summer, but there’s still a lot to be done. Starting an alcoholic beverage business isn’t easy. Specifically, we are aware of the following risks (we want to be upfront with you all):

  • Distribution of alcohol in the US can be tricky, and we’re currently working on that
  • Competition is tough, so we’re working with partners to establish strategic relationships with retailers and industry partners

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can’t or don’t feel comfortable supporting us financially, please spread the word! Drinking different starts today!
