contribute more than $500 (USD). You will also only be able to use PayPal's
guest checkout process up to 15 times with a total spending limit of $4,000.
Once you reach PayPal's maximum, you will be prompted to upgrade to a full
PayPal account.
How Do I Get Help Or Support?
Send us a message on our contact page we will work with you to take care of your
issue!
What Is The Cost For Shipping?
Shipping perks within the United States is included with
your $60  contribution. International shipments of perks to most parts of the world will require a contribution of $75. If you are not in the European Union, Canada, Mexico, Australia or New Zealand please check with us regarding shipping costs first by sending us a message. International contributors will also need to pay any customs, taxes and other fees required by their country.
Has CombForms™ been Patented?
CombForms™ is patent pending and trademarked.
What CombForms™ Made Out Of?
CombForms will be made of Food safe BPA and phthalate
free nylon.



Other Ways You Can Help Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:  Please let people know about this campaign. Use the Indiegogo share tools so you will be able to find out about updates.
Follow us at our blog at www.combforms.com

story:
Résumé

keeme est un projet permettant à chaque individu de contrôler ses données personnelles en centralisant les différentes informations collectées par les objets connectés du quotidien tout en offrant une solution personnelle de trading.

{ keeme is a software platform allowing each individuals to control their personal data by centralizing the various information collected by connected objects. }
Le principe de Keeme est donc de créer un espace sécurisé afin de stocker les données collectées des différents appareils connectés à une personne, et de lui permettre de vendre, avec la communauté Keeme, des ensembles de données cohérentes vers des acheteurs ciblés (publicitaire, data brokers,…). L'utilisateur récupére ainsi les dividendes liés à ses données propres (sommeil, sport, activités cardiaques, activité web,…).
{The goal of Keeme is to create a secure storage in order to store the collected personal data of the various devices connected, and sell specific packages to the purchasers with whole of the community. }

Il faut savoir que les prévisions sur l'internet des objets fournissent les informations que d’ici 2020, 50 milliards d’objets seront connectés à internet et que cela représentera  19 billions de dollars de profits et d’économies durant la prochaine décennie.
Keeme doit permettre de reprendre une partie de ces profits en fournissant les outils personnels de trading  à chaque individu sur ces données propres.


Ce dont nous avons besoin et ce que vous obtenez

Le montant du financement correspond  :

  • A l'achat et à la constitution de l'infrastructure Big Data temps réel et au développement de la plateforme de trading personnel. {purchase and development of real-time Big Data infrastructure}
  • A l'achat et à la mise au point des logiciels des différents capteurs (bracelet, montre, capteur de fumée,....)  {purchase and development of sensors}
  • A la communication autour de la communauté Keeme, dans le cadre de la reprise de contrôle de ses données propres. {communication around the community Keeme}

L'impact

Il faut savoir qu'une grande part des revenus des sociétés de data broker vient de la captation d'informations personnels sur internet et dans un futur proche par le biais de ces capteurs (montre connecté, bracelet fitness, pèse personne, capteur de fumée,...). 

{ Indeed, you should know that a large share of income data broker companies comes from the internet uptake and will soon through these sensors (watch, wristband fit, bathroom scale, fire-protection,...) }

L'individu n'est actuellement q'un intermédiaire non rémunéré, générateur de données statistiques, permettant un meilleur ciblage sur ces habitudes de consommateur.

{ The individual is currently unpaid that a way. as a statistical data engine, providing personal data to calculate the impact on our everyday consumption patterns }

Keeme apporte les outils de monétisation de ces données propres à des sociétés tierces au sein d’une plateforme de vente dédiée.

{ Keeme provides a transparent way for civil people to access and monetize its own data in a personal trading center }

Keeme fournira les services de collecte aux données techniquement accessibles (montre, bracelet fitness, mobile,...), un stockage sécurisé, et accessible par l'individu seul, ainsi qu'une plateforme de vente dédiée permettant de choisir les sociétés autorisées à utiliser ces données personnels ou les statistiques associées.

{ Keeme provides services to collect at differents devices, secure storage with personal autorisation, and a dedicated sales platform to select the companies to use such personal data or related statistics }

Le financement de la plateforme se fera sur la base d’un pourcentage sur le trading des données ou des statistiques associées (identique crownfunding).

{ Funding : A similar principle to crownfunding is established on the percentage on the generated sales }


Risques et défis

Les différentes voies critiques ont été validés dans un macro-planning, et l'architecture technique est fixée (Fast data, protocole IOT, streaming,...). 

L'équipe est composée de personnes ayant l'habitude de gérer des projets d'envergure, des développeurs expérimentés sans oublier la partie commerciale pour la plateforme Data Broker.  {The team consists of developers and project manager}

Les défis de la réalisation résident dans la capacité à adresser un maximum d'équipements connectés en direct et par défaut via les interfaces propriétaires, et agréger un nombre de personnes permettant la mise en oeuvre de statistiques cohérentes. {The challenges of achieving critical size and are compatible sensors}

Un retour important est attendu par la communauté afin de communiquer et de structurer de manière plus précise les besoins fonctionnels liés à la partie Trading. Un certain nombre de modèles sont à l'étude afin de proposer des packs rapidement identifiables par les sociétés clientes (recherche, domotique, santé, shopping, sportif....).

D'autres façons d'aider

  • Passer le mot et de faire de la publicité autour du projet Keeme. {advertising around the project Keeme}
  • Faire partie de la communauté Keeme et  faire avancer le sujet de réappropriation de ses données (http://www.keeme.io/register).
{ You can take part in the project while going on the www.keeme.io site and by registering you with the Keeme club }

Alright folks, my name is James Stewart. I have been fishing in the Gulf of Mexico now for about 8 years. I am a licensed captain and currently operate a 65 ft. charter/party boat in Tarpon Springs. We specialize in everything from shallow water grouper fishing, deep drop fishing in up to 1500 feet, to trolling and swordfishing.

     This campaign is for one million dollars. I know that sounds like a lot but boats and motors are extremely expensive as is rigging the boat, permits, licenses etc...  Every dollar raised will go into the boat and the business. Just the boat build alone will be over a million and all the startup costs, depending on the amount of money raised, will come out of my pocket. So if I can raise the money I will also be giving back some fairly substantial awards. Anything from a t-shirt and koozie all the way up to an all inclusive charter fishing trip of your choice will be given back depending on the amount of money donated. Also, every donator will be entered in a raffle to win 1 of 3 custom rods built by me personally for you.

     This campaign is about more than a boat, its my life. Fishing is what I do and will always do so this is part of my legacy. If you can help me in any way, I promise you will never be forgotten. This is my journey and I hope you will follow along with me.

Sincerely,

Capt. James

story:
Wiew  Catalog:  http://www.good-e.eu/en/catalogo/
 

GOOD.E is a new vacuum sealing machine. It is extremely compact and quiet, easy to install, and always ready for use. It boasts high quality components and a sophisticated design and is made entirely in Italy. It helps keep foods fresh for longer periods of time, resulting in reduced food expenses as less will need to be thrown away.

We believe that this new appliance will be just as useful in the kitchen as an oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, induction hub… we think it’s practicality and usefulness will make it the 5th electrical appliance that we all want to have in our kitchen, because it prevents food from being wasted and therefore allows families to SAVE money. Last but not least, the new trend in low-temperature vacuum cooking preserves all the nutritional quality of foods, enhancing the flavour and maintaining the colour. Food can be cooked using bags for low-temperature vacuum cooking readily available on the market.

The machine is quiet, compact and attractive, with an affordable price point, in particular during the launch through INDIEGOGO. The vacuum bags used for the vacuum sealer can be reused, losing normally about 2 cm at each opening.

The campaign is important for us because we are two friends with a background in design and mass production according to international quality standards. Our experience, professionalism and morality, as well as sense of duty and dedication to our work, allows us to guarantee the highest quality and reliability of the manufactured product. A high-level product such as GOOD.E is the direct result of accurate research during every stage of the project, from the design to each machine component.

 

Those like you who help us will be part of a dream come true, and so we cannot thank you enough. Thanks to you we can turn this project into a REALITY, on which we (Simone and Giancarlo), as founders and partners of 5E Srl, are basing major projects for us and our respective families. One of our dreams after the success of this first project together is to open an Office for the research and development of new products to improve our everyday life.

 

This project represents all our passion and enthusiasm that characterise our working life. Others before us have made it and with your help we can also do it, and who knows, one day we could be managing a large company that employs and takes care of the wellbeing of others.

Your contribution and belief in GOOD.E allows us to make the moulds for mass production, to design the software of the electronic board and the graphics of the packaging, to produce the operation and installation manual, and to cover the costs already incurred, such as the video presentation, website and brochure, and prototypes too.

GOOD.E will drastically change your life in the kitchen: by having the machine always ready to use, you will become more creative and efficient in the kitchen, cooking foods under vacuum for easy and healthy meals, without dirtying and wasting food. You can preserve your food longer, SAVING and optimising your food expenses.

 We believe that once the moulds, the operating and installation manual and packaging are produced, with your help we will be able to also index our website and sell our products directly online, as well as make the GOOD.E machine, once completed, available on major online stores, large distribution chains, kitchen manufacturers, and also through door-to-door sales. Of course your support, even psychological, is important for the success of the project, which cannot go ahead without your initial help. Obviously, we will offer you the best launching price compared to the future selling price of the GOOD.E machines on the market.

GOOD.E can also be installed in your camper / caravan.

 

GOOD.E will be shipped directly from the manufacturer in Italy

 

 

TIMELINE

 

Technical Data:

 

PATENT PENDING

 

Wiew  Catalog:  http://www.good-e.eu/en/catalogo/

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Come on New Zealand

Come on New Zealanders lets show our current Government that we DO NOT want to change our current flag or our History. How can we do that? By FLYING THE FLAG everywhere we can. I would encourage you to put up flags in your front yards or at your job. For those of you who would like to go a step further we have stickers available so you can put them on your letterboxes, cars, front doors or even the windows at your place of business. Remember that the current Government has ordered 250 flags in the alternative design to persuade people to vote for those designs and they are always saying that people want the change. Well lets show them that we do not. You cant argue with something that can be physically seen with the human eye so lets paint this country Blue, Red and White. Lets show them we wont tolerate that.

The Sticker design.

story:
So... How Are We Going to Get There and Beyond?

  • We need at least $5000 to pay for the materials and services to craft a sturdy enough obelisk to survive several event plays of the game. The expectation is that this initial obelisk will last long enough to help us afford a better experience in the future as well as earn us enough income to take time away from our regular jobs and focus it into this. 
  • Not only does the game bring a great experience to you, it can bring fun and adventure to any location.
  • If we don't reach our goal of $5500 but make it most of the way there, we will keep the funds and make the rest on our own dime with a small loan. If we land at under $3000 you will get your money back and we will cancel the campaign. 

How Can We Help?

What we are aiming to achieve with this is to bring people together by putting them up against challenges. Working together teams will learn to use communication and build trust.

We have been running specially themed events since 2013. Each of these events is a full story-backed once-in-a-lifetime experience full of games and activities that get people working together and making new friends. With your contribution we can continue doing that. Our events are very expensive to produce, and we lose a lot of money on them.

With your help our team can utilize the Obelisk to not only tell people about out events but earn an income that we can produce even better events with.

Risks & Challenges

We have a team of fantastic friends and acquaintances that have helped us to formulate the perfect plan for this game. We have designed it so that it can withstand any environment and is safe to operate.

Parts are easily replaceable so that we can experiment with new challenges, or replace broken ones.

It's made of durable materials and easy to transport.

To top it off, we will be putting all of our designs through with mechanical engineers who will pick apart and put together the perfect dimensions so that there won't be any room for error.

Other Ways You Can Help

Besides donating there are lot of incredible options that you have to help us succeed. Take a moment to support us by sharing this page, liking our video, or contacting us. You can ask us anything and we are always open to receiving input.

We need at least $5000 to pay for the materials and services to craft a sturdy enough obelisk to survive several event plays of the game. The expectation is that this initial obelisk will last long enough to help us afford a better experience in the future as well as earn us enough income to take time away from our regular jobs and focus it into this. 
Not only does the game bring a great experience to you, it can bring fun and adventure to any location.
If we don't reach our goal of $5500 but make it most of the way there, we will keep the funds and make the rest on our own dime with a small loan. If we land at under $3000 you will get your money back and we will cancel the campaign. 

How Can We Help?
What we are aiming to achieve with this is to bring people together by putting them up against challenges. Working together teams will learn to use communication and build trust.
We have been running specially themed events since 2013. Each of these events is a full story-backed once-in-a-lifetime experience full of games and activities that get people working together and making new friends. With your contribution we can continue doing that. Our events are very expensive to produce, and we lose a lot of money on them.
With your help our team can utilize the Obelisk to not only tell people about out events but earn an income that we can produce even better events with.

We have a team of fantastic friends and acquaintances that have helped us to formulate the perfect plan for this game. We have designed it so that it can withstand any environment and is safe to operate.
Parts are easily replaceable so that we can experiment with new challenges, or replace broken ones.
It's made of durable materials and easy to transport.
To top it off, we will be putting all of our designs through with mechanical engineers who will pick apart and put together the perfect dimensions so that there won't be any room for error.

Other Ways You Can Help
Besides donating there are lot of incredible options that you have to help us succeed. Take a moment to support us by sharing this page, liking our video, or contacting us. You can ask us anything and we are always open to receiving input.

story:
Short Summary

We believe that each city needs sufficient charging stations and especially important on the roads. We want not only to have a place where people can charge their cars with renewable energy, but also to have a national community with events, help, a cozy and safe place to recharge their cars. It has been our dream and we are excited to make this proyect a reality.
 

In the first stage we want the Dominican Republic to become the first nation in the Caribbean to have the largest network of electric vehicles with renewable energy, which are as affordable for the average of all families as 2021.

Every day we realize that the use of electric vehicles leads us to improve the air we breathe.

Stop climate change

 

To transform the world we have to start the change and take the step.

The National Climate Assessment in the US stated that, "climate change, once considered an issue for a distant future, has moved firmly into the present."

Stop air pollution by fossil fuels, a large reduction in asthma, lung cancer and many diseases caused and aggravated by air pollution. Also the destruction of the environment, the reduction of the emission of greenhouse gas.

We seek to raise awareness about the effects of the use of fossil fuels on the negative effects on the planet. and the reduction of the carbon footprint that would be recovered over time.

 

 

Goals

 

​

step by step I am sure that we will reach our goal and save our planet

  • Reduce to 45 % the use of gas vehicules  for 2021.
  •  Incresed the contamination.
  • In the  fisrt stage  we want eneable the Dominican Republic to become the first nation in the Caribbean to have the most bigguest network of charging  for vehicles that are as affordable for the average Dominican family  as 2020.
  • Turn cities into smart.

 

What we need

We need to raise  $1,000,000 to finace the purchase of charging station, solar panels, wich looks like a lot ( and it is)  but in reality it’s quite conservative. There are many factors to be considered and used for following in the infrastructure:

  • solar panels.
  • Energy storage.
  • Charge station level 3 and 2.
  • Shinping ( export and import).
  • Space rental.
  • Other miscellaneous expenses, includes tax  payment.

Every dollar that contributes financial here directly to the step to the acceleration to sustainable electric mobility.

 

Infrestructura model

the infrastructures model that we will design allows a clean charging point, without CO2 emissions and perjury with the environment

The solar panels are located in the roof that allow the cars to be loaded into the infrastructure.

Infrastructure inspiration: 

fastned is a German company which is the inspiration of the infraestrutura for this project

 

Challenges

  • promote the change to the use of renewable energies
  • Make possible transition to the use of electric vehicles.
  • Reduce CO2 emissions
  • have a network layers to supply the needs recharge cars with renewable energies.

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We need everyone to help us spread the word about this campaign!  Here are ways you could make this happen:

1. Share the IndieGoGo page on Facebook, Instagram & Twitter

2. "Like" our page on Facebook & Instagram: 
@Softnickrd

story:
*** UPDATE FEBRUARY 19th 2016 **

Thank you everyone for your donations and support. Unfortunately, the space for the proposed doggie day care has been acquired by another business. We will be refunding all donations today. WE NO LONGER ARE SEEKING FUNDING. Thanks again!!! 


Andre Lambert

Pee Poop Play

Owner

**********************************

The Story 


How did a passion for the arts, turn into a passion for dogs? The story of Pee Poop Play is quite amazing. My name is Andre Lambert, founder and owner of the Boston based dog walking company Pee Poop Play. A life long resident of Boston, I went from a student of the arts, to teacher of the arts. Somewhere along that journey, I got a dog; a decision that would eventually change everything. 

I now run a highly rated company that wants to give back to a community that has been so great to us! We value the relationships and enrichment involved with dog socialization. We are firm believers in the "power of community". PPP strives to be the magnet that brings this amazing doggie community together.



The Master Plan :)


From the beginning, the goal of Pee Poop Play has been to provide quality care and expert service to our clients. We have built and continue to build amazing relationships with our clients and their dogs. Our ultimate dream has been to open a doggie daycare. We want to extend our expertise and love for dogs to the community of Jamaica Plain and beyond. This doggie daycare will provide ample space for exercise, socialization and training. We believe these 3 things are the foundation for a healthy, balanced and happy dog. We like to make dogs HAPPY! Our goal is to lease and transform the old JP Variety Store into a state of the art facility for dogs. 

Your contribution to this project will help us to secure the lease and make the necessary improvements to the space. It will also help us reach out to the surrounding community of dog owners, trainers, artist, designers and animal advocates.

From left to right : Huxley, Homer & Cheetah



The Location 


Located on the corner of Rosemary and South st. The old JP Variety Store is vacant and up for lease. At 1,400+ square feet, this space would make an excellent daycare, and would also provide much needed services to Jamaica Plain and the surrounding neighborhoods. We believe Pee Poop Play would be a welcomed addition to the creative energy and eclectic spirt of JP. The community of Jamaica Plain also has Boston's highest concentration of dog owners. 




The current state of the space







The Funds 

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Lets Break it Down


Our goal is to raise $60,000 dollars. We believe this amount is necessary to complete the project. For this reason, we have chosen to elect 'Fixed Funding' for this campaign. If we are not able to raise 60K in the allotted time, all donations will be returned to our backers by Indiegogo. Pee Poop Play is fully committed to the vision. We don't believe in wasting time or resources. We are honored you took the time to hear our story. 
Here is what your contribution will help us achieve.


The rent for this building is $3,000 per month. To secure the lease we will need to pay first, last and security.  Total $9,000


This is the most important and time sensitive step for this project. This space is currently open for any business to make an offer. We have reached out to the building owners; they LOVE our idea and are rooting for us. However, until we can secure the lease, we are in competition with all interested parties. 


 

To fully utilize and maximize the impact of this great space, the interior and exterior design is critical. Below is the break down of  the proposed design budget.


ARCHITECT

This one is an absolute must; without one we can not secure the proper permits from the city. The architect will help us to properly and professionally draw out the interior renovation plans.


INTERIOR DESIGNER
 We want to maximize the space for both dogs and humans. We also want it to look cool :) An interior designer will help with furniture sourcing and layout. They will also help source the right materials for the overall look of the daycare. 

MURALIST 
This one is very close to our hearts. Art brings value and character to any space. We want the interior and exterior walls to be both inspiring and inviting to our neighbors and customers.

Assembling these experts will run us an estimated $7,000 



From dry wall and screws; to flooring, lighting and signage. There is no building with out them. The estimated cost for materials will be close to $8,000 





There is an old carpenters saying 'Measure twice, cut once'. Every second over our projected building schedule will cost us money. Hiring the right commercial contractor, electrician, and plumber will help us to reach our goal swiftly and safely. The cost of labor, pulling permits and being prepared for unexpected surprises is estimated to cost $30,000




 

It takes careful planning and coordination to get all the proper parts moving in unison. We anticipate it will take about 2 months for all construction and inspections to be complete. Rent however, waits for no one. With a two month rent cushion, it will ensure we reach our milestones with breathing room before we open for business. Cost, $6,000




-------------------------------------------------------------



THE VISION 


Examples of what the space could look like. While not the final design it gives a sense of how we plan to approach the project. 



An example of a well designed daycare interior



------------------------------------


- HOW WE SAY THANKS -


We deeply appreciate every donation to this campaign. From the smallest to the largest we want to honor you! If we meet our funding goals, we will install an etched glass panel with the names of every single donor. This panel will be hung and proudly displayed behind our counter for all to see. It will stand as a testament to the power of community! 


Here is an example of an etched glass donor panal




The Impact

At Pee Poop Play, we know first hand what proper socialization, exercise and training means to dogs. Sadly, with our busy schedules most people simply don't have the time to fully give their dogs these experiences. Instead, we leave our animals at home with no outlet. This eventually leads to bad behavior, bites and sometimes poor health. Owners lash out in frustration or end up giving their dogs away to over packed shelters. It doesn't have to be this way. Pee Poop Play wants to provide a space where dogs and their owners can build healthy, loving and lasting relationships. Your contribution makes a difference!



We know some people just can't contribute, and thats OK. That doesn't mean you can't help. If you believe in our mission, get the word out. Make some noise about our campaign. Use Indiegogo's share tools! Tell your doggie friends about us. Hey, you can even tell your cat friends, we don't discriminate :) We do however appreciate all the love and support!


THANK YOU SOOOOO MUCH!

Pee Poop Play :)

story:
About Us

My name is Eva Vega. I am the proud mom of a child with Autism (ASD) and the Founder of THYME and play. THYME and play is a social venture that focuses on creating sensory-friendly dining experiences for families who have members with special needs. THYME and play is looking to raise funds on this platform to transform our commercial building into a restaurant space. 

What is THYME and play?

Located in the heart of South Carolina, THYME and play will be an upscale, farm-to-table restaurant that specializes in sensory-friendly environments, allergy-sensitive menus, custom dining room, and play areas designed for children and adults with physical, mental, and cognitive disabilities. 
THYME and play has the potential to change the restaurant industry to be more inclusive to all people. Every donation made in support of this project will fund renovations, equipment, and adaptive spaces needed to turn this restaurant into a reality. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • Here is where we need the funds to go:
  • $15,000 will go to Adaptive Play Equipment:
  • $85,000 will help us out with building renovations
Because we want to show how much we really appreciate everyone who donates to our campaign, our team has put together a few perks to sweeten the deal. 
Sure we have simple things like stickers, T-shirts, and thank you notes, but it's the big perks that we are the most excited about. The $200 perk, $500 perk, and the $1000 perk are our special way to say THANK YOU for what you are doing. It is just our small gesture to HONOR you for believing in the idea and concept of THYME and play.

Why Should You Care?

According to current information from Census.gov and other reputable sources, 1 out of every 5 people living in America will have a disability, 1 in 45 will be labeled with Autism Spectrum Disorder, and 1 out of 3 people with Autism will suffer from isolation. 

Families with disabilities want a social outlet that is safe, and understanding, but that just isn't available right now where we live. The restaurant industry hasn't really prioritized the needs and wants of this specific target market. With your help, THYME and play will be afforded the opportunity to reach an under-served demographic and change the way the restaurant industry views children with disabilities. With every dollar donated, Thyme and play will get one step closer to real inclusivity, and disability awareness. 

What If We Don't Meet Our Goal?

This crowdfunding campaign will be combined with other fund-raising efforts to reach our end goal. If by chance our need is not met here, the money will go into a an account that will be used only to fund the development of this restaurant. We will continue to fundraise, bootstrap, and go door-to-door (if we have to), to make this restaurant concept a reality. 

Thank You!

This dream isn't possible without the love and support of people like you. We just want you to know that this means everything to us. Being Different is Ok, and you guys get it! Thank you for helping us help people like our son. We love you guys with all of our hearts and can't wait to make this happen with you! 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute monetarily and that is ok. Here is another way you can help THYME and play get started.

  • Like and Share our campaign on social media.
  • Follow us on Facebook or Twitter: THYME and Play /  @Thymeandplay 
  • Or just go to our website, read our blog, and be a part of our discussions. www.thymeandplay.com

story:
We all know the odds of winning a state lottery are astronomical. On January 12th of 2016 Wired.com released a post indicating that the odds of winning the lottery have gone from 1 in 175 million to 1 in 292 million. This made it easier to win low stake payouts such as ($1 & $2) and much harder to win the main jackpot.

Here's where community lottery steps in to better the odds for you becoming a winner:

How: By lowering the number of participants (community rather than state) and keeping a jackpot at an average amount the odds of winning are much greater.

Our goal & how it works: There are 30 days to reach the goal. At the end of those 30 days a donator like you will be randomly picked as the Jack pot winner for that month. (regardless if the goal is met.) This is not to make someone a millionaire overnight but to simply to help one random person every month with daily living expenses.

Winner: If you are the lucky winner you will be contacted by Community Lottery (C.L.) to discuss payment. If there's no response from the winner within five days a new winner will be announced.

Winnings: 80% of the total funds raised will go to the winner for that 30 days. 

Notable : For questions, concerns and more information please contact Community Lottery at Communitylotto@yahoo.com

story:
Menuo - nominalised as one of the best startups of 2016 by WebSummit Lisbon

Founding menuo you will get yourself a nice franchise business for pennies:

  • Each menu we digitalise is going to convert for you too.
  • You are going to offer this Planet a new chance to save the forests.
  • Everybody wins - Resturants gains flexibility - Users wins the power to check the menus from all the resturants all over the world live and up to date - Big companies will advertise through Menuo.

Thinking to donate for Menuo?

What We Need & What You Get

Besides asking you to check our awesome PERKS here's what is all about:

  • We are going to finish our app available for iOS and Android phones, our app will allow you to check in real time digitalised menus from all around the world. You will be able to place orders being sure the menu you see is the real one as is live connected to the ones from the restaurants.
  • You can contact us and we will give you a franchise so you can sell Menuo too, and that's how you are going to save some more trees!
  • You can gain up to 50% lifetime income paid by the restaurants for having Menuo.

The Impact

We worked hard to create a closed circle of benefits so everybody can win, from the resturants owner who is not going to pay so much for a menu and wait days for it to be ready to all the people around the world who are going to have the power to see and choose what they want to eat live in real time, without going to the place to check if there is any "pizza". But our first and most important goal is to save the forests.  

The much we digitalise the less forests will be destroyed. 

Risks & Challenges

What would be the risk? Not going viral? Impossible! We are already declared and invited as one of the best start-ups from 2016 by WebSummit Lisbon, we had been invited even in UK to sustain our cause and app development at Resturant Tech Live event. 

  • The greatest challange - to create a digital menu - internet independet.
  • The second greatest challange - finding funds to grow and get known and make sure our solution is going to be used by more and more restaurants all over the world.

Other Ways You Can Help

If there is any friend of yours looking for a great nice business, ask him to contact us and we will share him a nice opportunity. The chance to join Menuo as a franchise and start a new proffitable business in digitalising menus and saving the world.

story:
Hello, My name is Dawn , it is nice to meet you!

I have 20+ years experience working in the salon industry and 12+ years as a salon owner in NC. I am currently living in FL operating a cute litte online bookstore on Etsy, here is the link: https://www.etsy.com/shop/OldnewbooksShop?ref=s...

I would like to move back towards NC and purchase a bilevel home , putting a one chair hair studio in the basement and my bookstore in the garage. 

This will cost approximately 375,000.00 due to the fact, that I would like to pay cash upfront for the land and furnishings and tools and and all the other little details, utilities, cost of moving , etc. and still have a little cushion in the bank. I have a digital print of a painting I did called Lemons and it can be purchased here for $4.00 https://www.etsy.com/listing/930493093/lemons-d...

If 200,000.00 people would purchase one copy of my digital print, I will have enough money to make this happen and I would owe you no money as you would be getting a digital print in exchange for $4.00 and right now it is 50% off as well as all of my books.

Thair studio will attract clients who are not interested in harsh chemicals as there will be NO services for perms, color, or keratin treatments and only haircuts. Each hair cut will cost $15.00 for children, $18.00 for men, $22.00 for women wet cuts, $35.00 for women short hair with blow-dry and style, $45.00 for women with medium hair blow-dry and style, $55.00 for women with long thick hair with blow-dry and style.

This little hair studio will make an impact on the planet due to no waste, harsh chemicals, and no retail sales, as everything is avaialble online now and more cost effective to purchase online direct for clients than it is for salon owners to purchase and resale. This will be a Hair Cutting and Styling only studio.

There are no risks, the house, land will be paid for, I am really good at what I do and I love my job. Opertating a salon is almost effortless for me as well as maintaining a clientel.

Thank you for taking an interest in my business plan and please use the indegogo tools to bring me buyers!

story:
What is Yours Eternally?

I have taught and researched Death and Dying for decades. I am always amazed how resistant people are in talking about the topic and even more so, how ill prepared they are for an event that will definitely occur within our life time.

The news and my personal life are witness to the complications that occur when people die and are not prepared. The reasons are various: I can't afford it; Don't need to prepare yet; I'm young and strong and won't die for decades, and more. Yet, when I die, this service is not for me, but for my survivors, my loved ones.

Yours-Eternally.com (YE) is a full service web site addressing all Death & Dying issues. YE is a 2 tier membership service where individuals can have their own private site within YE.com and post information about themselves. YE also hopes to partner with a legal service to provide all relative documents needed by our members. Pictures and videos can be uploaded on your personal site for all to see.

A Premier level will provide members with a secure log in for their Digital Executors and close family to access with more personal information available.

Business Model:

- Target Age Group is 25 years and older
- 51-76% of the US population without proper legal documents
- An estimated 107 to 160 million people would find value in this service
- Annual $25 Standard or $50 Premier level memberships
- 1% of our target group = $32 million in annual memberships
- Plus 'A La Carte' Document fees
- Creates a new advertising platform for businesses providing death & dying services, such as Funeral Homes; Attorneys; Estate Planners; Financial Planners; Florists, etc.
- "Legacy Books" for families wishing to have a printed version of special family memoirs can be ordered.

The Impact

In the USA, 51% do not have wills; 76% do not have: Living wills; Power of Attorney; or Healthcare Directives.
- Your contribution will provide a needed and affordable service to educate everyone and help them create the important documents needed.
-Eliminate the fear of the unknown: Who will take care of me or my pet if my health fails? How can I be sure I am not relying on life-support machines for a long time? How can I be sure my special treasures are delivered to the intended persons? How do I find out what documents my state requires so my estate does not go into Probate Court? Learn what other religions and culture believe about death...and more!
- I get to say goodbye MY WAY!
- Most importantly, the benefit of knowing my family will be able to move forward as comfortably and quickly as possible.

What we need and what you get:

Our Goal of $115,000 is to:
-  $10,000 - develop a web interface prototype
-  $70,000 - develop a complete interactive/individual and secure web site
-  $35,000 - provide initial research and development

Donor Perks:
-  Supporters of $1,000 and over will have private limited access to the site before it is publicly launched and be invited to offer recommendations to improve the site's services. This level also offers lifetime Premier Level Memberships to the individual and their immediate family members and will be listed on the 'Gratitude Board' of the site.
-  Supporters of $500 - $999 will receive lifetime Premier Level memberships for the individual and their immediate family members and will be listed on the 'Gratitude Board' of the site.
-  Supporters of $100 - $499 will receive lifetime Standard Level Memberships for the individual and their immediate family members and will be listed on the 'Gratitude Board' of the site.
- Supporters of $25 - $99 will receive lifetime Standard Level Membership for the individual and will be listed on the 'Gratitude Board' of the site.


The Challenge:

We've done the research: There is no other company or site out there providing this needed service. Creating and building a web site service like Yours-Eternally.com is the simplest step of the process. The most challenging component is getting the word out that this service is available. Advertising is expensive and that's where YOU come in! Sharing this new endeavor with your family and friends is the first step to making this service a realty.

Remember to please use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you for exploring this new service and sharing!

story:
In cooperation with the Dutch potorchid growers, in which more than 40 growers are united,  an international campaign for the pot Orchid has started under the name 'Art of Life'. Producers have joined forces to inspire and inform consumers and retailers about the versatility of and applications with orchids. The campaign takes place in the Netherlands, Germany, United Kingdom, France and Northern Italy and aims to perpetuate the current image of the pot Orchid, or to optimize. Central message is: Orchids make it in an easy way special !

The Orchid is one of the most exclusive plants in the world and is known by most people. In order to keep the exclusive imago of the orchid, the famous Dutch designer François Hannes designed the Orchid Twister® at the request of Art of Life.

A new and exclusive interior accessory inspired on the orchid. The Orchid Twister® is flexible to use, can place five pots and is available in five different colors.

Through the use of pots in different shapes, colors and sizes the Orchid Twister® looks different everytime. Also by choosing the right orchid for you creates a unique atmosphere. Sleek and serene white, to lush and hot pink red, the orchid of your choice will be in combination with the Orchid Twister® an eye-cathcher in your interior. Would you like less orchids in it ? That is also possible ! The remaining spots can be filled with, for example, a beautiful peace of art.

Measurements

The Orchid Twister® is 103cm high and 60 cm wide (potsize 12cm). A true eye-catcher in your interior.

Weight

Aprox. 8 kg

Materials

For the Orchid Twister® we only use the finest French Oak, Belgian Bluestone and Stainless steel. All crafted by hand !!

Choice of color

1: Smoked stain


2: White gloss


3: Natural stain


4: Piano black gloss


5: Champagne/bronze satin

Belgian bluestone


On the Rotterdam Excellent Live & Life fair François Hannes unveiled the Orchid Twister®, a whatnot specially for the orchid. But usable for various purposes !

"The Orchid Twister® fits in any kind of space, and ensures that orchids can be put down at home in a special way. Almost everybody has one or more Orchids at home, but with the Orchid Twister® they come even more particularly out in the interior, "says Hannes. At the fair he shows a where 'masterpiece' in wich all five Orchid Twisters form the basis. His 'masterpiece' is a one off a kind and is only to be admired on the Rotterdam home fair. This modern interior accessory is available in five colors, of oak stained piano finish to black and white gloss. The Orchid Twister® can be personalized in a creative way. There are plenty of combinations possible with the adjustable form, and a great diversity of pots, accessories and orchids. Retrieves François Hannes even more nature inside, what a surprising picture.

About François Hannes

François Hannes is passionate and driven by beauty. He loves the good burgundian lifestyle. The tranquility of a landscape, nature, but also the dynamics of a metropole are things that inspire and trigger him. No compromises, but rather the extremes are what he strives for. These ingredients are always present in his work. His designs are well balanced, serene and flow in a natural way. However, his designs always have exciting or daring details to assure that all interiors intrigue and stay interesting.

His style in design is being recognized and appraised by a growing audience, both national and international.

His creativity, no-nonsense attitude, drive and constructural knowledge make him a designer who can compete with the top.

The Orchid

Source of inspiration for many of dresses, hats, shoes and interior design. Do you think the Orchid is inspiring ? Then you're certainly not the only one ! Various designers, from, for example, the fashion and design world, the orchid is a muse. Rightly so, if you ask us ! We have three other special designs for you.

Dutch fashion designer Jan Taminiau:

Jan Taminiau, one of the most famous designers in the Benelux, based a collection on this beautiful Bloomer. Jan has a great love for traditional production techiques, and antique materials and is always looking for correct shape and fashionable sophistication. About the Orchid he says: Orchids are just as fascinating as the women who come in my studio". He follows the colors of the Orchid, the veinlike structures and tones.

Fashion designer Philip Treacy:

Top designer Philip Treacy, a world famous hat designer, had designed the Orchid Hat collection. A collection of three hats, inspired by the orchid. He finds the flowers of the Orchid "the ultimate in beauty and elegance" and says that "the Orchid takes you to another world".

Shoe designer Jan Jansen:

Also for shoes can be the flower of the Orchid  a source of inspiration. Now take the super sexy Orchid shoe by Jan Jansen. Jan tells us how the Orchid inspired him: "the Orchid has always fascinated me and when i heard of an Orchid species with the nickname Venus shoe, i just had to design a shoe inspired by these elegant flower".

story:
Delivering the sweet life, straight to your door!

You know that feeling you get when you walk into a bakery, and you see all the selection and variety of sweets? Only desserts can bring out the inner-kid in you and get you excited!

And that's the goal of Bakers Krate! To bring that feeling straight to your door every month!

Every month we curate a variety of desserts made by local bakeries in our home town of Winnipeg Manitoba. They're packaged in our warehouse, and they're sent to you fresh!

How does it work?

Okay, we know what you're all asking, what's in the damn box?

Pictures By "A Year of Boxes" Blog

Bakers Krate Also makes a great gift!

We know, sending gifts like chocolates, flowers, fruit, and treats can be pretty pricey.

*Price Ranges based on multiple selections of similar products

Don't get me wrong, putting in money to give a grand gift isn't a bad thing, but being generous doesn't always have to mean hurting your wallet.

Why not give them the gift of Bakers Krate? Bakers Krate is going to be only $19.99 CAD plus $12.99 CAD shipping for U.S. residents (Note: last time I checked is equivalent to $23.67 USD!). With the money you save, you can get a little something for yourself as well!

What people are saying about us.

For half a year we've been sending boxes of baked goods to hungry subscribers across Canada. So what's the purpose of this campaign?

People in the food industry know, that sending food across the border is a real pain in the fanny.

So that's why we need your help! We'll use the funds from this project to obtain all requirements needed to get past the border, and to also help improve our shipping process, our website, our box itself, and our marketing. We also want to make sure that we don't have to increase the product cost for the consumer, so that it stays affordable! We have teams of bakeries, courier people, and downright hard workers ready to go once this ship is ready to sail!

Perks


A little about the business.

Opening a bakery is tough. You have to keep track of every piece of inventory down to the last grain of sugar. But every time we had a dessert from a local bakery, we could taste the love and the hard work that was put into that little pastry. We could taste the blood, sweat and tears it took... (scratch that, that sounds unsanitary).. But you get what I mean!

What really drove us to start this business was to support these local bakeries that work so hard to make quality desserts. The support isn't only coming from us the company, but it's also coming from each and every subscriber. By subscribing to Bakers Krate, you join a community that loves desserts, a community that is supporting the bakeries that make the desserts that we love and enjoy.

And sharing their delicious works with the wonderful citizens of U.S.A. is something we're motivated to pursue! So join us on this sweet journey, and let's spread the word about the sweet life!

story:
About the project

Ever wanted to go out with your friends to a restaurant or a café, to watch your favourite e-sports team win the championships? And while doing so be immersed in the same world of your favourite video game?

 We are two regular gamers who go by the names of Arthur and Intars and who want to bring this kind of experience to you! While working as cooks and chefs in the food industry for several years, we also have been passionate gamers. Our dream is to bring these two worlds together so we could enjoy the best of both.

Cafe / Restaurant Side Quest will be based in Riga, Latvia. If you are a foreigner, why should you care? Well starting off, this will give you a great incentive to visit our beautiful country, although you probably never heard about it before. But mostly the success of this project might inspire people around the world to start up similar businesses. E-sports and gaming industry in general ar growing and growing fast. It is only natural we take a part in it. There are so many sports bars but almost none cover e-sports, so lets change this together!

The money we need wont cover all of the expenses, but it sure will show potential investors that people are interested in this kind of establishment. Of course we do want to be as independent as possible, so every bit that is contributed above the asking goal, is a step closer to independency. It will allow us to truly fulfill our own vision.

 

About the concept

Idea is to bring parts of gaming worlds to life in our café / restaurant. A place where you could boast about your virtual conquests with tankard full of ale in your hand or chances are your favourite e-sports team is competing in championships and you want to watch them play with your friends in a place that has this great fantasy atmosphere. Place that resembles those famous inns you have visited in your virtual travels, like Lion's Pride Inn in Goldshire or one of those taverns in the Witcher universe.

Foods and drinks will be inspired by videogames. Looks, ingredients and names will closely resemble the things you have seen and experienced behind the screen, but this time it will be a reality. Now you can finally have a taste of the infamous sweetroll, just be careful because somebody might steal it! Or if you're thirsty try on of our cocktail potions or some really nice locally brewed ale.

 

Our version of lembas bread.

 

Remember buzzard wings form your travels in Azeroth?

 

Or maybe Kaldorei Spider Kabob?

 

Interior of our restaurant will be themed like a medieval tavern with a touch of fantasy.

Concept picture taken from: artstation.com

    

 

About funding and perks

Money we need will act more as a proof for our creditors or investors, that we have starting capital and potential clients. They need to see that people are interested in this kind of project.

Of course these will mean that we can't really be independent, but every cent we go above, will be a step towards more independent business model. So even if a miracle happens and we will manage to reach the goal, we encourage you to keep contributing so we could keep improving this project.

All contributions will of course go towards regular expenses of a restaurant - rent, bills, equipment etc.

For encouragement we have added several interesting perks to the contributors. You can see them below.

 

 

If we won't reach our goal, contributed amount will still be used as starting capital to start this project and all the claimed perks will be fulfilled.

In case you are an investor feel free to contact us at intars.abols.91@gmail.com

 

 About the team and how it became to be 

For a long time both of us have been passionate gamers. Hours upon hours spent, immersing ourselves in these vast worlds. Meanwhile we had another passion - cooking.

So here is experience of our team this far:

Full name: Intars Abols

Age: 26

About me: In pretty short time I have climbed from very bottom to almost very top of the industry. Peak for me would be to run and cook in my own establishment. 

I do have a degree in culinary school. I started to work in kitchens about six years ago, starting out just as a kitchen hand in one of the best restaurants in town. As a quick learner I fought my way trough. Couple of years later I took part in opening of a new restaurant filled with cats. Was my first major gig working as head chef and the project was a major success. At the moment I am working as a sous chef at restaurant in Middlesbrough, UK gathering more knowledge every day! :)

Full name: Arturs Bruško

Age: 26

About me: During the time of my bachelor degree studies I picked up great organizational skills. This skills gave me a chance to lead and organize the whole breakfast crew during my internship in four star hotel. After I got my degree in culinary, my life set me a different path, I become supervisor of a printing company. That was the thriving place of my organizing skills. A little further down the road I remembered my dream to build a restaurant. So here I am.

While doing our own things, we often had several brainstorming sessions on how to leave our own mark in the industry. We decided to merge our two passions together. With connections made along the way, we have covered most of the business angles except for funds. And this is where you guys come in. Lets join our efforts to make something great together!

 

About Risks & Challenges

Tourism and restaurant business is risky due to the fact that it is dependant on seasonality. Chances are we will be booked full during summer time and chances are tables will be empty during winter. Or vice versa. There will be surges and declines in revenue. Money we will rise with our campaign will gives a form of safety net when things get rough.

We are prepared for loan, but the success of this campaign will show us if this is something that people really want and/or need.

We do have a lot of experience in the industry, with taking part in some very successful projects over the years, but handling our own business is something new. Still we do feel perfectly situated to run and even become successful business owners. Along the way we have made great friendships and connections. People of various qualifications starting from passionate cooks up to successful entrepreneurs, all being eager to contribute with advice and guidance on this new path.

Intars:

For me this feels like a natural step towards my self growth as a chef. To take pride in something I have built up from scratch. All the past experience in cooking, leadership etc. is being poured in to this project.

 

Arthur:

I tend to give the best out of myself. This would be a great way for me to progress and do something new to perfect my skill at it. Creating a restaurant will be though, but I have experience in business, starting from scratch, and have managed an e-sport bar that is a good experience in our goal.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign and follow our pages on social networks:

to keep up with all the updates on the projects development!

All contributions will of course go towards regular expenses of a restaurant - rent, bills, equipment etc.
For encouragement we have added several interesting perks to the contributors. You can see them below.
 

 
If we won't reach our goal, contributed amount will still be used as starting capital to start this project and all the claimed perks will be fulfilled.
In case you are an investor feel free to contact us at intars.abols.91@gmail.com
 
 About the team and how it became to be For a long time both of us have been passionate gamers. Hours upon hours spent, immersing ourselves in these vast worlds. Meanwhile we had another passion - cooking.So here is experience of our team this far:Full name: Intars AbolsAge: 26About me: In pretty short time I have climbed from very bottom to almost very top of the industry. Peak for me would be to run and cook in my own establishment. I do have a degree in culinary school. I started to work in kitchens about six years ago, starting out just as a kitchen hand in one of the best restaurants in town. As a quick learner I fought my way trough. Couple of years later I took part in opening of a new restaurant filled with cats. Was my first major gig working as head chef and the project was a major success. At the moment I am working as a sous chef at restaurant in Middlesbrough, UK gathering more knowledge every day! :)Full name: Arturs BruškoAge: 26About me: During the time of my bachelor degree studies I picked up great organizational skills. This skills gave me a chance to lead and organize the whole breakfast crew during my internship in four star hotel. After I got my degree in culinary, my life set me a different path, I become supervisor of a printing company. That was the thriving place of my organizing skills. A little further down the road I remembered my dream to build a restaurant. So here I am.While doing our own things, we often had several brainstorming sessions on how to leave our own mark in the industry. We decided to merge our two passions together. With connections made along the way, we have covered most of the business angles except for funds. And this is where you guys come in. Lets join our efforts to make something great together!  About Risks & Challenges  Tourism and restaurant business is risky due to the fact that it is dependant on seasonality. Chances are we will be booked full during summer time and chances are tables will be empty during winter. Or vice versa. There will be surges and declines in revenue. Money we will rise with our campaign will gives a form of safety net when things get rough.We are prepared for loan, but the success of this campaign will show us if this is something that people really want and/or need.We do have a lot of experience in the industry, with taking part in some very successful projects over the years, but handling our own business is something new. Still we do feel perfectly situated to run and even become successful business owners. Along the way we have made great friendships and connections. People of various qualifications starting from passionate cooks up to successful entrepreneurs, all being eager to contribute with advice and guidance on this new path.Intars:For me this feels like a natural step towards my self growth as a chef. To take pride in something I have built up from scratch. All the past experience in cooking, leadership etc. is being poured in to this project. Arthur:I tend to give the best out of myself. This would be a great way for me to progress and do something new to perfect my skill at it. Creating a restaurant will be though, but I have experience in business, starting from scratch, and have managed an e-sport bar that is a good experience in our goal.  Other Ways You Can Help  Please share this campaign and follow our pages on social networks:       to keep up with all the updates on the projects development!

story:
Founder and Director: Emmanuel Dushimirimana

My name is Emmanuel, I lost my parents by the genocide in Rwanda when he was only 2 weeks old. I grew up at Noel Nyundo Orphanage, which was closed in 2012. At that time I was in Secondary 3, but without the financial support of the orphanage, I was not able to finish my education. Now I earns money by making and selling paintings, photographs. I used to live with an elderly woman who adopted me, but no longer any more.

 When I find out that most of our community and poor families cannot offer the young orphans a place to stay, I decided to help them and establish a sponsorship program for children and poor women.

 

 

 

Project name: Kunda village independent economic workshop

I have a big project, named KUNDA VILLAGE MINISTRY for helping the orphanage children, but this is the expended version of the project for the whole community. So what I want to introduce now, is this independent economic workshop project, by helping the poor women to run their own bag store.

This program was started by EMMANUEL DYLAN the owner and founder of KUNDA VILLAGE MINISTRY (NGO), In this project, we help women to sell their baskets, shoulder bags, clothes and wax print so that they can earn money for developing their homes, daily life and send their kids to school. Extra benefits will be provided as school fees for children who doesn’t have sponsors to join school.

 

>> I want to help our community because I know the struggle of growing up without parents and also I received help from our community. It's the best feeling when I see their happiness and thankful smiles. <<

 

 

 

How the price and benefits goes:

Shipping will cost depend on the weight, from $15 to $35, and for the fabric $5, and for extra benefits will go to women,

If there is more extra, it will go to children without sponsorship, pay for the rent fee for the store, and for making more bags for the later days so she can continue her store.

And that means you will help women to work in the bag store continually instead of going to D.R.C (Democratic Republic of Congo) for looking money to feed family. It is not safe for them wandering around the border.

 

 

 

About the worker:

Her name is Albertine, I met her through connecting sponsorship for child.

She had only one room for a living, it was not enough even though she get the sponsorship for the child, and she was also going to D.R.C (Democratic Republic of Congo) for the money.

At first, Andres donated the first sewing machine and some fabrics so I came up with the idea of bag store. I helped her open up the place, and thankfully Pamela, my friend taught her how to make a bag. So until now, we are keeping the store, but we cannot sell many since the benefits comes only from the volunteers who visit here, and some online order at Facebook.

 

 

YOU CAN ALSO DONATE ONE SEWING MACHINE:

We are sure if you donate for one sewing machine you will be supporting one child to go to school and giving two children school materials through making bags and more things to sell them for this community. Including Albertine, one more machine can make one more women work on sewing every day to make money for child and support two children to have school materials.

 

 

More things you can do:

Even though you cannot donate for our project, you can share our idea on Facebook, or ask for any other helps of different kind to me, EMMANUEL. In here, there is so much things to be done yet!

 

Donation for orphanage children: https://kunda-village-ministry.jimdo.com/

Facebook page for orphanage children: https://web.facebook.com/kundavillage/?ref=nf&a...

For more information: https://web.facebook.com/emmanueldushimiriman?f...

story:
Hi,
     My name is Jay Tovar and I am the founder of Cinematic Adventures. As a San Diegan, I often found myself trying to figure out which form of entertainment I would love to be a part of next. I remember wondering how I could experience a different part of San Diego while also having a fun time with my friends and feel more connected to my community. The county, as I know it, is a very diverse place and it’s where I spent most of my life. I have enjoyed seeing the different cultures in every city around San Diego and I believe that Cinematic Adventures will be an exciting addition to the nightlife around the county.

 In 2011 I began event coordinating as a senior at Vista High School. As the Executive Secretary, I hosted themed events that raised money for every club on campus several times a year. In 2013 I began to work on short films and found my passion for storytelling. I continued to produced projects in school and after graduating from Palomar College in 2015, I transferred to California State University, Northridge. I was accepted into a competitive film production program where I have used my education to focus on producing. The highlight of my education began this year as I produced a short film that cost nearly twenty-five thousand to make. My most current work involves managing and event coordinating for a J.Crew retail store. 

In the two short years that I’ve lived in Los Angeles, there have been many experiences I will never forget, and Cinematic Adventures is an experience I am fortunate to share with you. You might be wondering what exactly Cinematic Adventures is and how it will help the community. What our company hopes to accomplish is stimulate the community and explore different parts of the county. We are providing San Diego with an opportunity to taste an array of great foods from local vendors that have worked hard to build their business in the very city we host events in. It is also an occasion for artisans and local businesses to take part in our event as well, to show off their work. Since we will be in a new city every Saturday, a part of our plan is to offer sponsorship and partnership packages to vendors and small businesses who want to reach a new audience. While our events will begin in the evenings, attendees will have the leisure to pick a spot on the field, relax, get to know locals, enjoy food and finish their night with a movie exhibition.

Our vision is to host fundraisers for local clubs, schools, college programs, fraternities, and sororities. We are dedicated to giving back and plan to raise funds for numerous foundations and scholarships that best represent our community. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

We are trying to achieving our goal to highlight the value of each community we host events in. Our goal of $55,000 will fund part of our first season
Your contribution goes directly toward 

AIRSCREEN Package 

  • AIRSCREEN® 40’ - For 1,200 to 2,000 people. 40′ x 22′
  • Movie Projector - Christie DWU951-Q
  • Sound - QSC K12 Powered Speaker System + QSC KSub Powered Subwoofers
  • Accessories and Documentation
    • High-pressure blower
    • Mic with Comprehensive Touring Series XLR cable
    • Stakes, tethers, and sledgehammer
    • AIRSCREEN® operators manual
    • Manuals for all included components
    • Training (in-house and online)

LLC costs/ Tax

  • LegalZoom (one-time cost)
  • IRS Tax Fee 

Special Event Permits + City Licensing/DBA costs

  • Permits costs for the first 8 events    

Marketing

  • Website - Square Space
  • Graphic Design - TailorBrands (one-time cost)
  • Social Media Outreach - Facebook, Twitter, Instagram Promotions

Sponsorship Packages

  • Presentation Folders 
    • Business Card - For direct contact with business matters
    • 11”x17” - Cinematic Adventures Calendar
    • Password to DropBox with C.A. logo for your website to promote
    • Sponsor representation on our website
    • Window Decal - “official sponsor of Cinematic Adventures”
  • Package Breakdown Flyer (1 month, 4 months, 8 months) 
    • Mesh Banner or Flag (depending on package) - represented at each event 
    • Table Tents (depending on business and Package)
    • 3.75”x8.25” Flyers (amount dependant on Business and Package)


The Impact
   Your contribution to this project helps young entrepreneurs build a foundation for their future. Our company will highlight local businesses, drive traffic to different areas around the county, host fundraisers, and donate to foundations and scholarships. We are giving back to a community that has helped us begin our Cinematic Adventure. A service built by the community, for the community. 


Risks & Challenges
           As any crowdfunding campaign, there is the possibility that we may not obtain the full amount we are hoping to achieve. IF we are in a position where we must budget for a smaller event (or even fewer events), then we will make sure to use the money for marketing and carrying through with the first couple events. 
         With the producing experience and event coordinating knowledge I have, there is always a way to work things out. I believe that no matter what the outcome is, we will fulfill our goals and achieve the best for Cinematic Adventures. We will rent our equipment for the time length of time it would be necessary to raise enough funds to get a professional screen. In our first month of promoting this campaign, we are going to contact journalists from local newspapers, news stations and even radio hosts to possibly report on our company.  


Other Ways You Can Help
          We appreciate your contributions, both small and large. Everything helps! Please share our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools to post on your social media or send to your contact list. Help your community by spreading the word about a new business coming to San Diego that is ready to bring everyone a better form of weekend entertainment.

story:
Hello my name is Tord. 

Our house (Villa) is in need of renovating so we can help more children and youths, hopefully be able to expand from the current four, to a total of eight clients.

Fact: In Sweden we currently have fairly huge problems whit many young people who have lived a hard life, mostly outside of society. Also whit youths who come from countries like Syria with a civil war, close to many serious problems. Youths that have all lived a hard life outside a society that all too often failed them in almost every way.

Short how it works: After an investigation, our Social services place the young people in an approved stable family home, where they can live without drama, problems or risk of negligence or abuse, and where they around the clock have access to adequate help and support and our home is such a home.

We see that they youth behave, learn to eat at fixed times, don’t use drugs etz. That he or she goes to and home directly from school, take care of homework and anything else they often may need social guidance with. Like learning to cook, make the bed, wash clothes and learn to take care and responsibility of their health and their own life, and other things that we sometimes take for granted that everyone know. 

I get paid, of course, but just so that it goes around, not improve. Hence, I hope you can help me to help more. Primary we need to renovate our two smaller bedrooms,  also get our two bathrooms remodel so every sex has a own space without creating any friction. 

Any small help is highly appreciated.

Thanks all and you have a great day.

Cincerely yours.. / Tord

story:
No chemical fertilizer, pesticide

You are deserved a whole tea leaf

Over the years, best imprssion quality handiwork

Bran new style-Longan Flower 

Bring the tea bag with cold or hot brew

Our innovation and vision reach extender predominantly

Unrivalled "SUN BRIGHT TEA"

Introduction

 

 

ITQI

 

Q&A

Q1 / Are we through international transport?
A1 / Yes, we are international transport.

Q2 / What is brewing time?
A2 / Brew for 3 to 4 minutes, and make it 2 to 3 times.

Q3 / Is it good milk?
A3 / Yes, but always best tea no adding milk.

Q4 / What is the ingredient?
A4 / Tea leaf and longan fruit flower.

Q5 / Where is the tea stored after opening?
A5 / Store it in sealed can or tea jar.

Q6 / How many tea bags in one package?
A6 / One package has 10 tea bags.

Want to know more, please EMAIL US
