story:
Thank You so much in advance for checking out our IndeiGoGo Campaign! 

All of your support is greatly appreciated!

You can find us at www.wowboxme.com 

Or Instagram profile @WowBoxMe or via hashtag #wowboxme

WATCH OUR INTRODUCTORY VIDEO:

 

Why We Invented WowBoxMe

We are WowBoxMe a small team of 6 people, having worked in retail for a combined 54 years we noticed smaller producers were making amazing products which never made it to everyone. People were simply unable to fall in love with these incredible products.

Due to huge budgets from large corporations we are surrounded by the same average quality products day in day out! Coke, cola soda and more coke right?

We want you to experience some of the freshest, innovative and emerging food, snacks and drinks. We want your voice to be heard and for you to assist creating a buzz around a new product or one that needs a push!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

How It Works

WowBoxMe will curate and deliver a surprise selection of new, innovative and emerging products from unique brands every month.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Try the surprise products and give us your feedback by reviewing them online. The review process is easy, requiring you to simply rate the product from 1 to 5.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your feedback gives you £5 to redeem in our reward store and we’ll send those EXTRA products in your next WowBox.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The WowBoxMe Dashboard Video:

The video below is a platform walk through showing you how to navigate your user area, get points and build and customise your box!

                                              

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your Contribution

The contribution you make will enable you to experience that WOW feeling when you discover something new. We handpick and curate a box with or without alcoholic items and deliver them direct to your door.

The new and emerging products out there are made with love and care will get a new engaged customer and well you get to eat and drink amazing things! (Win:Win right?)

Your money will be used to buy these products, pack them and get them delivered through Yodel to your door, we want to use the funding to simply provide you amazing food, snacks and drinks so please contribute to receive a WowBox.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

User Review

Watch one of happy subscribers open her box live on camera!

This was November (2016) WowBox opened by a user:

     

    ---------------------------------------------------------

    Other Ways You Can Help

    No worries if you cannot contribute right now, we know sometimes it is hard but please do support us by simply sharing us on your social media accounts, Tweeting, or just liking our FB page as this could be the main turning point of this whole thing and can help us so much more than you would imagine. 

    So please do share our campaign with anyone who you think would love a WowBox

    Follow / Like us:

    Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wowboxme/

    Twitter: https://twitter.com/wowboxme

    Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wowboxme/

    We, all of us here at WowBoxMe, want to thank You in advance for helping us kickstart and support this project!

    Love You all ❤️
story_txt:
Thank You so much in advance for checking out our IndeiGoGo Campaign! 
All of your support is greatly appreciated!
You can find us at www.wowboxme.com 
Or Instagram profile @WowBoxMe or via hashtag #wowboxme

WATCH OUR INTRODUCTORY VIDEO:

 
Why We Invented WowBoxMe
We are WowBoxMe a small team of 6 people, having worked in retail for a combined 54 years we noticed smaller producers were making amazing products which never made it to everyone. People were simply unable to fall in love with these incredible products.
Due to huge budgets from large corporations we are surrounded by the same average quality products day in day out! Coke, cola soda and more coke right?
We want you to experience some of the freshest, innovative and emerging food, snacks and drinks. We want your voice to be heard and for you to assist creating a buzz around a new product or one that needs a push!

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How It Works

WowBoxMe will curate and deliver a surprise selection of new, innovative and emerging products from unique brands every month.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Try the surprise products and give us your feedback by reviewing them online. The review process is easy, requiring you to simply rate the product from 1 to 5.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your feedback gives you £5 to redeem in our reward store and we’ll send those EXTRA products in your next WowBox.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The WowBoxMe Dashboard Video:
The video below is a platform walk through showing you how to navigate your user area, get points and build and customise your box!
                                              

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your Contribution
The contribution you make will enable you to experience that WOW feeling when you discover something new. We handpick and curate a box with or without alcoholic items and deliver them direct to your door.
The new and emerging products out there are made with love and care will get a new engaged customer and well you get to eat and drink amazing things! (Win:Win right?)
Your money will be used to buy these products, pack them and get them delivered through Yodel to your door, we want to use the funding to simply provide you amazing food, snacks and drinks so please contribute to receive a WowBox.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

User Review
Watch one of happy subscribers open her box live on camera!
This was November (2016) WowBox opened by a user:


 
---------------------------------------------------------
Other Ways You Can Help
No worries if you cannot contribute right now, we know sometimes it is hard but please do support us by simply sharing us on your social media accounts, Tweeting, or just liking our FB page as this could be the main turning point of this whole thing and can help us so much more than you would imagine. 
So please do share our campaign with anyone who you think would love a WowBox
Follow / Like us:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/wowboxme/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/wowboxme
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/wowboxme/
We, all of us here at WowBoxMe, want to thank You in advance for helping us kickstart and support this project!
Love You all ❤️

story:
About us

My name is Nikola Barbarić and I am a fitness coach. Two years ago I opened a field hockey club, first of a kind in Dalmatia and in any marine town in Europe. It all started in our sport school for children where we teach children various sports. Among them, we decided to play hockey with them. I was very interested in sport so I started to study rules and techniques. I called Croatian Hockey Alliance and their director, mister Slaven Zlatar, invited me at hockey couches seminar. I came back in my home town with a certificate and opened a hockey club.


Our beginings

A lot of people laughed and said that it won't work because in Dalmatia people don't know about hockey and there never existed a club. Little by little, they started to gather. First players started to gather their friends and family . We were thirty very soon and we started to leave a visible mark. We organized a first hockey match in Split after 36 years (the last one was at Meditteranian games in Split), we won third place at international tournament in Poreč and fifth place at Zlatar memorial in Zagreb, we brought Croatian National Hockey Cup in Split.


Media

The media enthusiastically accompanied us so that newspapers and internet portals were full of articles about hockey players. More than ever, hockey found it's place in media.

Twinning project in Netherlands

Hockey story from Dalmatia


Our current projects and plans

I have just returned from Netherlands where I have been with coach Luka Androja. We went there to learn more about hockey techniques and to learn more how to manage a club. People from Oosterbeek nad England came to our town to have a hockey course for nine young trainers. We have a support of very large amount of people so we already have a fan group who have their song and a transparent. We want to promote a hockey in Dalmatia, we want to inspire people to play hockey and to open a hockey club so that we have opponents to play against. We also want to start a group  for children with Down Syndrom and for woman.


Problems we deal with

Problem is that we don't have an adequate place for trainig, neither indoor, neither outdoor. We don't have an opponents to play against if we don't travel which we are not in financial possibility. We don't have our Clubhouse, nor a hockey pitch where we can play nor a specific hockey equipment necessary to play with. We need money to rent a place and turn it into our clubhouse, a place for socializing and fun, to set a hockey pitch, to buy an equipment and to travel to competitions.


Necessary amount of money

We need 15000 $ that we would use for:

·  Annual rent of a place: 3000 $

·  Electricity installation: 1500 $

·  Water installation: 1500 $

·  Renewal of walls, ceiling and floor: 1500 $

·  Bathrooms with showers; 1500 $

·  Furniture: 750 $

·  Sports equipment; 750 $

·  Electronic equipment: 750 $

·  Buying a van: 3750 $

Other ways you can help

If you are not in possibility to help us financially, there are other ways to help. You can share this campaign with your friends and family so that more people hear about it.

Let's bring hockey in Dalmatia together!



Hrvatska verzija: 


O nama

Moje ime je Nikola Barbarić i po struci sam viši kondicijski trener. Prije dvije godine otvorio sam klub hokeja na travi, prvi takav klub u Dalmaciji i uopće u nekom primorskom gradu u Europi. Sve je počelo u našoj univerzalnoj sportskoj školi gdje s djecom treniramo petnaestak sportova. Jednog smo dana pokušali zaigrati hokej. Sam sport izrazito me je zainteresirao te sam počeo proučavati pravila i tehnike. Nazvao sam Hrvatski hokej savez, čiji me je direktor, gospodin Slaven Zlatar, oduševljen pozivom s mora, pozvao na seminar za hokej trenere u Zagreb. Završio sam seminar, vratio se u svoj rodni kraj s diplomom u ruci te otvorio prvi klub hokeja na travi.

Početci našega kluba

Mnogi su mi se smijali i govorili da to neće ići jer ljudi u Dalmaciji ne znaju za hokej jer nikada nije postajao niti jedan hokej klub. Malo po malo, ipak su se počeli okupljati. Svi novi članovi počeli su okupljati svoje prijatelje, kumove, rođake, braću itd. Skupilo nas se tridesetak i ubrzo smo počeli ostavljati vidljiv trag. Organizirali smo prvu hokej utakmicu u Splitu nakon 36 godina (zadnja je bila na Mediteranskim igrama u Splitu), osvojili treće mjesto na međunarodnom turniru u Poreču, peto mjesto na Zlatarovom turniru u Zagrebu, doveli Hokej Kup Republike Hrvatske u Split.

Mediji

Mediji su nas oduševljeno popratili te su novine i portali bili puni članaka o novopečenim hokejašima, više puta u ovih godinu dana, nego je hokej u Republici Hrvatskoj imao medijskog prostora ikad.

Trenutni projekti  i planovi našega kluba

Nedavno sam bio, zajedno sa trenerom Lukom Androjom, na putovanju u Nizozmskoj, na razmjernu iskustava  s hokej klubom u Oosterbeeku. Također su ljudi iz Oosterbeeka i Engleske došli u Hrvatsku, u Split, podučiti nas tehnikama i držanju hokeja treninga.  Devet mladih momaka položilo je tečaj za hokej trenere, u Hrvatsku su došli vodeći ljudi za hokej u Europi održati taj isti tečaj. Imamo podršku jako velikog broja ljudi tako da se okupila i navijačka skupina koja ima svoju himnu, zastavu i transparent. Želja nam je promovirati hokej u Dalmaciji tako da se otvori još koji klub kako bismo mogli igrati s njima i kako bismo mogli imati ligu. Također od jeseni planiramo pokrenuti grupu za djecu s Downovim Sindromom i za žene.

 

Problemi s kojima se susrećemo

Problem nam je nedostatak adekvatnog prostora za trening, bilo dvoranskog, bilo travnatog. Nemamo protiv koga igrati ako ne putujemo, što nismo u financijskoj mogućnosti. Nemamo ni naš Clubhouse ni travnjak ni specifičnu hokej opremu. Potreban nam je novac kako bismo mogli iznajmiti prostor i pretvoriti ga u naš Clubhouse, naše mjesto druženja i okupljanja, zatim kako bismo mogli postaviti travnjak, kupiti speifičnu hokej opremu te putovati na natjecanja.

Potreban novac

Potrebno nam je  15000 $

Taj bismo novac potrošili za:

·  godišnji najam prostora:  3000 $

·  instalacije struje:  1500 $

·  instalacije vode: 1500 $

·  obnova zidova, podova i stropova: 1500 $

·  sanitarni čvorovi (4 wc-a s tuševima): 1500 $

·  namještaj (stolovi i stolice za clubhouse kafić, stolovi i stolice za dnevni prostror): 750 $

·  sportski rekviziti:  750 $

·  elektronička oprema (laptop, zvučnici, projektor): 750 $

·  kupnju kombija: 3750 $

Drugi načini na koje nam možete pomoći

Ukoliko nam niste u mogućosti pomoći financijski, nema veze. Tu su drugi načini na koje možete doprinijeti. Podijelite ovu kampanju sa svojim prijateljima i obitelji kako bi što veći broj ljudi za nju čuo.


Dovedimo zajedno hokej u Dalmaciju!

story:
中文網頁                          贊助教學



Relid, a simple concept of reusing what you already have. It's a lid used on different shapes and sizes of jars, which is made from BPA free silicone with best quality. It's safe, easy, eco-friendly and useful. Put Relid on your jar, then you'll get a whole new container!


https://www.instagram.com/createwfu/

ㄇㄞˋ點子               大人物

The Story Exchange

We're changing the world every time we consume. If we can rethink about the possibility of reusing what we already have before purchasing, we can make the world a better place. We hope that through our design, we can both solve problems and create a new way of reusing used things.


Glass jars stand heat, acid, oil and are easy to clean, they seemed really useful. So you keep collecting them, until your cabinet is full of glass jars from jam and prickles. 

Full of glass jars without lids, what am I going to do with them?

And by the time you really need one, the lid is often rusted or lost. Glass jars without lids are like white elephants. 

Ewwww.....

But no worries! Relid is here to solve your "jargantic" problem!


Relid suits not only one jar, but a range of them. No matter what size your jar is, Relid has it all covered. It comes with two sizes, large(for jars with Ø55~74 mm inner diameter) and small(for jars with Ø42~59 mm inner diameter). You can simply measure your jar with J-card to ensure witch size of Relid suits your jar. Then just put Relid on, and you'll be ready to re-lid your jar.

No matter what size your jar is, Relid has it all covered.

Relid is made from FDA grade silicone, super safe for food. It's also oil and acid resistant, and stands a wide range of temperature, from -40°C to 200°C (-40°F~392°F), so you can put anything in the jar. It's easy to clean, and of course, it's dishwasher safe.

Yay! Relid is dishwasher safe!

Best of all, with its unique design, you can stack them up to safe space, no matter the size and amount of Relid you have.



You can use Relid anytime, anywhere you like and put anything in the jar you find, then seal it with Relid.

Not only you can store a lot of things — from dry foods like granola, oatmeal, cereal and pasta to liquids such as homemade apple sauce, flavored oil, tomato confit, pickled onions — but you can also jar up the food you made, such as salad, sushi, spaghetti... even pumpkin soup, and take them everywhere with the help of Relid.

You can have a fancy picnic in a beautiful park with your dearest friends,  have  nice, fresh, healthy, home-made lunches in office. Or you can escape from the busy urban life, by bringing one with you while hiking.

Who doesn't love picnic? With Relid, preparation is easy, the result is going to be stunningly beautiful and picnic with glass jars is really chic.

Tired of sandwiches for lunch? Prepare some fresh, healthy, home-made lunch with the help of our recipe.


In order to suit a variety of jars, Relid comes with two sizes, large(for jars with Ø55~74 mm inner diameter) and small(for jars with Ø42~59 mm inner diameter).

Two sizes to fit all your jars.

There're 3 colors: green, dark grey and red for both size.

Relid is made from FDA grade silicone with best quality. It's non-toxic, BPA free, oil and acid resistant, and stands a wide range of temperature, from -40°C to 200°C (-40°F~392°F). You can store anything without worrying.

FDA grade silicone with best quality.

Relid is made for most jars you can find, from Ø42~74 mm inner diameter. If you're not so sure how wide your jar is, you can download the J-card below to ensure Relid suits it. Simply download the J-card (.pdf), print it out and cut along the lines, then stick it into your jar to make sure which size of Relid suits it.

Click the pic above to download the J-card.


There're also postcards of jar up recipes available only on Indiegogo! Ten recipes from the Relid film, including chirashizushi, tomato confit, spicy asparagus, yogurt with blueberries and oatmeal bar, flavored oil, BBQ-on-sticks-to-go, salad, spaghetti, pumpkin soup and detox water. Or you can make your own food in the jar and share the photo or recipe with us!

The recipes that will appear on postcards.


PS. If the pledge includes random postcard, then you'll get a postcard with recipe on it which is going to be a surprise. You can share it with your friends and family, or invite them to join and become a Relider!


There is going to be some cost considerations and restrictions about mass production, Relid will make it only if we achieve the amount with your help. To thank you for helping Relid come true, there are stretch goals as below, new colors will unlock at 6K and 7K, making 6 colors of Relid for you to choose!


We are Vitrop, a team of two Taiwanese designers who believes and is  determined to change the world through design. Our goal is to build a brand combining the culture, design and mass production technique of Taiwan. We'd like to inspire people and make them think from different angles, motivate them to live a better life and always have eco-friendly in mind.

Contact us : vitropdesign@gmail.com


We went through a lot of difficulties, without all the help form the wonderful people around us, we couldn't make Relid possible. We'd like to thank Mr.Guo from Haoge(豪格) for working so hard to make the Relid prototype to our expectation, Mr. and Mrs.Tseng from the plastic injection factory(長春工業社) who imparted us all the plastic knowledge without asking any return, Rachel Yu(于家雯) for always being there, supporting us, and help us with the idea model. We're also thankful for the help of Jenny Lin(林佳靜)、Hannah Fang(方瑞崡)、Elisa Chen(陳勗恩) and Candy Chen(陳婉怡), they were great partners during the filming, and we're grateful to our families and friends, who supported us all along.

Last of all, to all the amazing people who supports and shares Relid, a great 90 dgree bow thank you!!!



    
Please feel free to contact us at anytime : vitropdesign@gmail.com

Through extensive research and endless discussions, Vitrop, a team of two designers that believes design is the way to change the world, is here to introduce Relid. After months of trial and error, we finally came up with a working prototype and are ready for the next phase, which is mass production.

We have already chosen the manufacturer which has solid experience in silicone and rubber production and we feel confident that they will ensure a smooth and professional production process . 

We've been and will be applying ourselves to this campaign, but even with the best plannings, there may always be factors that we can't control such as transport or supplier delays. 

We'll make sure to keep you updated through the production process  and endeavor to deliver the best possible product as soon as possible, so that everyone can teach your old jar some new tricks. 


1.Does Relid really suits all sorts of jars? How do I know if Relid suits the jar I have?

Yes! Relid suits jars with inner diameter Ø42~74mm, which means most of the jars! You can measure your jar or download and print the J-card(.pdf), then cut down the Relid tool and stick it into your jar, you’ll know whether Relid suits or not and which size suits your jar.

2.Is Relid leakproof?

Relid is spill-proof and keeps your food fresh for a while, but it’s not 100% leak proof.

3.Where do we indicate which color we want?

When the campaign ends you will receive a survey to fill out. Here you will indicate the details of your order.

4.Is Relid only for glass jars?
Of course not. You can use it on your mug, glass, cups…

5.Can I use it with hot drinks or food?

Well, Relid is made from FDA grade silicone, so yes, it can stand high temp, but you have to be sure that your jar can stand high heat.

6.Do I get a jar at the same time I pledge?

Nope, Relid is all about reuse and rebirth, so go find an old jar and teach it some new tricks.

7.Where’s Relid manufactured?

Relid is 100% Taiwan designed and manufactured.

8.Why should I get Relid instead of a new container?

If you already have a container, why buy another one? Besides, Relid is good-looking, eco-friendly, pretty simple to use and you can stack them up to save space. Best of all, they are more cheaper and stylish than the glass containers in supermarkets.

9.Can I choose which postcard I get?

We love surprises! There're 10 kinds of jar-recipe postcards, backers will randomly get your postcard, you can share your work with others and collect all the recipes, or you can also pledge the ones with ten postcards (Jartastic, The game of jars)

of them. No matter what size your jar is, Relid has it all covered. It comes with two sizes, large(for jars with Ø55~74 mm inner diameter) and small(for jars with Ø42~59 mm inner diameter). You can simply measure your jar with J-card to ensure witch size of Relid suits your jar. Then just put
Relid on, and you'll be ready to re-lid your jar.



No matter what size your jar is, Relid has it all covered.



Relid is made from FDA grade silicone, super safe for food. It's also oil and acid resistant, and stands a wide range of temperature, from -40°C to 200°C (-40°F~392°F), so you can put anything in the jar. It's easy to clean, and of course, it's dishwasher safe.


Yay! Relid is dishwasher safe!

Best of all, with its unique design, you can stack them up to safe space, no matter the size and amount of Relid you have.














You can use Relid anytime, anywhere you like and put anything in the jar you find, then seal it with Relid.
Not only you can store a lot of things — from dry foods like granola, oatmeal, cereal and pasta to liquids such as homemade apple sauce, flavored oil, tomato confit, pickled onions — but you can also jar up the food you made, such as salad, sushi, spaghetti... even pumpkin soup, and take them everywhere with the help of Relid.



You can have a fancy picnic in a beautiful park with your dearest friends,  have  nice, fresh, healthy, home-made lunches in office. Or you can escape from the busy urban life, by bringing one with you while hiking.





Who doesn't love picnic? With Relid, preparation is easy, the result is going to be stunningly beautiful and picnic with glass jars is really chic.




Tired of sandwiches for lunch? Prepare some fresh, healthy, home-made lunch with the help of our recipe.









In order to suit a variety of jars, Relid comes with two sizes, large(for jars with Ø55~74 mm inner diameter) and small(for jars with Ø42~59 mm inner diameter).

Two sizes to fit all your jars.


There're 3 colors: green, dark grey and red for both size.
Relid is made from FDA grade silicone with best quality. It's non-toxic, BPA free, oil and acid resistant, and stands a wide range of temperature, from -40°C to 200°C (-40°F~392°F). You can store anything without worrying.



FDA grade silicone with best quality.
Relid is made for most jars you can find, from Ø42~74 mm inner diameter. If you're not so sure how wide your jar is, you can download the J-card below to ensure Relid suits it. Simply download the J-card (.pdf), print it out and cut along the lines, then stick it into your jar to make sure which size of Relid suits it.



Click the pic above to download the J-card.








There're also postcards of jar up recipes available only on Indiegogo! Ten recipes from the Relid film, including chirashizushi, tomato confit, spicy asparagus, yogurt with blueberries and oatmeal bar, flavored oil, BBQ-on-sticks-to-go, salad, spaghetti, pumpkin soup and detox water. Or you can make your own food in the jar and share the photo or recipe with us!






The recipes that will appear on postcards.




PS. If the pledge includes random postcard, then you'll get a postcard with recipe on it which is going to be a surprise. You can share it with your friends and family, or invite them to join and become a Relider!





There is going to be some cost considerations and restrictions about mass production, Relid will make it only if we achieve the amount with your help. To thank you for helping Relid come true, there are stretch goals as below, new colors will unlock at 6K and 7K, making 6 colors of Relid for you to choose!









We are Vitrop, a team of two Taiwanese designers who believes and is  determined to change the world through design. Our goal is to build a brand combining the culture, design and mass production technique of Taiwan. We'd like to inspire people and make them think from different angles, motivate them to live a better life and always have eco-friendly in mind.


Contact us : vitropdesign@gmail.com



We went through a lot of difficulties, without all the help form the wonderful people around us, we couldn't make Relid possible. We'd like to thank Mr.Guo from Haoge(豪格) for working so hard to make the Relid prototype to our expectation, Mr. and Mrs.Tseng from the plastic injection factory(長春工業社) who imparted us all the plastic knowledge without asking any return, Rachel Yu(于家雯) for always being there, supporting us, and help us with the idea model. We're also thankful for the help of Jenny Lin(林佳靜)、Hannah Fang(方瑞崡)、Elisa Chen(陳勗恩) and Candy Chen(陳婉怡), they were great partners during the filming, and we're grateful to our families and friends, who supported us all along.
Last of all, to all the amazing people who supports and shares Relid, a great 90 dgree bow thank you!!!








    
Please feel free to contact us at anytime : vitropdesign@gmail.com






Through extensive research and endless discussions, Vitrop, a team of two designers that believes design is the way to change the world, is here to introduce Relid. After months of trial and error, we finally came up with a working prototype and are ready for the next phase, which is mass production.
We have already chosen the manufacturer which has solid experience in silicone and rubber production and we feel confident that they will ensure a smooth and professional production process . 
We've been and will be applying ourselves to this campaign, but even with the best plannings, there may always be factors that we can't control such as transport or supplier delays. 
We'll make sure to keep you updated through the production process  and endeavor to deliver the best possible product as soon as possible, so that everyone can teach your old jar some new tricks. 







1.Does Relid really suits all sorts of jars? How do I know if Relid suits the jar I have?
Yes! Relid suits jars with inner diameter Ø42~74mm, which means most of the jars! You can measure your jar or download and print the J-card(.pdf), then cut down the Relid tool and stick it into your jar, you’ll know whether Relid suits or not and which size suits your jar.

2.Is Relid leakproof?
Relid is spill-proof and keeps your food fresh for a while, but it’s not 100% leak proof.
3.Where do we indicate which color we want?
When the campaign ends you will receive a survey to fill out. Here you will indicate the details of your order.

4.Is Relid only for glass jars?Of course not. You can use it on your mug, glass, cups… 
5.Can I use it with hot drinks or food?
Well, Relid is made from FDA grade silicone, so yes, it can stand high temp, but you have to be sure that your jar can stand high heat.
6.Do I get a jar at the same time I pledge?
Nope, Relid is all about reuse and rebirth, so go find an old jar and teach it some new tricks.
7.Where’s Relid manufactured?
Relid is 100% Taiwan designed and manufactured.
8.Why should I get Relid instead of a new container?
If you already have a container, why buy another one? Besides, Relid is good-looking, eco-friendly, pretty simple to use and you can stack them up to save space. Best of all, they are more cheaper and stylish than the glass containers in supermarkets.
9.Can I choose which postcard I get?
We love surprises! There're 10 kinds of jar-recipe postcards, backers will randomly get your postcard, you can share your work with others and collect all the recipes, or you can also pledge the ones with ten postcards (Jartastic, The game of jars)

story:
Summary

We are a team of adventure loving people with a passion for cool vehicles and the great outdoors. If you also love these things, then we guarantee you'll get excited about our campaign - so read on!

  • We want to bring a SHERP to the UK so it can be enjoyed by anyone.
  • Our team includes engineers; ex-military and outdoor education specialists; marketing experts; H&S approved and qualified staff for hospitality,
  • We already have access to storage and workshop facilities; a site with space for testing, hospitality and future expansion.
  • We have the full support of the SHERP manufacturers, and existing off-road centres on board.
  • This has the potential to help us start a business doing something that we love!

We've done our research and come up with a thorough plan.

What We Need & What You Get

This is our plan:

  • We are initially looking to raise £30,000 to cover the cost of setting up SHERP UK; marketing; insurance; admin and off-road site setup.
  • We have a full business plan for a SHERP UK limited company, website, and social media marketing.
  • You'll be rewarded with a range of great SHERP perks, and will be amongst the first people in the UK to hear about future developments.
  • Following this initial campaign, we'll be looking to run a second campaign to help secure delivery of the first SHERP vehicle in the UK.
  • We'll then have the potential to offer simple drive/ride experiences, full overnight wilderness expeditions, hospitality and refreshments.
  • We have CAA approved status for drone flights, and will be able to offer awesome aerial footage of your drive - for the ultimate souvenir of your SHERP experience!

The Impact

This is why we think this campaign could be a huge success:

  • The SHERP has potential uses other than entertainment (search & rescue; exploration; disaster response; ecological and many more).
  • Our team has a track record of successful projects in industry around the world.
  • We think that the UK off-road/ATV market is ready for something new and unique.
  • The SHERP has already proven its capabilities in the most hostile environments (a lot more severe than the UK)!

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge will be to set-up and deliver the SHERP experience that we are so excited about, but we can overcome these obstacles because:

  • We have mechanical and marketing expertise.
  • Our team includes experienced people in all areas required.
  • We have the support of the SHERP team in Ukraine.
  • We are truly passionate about this idea, and have business start-up experience.
  • The SHERP is awesome.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially, you can still help:

  • Check out our social media - like, comment and share!
  • Share our Indiegogo campaign with your friends and family.

Thanks for reading, and wish us luck!

story:
A probléma

A Föld ivóvízkészletei végesek, fogynak, ez nem csak lokálisan probléma. Mindannyian tudunk tenni azért, hogy ne a felszín alatti vizeinket csapoljuk, hanem más forrásból nyerjünk vizet.

A Tolnai-dombság lankái között áll két Kicsiház, ahol a felhasznált vizet mi nem vezetékes vízrendszerből akarjuk kinyerni, hanem más megoldást választottunk. Ezzel két fontos küldetést is teljesítünk:

  1. csekély energiafelhasználással nyerünk vizet az esőből, így nem az értékes ivóvizet használjuk fürdésre, mosásra, wc öblítésre, vagy a növények locsolására;
  2. hosszútávon egy olyan fenntartható rendszert építünk ki, amiből a hozzánk látogató vendégek anyagilag is részesülnek, mert így a két ház rezsiköltségét alacsonyabban tudjuk tartani, ezáltal a szállásdíj is kevesebb lesz.

A Kicsiházakban olyan embereket látunk vendégül, akiknek nincs más helyük, alkalmuk arra, hogy megtervezzenek, megvalósítsanak valamit. Akiknek szükségük van az elvonulásra, az időre, a térre, a csendre ahhoz, hogy felkészüljenek a nagy kihívásra, egy új képregényük megrajzolására, vagy a könyvük megírására, stb. Vagy azok jönnek hozzánk, akik egyszerűen csak énidőre, elvonulásra, pihenésre vágynak.

Benke Éva vagyok, tervezek, alkotok, rajzolok - főleg mások álmait valósítom meg vizuálisan -, a vizuális művészetekről tanítok a jövő nemzedékének, anya és feleség vagyok.

 

A víziónk

Megvan a módja annak, hogy tisztított vízhez jussunk az esővízből. Egy olyan rendszert szeretnénk kiépíteni, amely begyűjti az esővizet, megtisztítja, így hasznosítjuk fürdésre, wc öblítésre, mosásra, vagy a növények öntözésére.

Ez a rendszer két egymás mellett álló Kicsiház vízellátást képes biztosítani. Hosszútávon használható rendszert alakítunk ki, amely csekély energia felhasználással a két Kicsiház vízellátását biztosítja anélkül, hogy a drága ivóvizet az iváson kívül másra használnánk.

 

Mi lesz a hatása?

Ezzel a kiépített esővízgyűjtő rendszerrel hozzájárulunk mindannyian ahhoz, hogy a véges ivóvízkészletből való fogyasztást csökkentsük az olyan helyeken, ahol másféle víznyerési lehetőség is rendelkezésre állhat. Így csekély energiafelhasználással nyerjük az esővizet, mert az ivóvíz a Földön sok helyen már szinte drágábbnak számít, mint az arany.

A Kicsiház vendégeként te is teszel azért, hogy az ivóvízkészletünket ne pazaroljuk.

 

Hangolódj rá a Kicsiházra!

Rusztikus részletek, tárgyak fogadnak majd.

A burkolatok, a felhasznált anyagok és felületek a természetességet tükröznek, és itt-ott egy kis retro elem is felbukkan.

A kertben is pihenhetsz, kikapcsolhatsz.

A munka nem áll meg.

10 csomag közül tudsz választani

10 különböző csomagot találtunk ki. Ezeket igyekeztünk úgy összeállítani, hogy aki nem utazásra vágyik, az is megtalálja a számára hasznos, a zero waste és a slow living jegyében összeállított csomagokat. 

 

Céljaink

Az elsődleges célig elért összegből megvásároljuk az esővízgyűjtő rendszert. A tavalyi évben már megtörtént a helyszín felmérése, így most a szakemberek kivonulnak a helyszínre és kb. 2 nap alatt kivitelezésre kerül a rendszer (szállítás, földmunkák, rendszer felállítása).

Az alábbi képen láthatod ennek az esővízgyűjtő rendszernek a felépítését:

A második cél megvalósulásával gyorsan kialakítjuk a konyhát, aminek a helye természetesen megvan, de még üres.

Ha megvalósul a harmadik cél is, akkor kialakítjuk a fürdőkabint, ahol dézsafürdőben lubickolhatsz, relaxálhatsz. Igazából ez az a pont, amikor fogadhatjuk már a vendégeket. Itt a nagy kérdés az, hogy még ebben az évben (ezt tervezzük), vagy csak 2020-ban.

A negyedik céllal elvégezzük a kertépítést, és jó pár kerti bútorral is feldobjuk a kertet.

Ez a cél a csúcs-cél, mert ha ez összejön, akkor beteszünk egy jakuzzit a teraszra. És ami a legjobb az egészben, hogy mindezt ebben az évben megvalósíthatjuk.

 

A Kicsiház csapata, akik a vendéglátóid lesznek

 

     Benke Évi - tulajdonos és megvalósító. Arculattervező, webdesigner, akinek a munkája mellett a slow living életmód, és a hagyományok ápolása is fontos. 2 gyermeke van, akik már felnőttek, így még több idő jut a Kicsiházakra. 

 

 

 

        

Kovács Viktor - megvalósító, a Kicsiházak kertésze is. Civilben a könyvelő irodáját vezeti. Szenvedélye a természet, a környezetvédelem, ő Évi férje és gyermekei édesapja.

 

 

Kockázatok és kihívások a "Víz a mennyből" projektben

Flexibilis finanszírozású kampányt választottunk, ami azt jelenti, hogy mindenki, aki itt előrendeli valamelyik csomagot, azt meg is fogja kapni, hisz a kampány sikeressége nem függ attól, hogy elérjük-e a kívánt célösszeget. Hogy akkor miért indítottunk az Indiegogon mégis egy kampányt? Az idő fontos tényező. Víz nélkül a Kicsiházak nem tudnak vendégeket fogadni, így minél hamarabb ki tudjuk építeni az esővízgyűjtő rendszert, annál hamarabb jöhettek! 

A minimum célösszeget úgy alakítottuk ki, hogy ebből éppen megvalósíthatjuk a vízgyűjtő rendszert, ez fedezi a teljes költségét ennek a beruházásnak. Ezt az összeget nem fogjuk a megélhetőségünkre fordítani, mert van más bevételi forrásunk. Az első célösszeg fölött beérkező forintok sem vesznek el, mert abból az egyes célok megvalósítása történik. És akár már 2019-ben! Hurrráááá!

 

Minden segítségért hálásak vagyunk!

Ha te maga nem is tudod a kampányunkat támogatni pénzzel, biztosan vannak ismerőseid, barátaid, akik viszont igen. Így hálásak vagyunk a megosztásokért a különböző közösségi médiákban, csoportokban, vagy a weboldaladon. Használd az Indiegogo megosztási eszközeit!

Hogy akkor miért indítottunk az Indiegogon mégis egy kampányt? Az idő fontos tényező. Víz nélkül a Kicsiházak nem tudnak vendégeket fogadni, így minél hamarabb ki tudjuk építeni az esővízgyűjtő rendszert, annál hamarabb jöhettek! 
A minimum célösszeget úgy alakítottuk ki, hogy ebből éppen megvalósíthatjuk a vízgyűjtő rendszert, ez fedezi a teljes költségét ennek a beruházásnak. Ezt az összeget nem fogjuk a megélhetőségünkre fordítani, mert van más bevételi forrásunk. Az első célösszeg fölött beérkező forintok sem vesznek el, mert abból az egyes célok megvalósítása történik. És akár már 2019-ben! Hurrráááá!

 
Minden segítségért hálásak vagyunk!
Ha te maga nem is tudod a kampányunkat támogatni pénzzel, biztosan vannak ismerőseid, barátaid, akik viszont igen. Így hálásak vagyunk a megosztásokért a különböző közösségi médiákban, csoportokban, vagy a weboldaladon. Használd az Indiegogo megosztási eszközeit!

story:
Hello everyone, my name is Benedetta and I am 11 years old.
In 1965 my grandmother Anna Maria Ubaldi, being a descendant of an ancient Umbrian family, was appointed as a mayor of a small town called Trevi. He was one of the first women in Italy to cover such an important public office. Trevi stands on the hill in front of the most famous village of Montefalco, which is said to be the heart of Italy.

Montefalco is famous for its red wines: the Sagrantino and the Rosso di Montefalco. It is also known worldwide for its numerous Renaissance artworks of important artists such as Raffaello and Benozzo Gozzoli, whose paintings can be found in numerous churches.

My grandmother Anna Maria lived all her life in Montefalco in a XVth century building. Unfortunately now the building it has become a ruin due to a violent earthquake in 1997 and the other violent earthquakes that took place in August and October 2016 .

 

In August 2016 unfortunately, my beloved mom Federica passed away and, so, we decided with my dad and elder siblings Ludovica and Lorenzo to restructure the ruin to continue and keep alive the spirit of both my grandmother Anna Maria and my beloved mom Federica .

My Uncle Giorgio still live in the area and produces a red wine called Coccorone which is the ancient medieval name of Montefalco that the German king Frederick II of Swabia decided to change in the present name.

Today we would like to restore the ancient beauty of the house, transforming it from sad ruin to a cozy home to accommodate who will help us and other future visitors.

That's why we are looking for the necessary funds and help. Those who will support the fundraising will also have the right to taste my uncle Giorgio's wine.We hope many of you will come! 

We do this campaign because we have to anticipate the funds that the Italian state since 1997, the year of the earthquake, has never paid. This is why we are making sacrifices in our mother's desire. All those who will help us will have the right to come and enjoy a period of rest in Umbria. We reciprocate your generosity with our hospitality.

Benedetta, 4th descendant of the mayor of the heart of Italy

story:
El Proyecto

BrewCamp nace hace año y medio con la idea de generar cultura cervecera en el país. 

 

¿A que se dedica BrewCamp?

Nos dedicamos a comercializar Insumos y Equipo para el Homebrewer que llevas dentro. Ofrecemos cursos y catas para generar cultura cervecera y lo mejor de todo brindamos un espacio para el  cervecero y consumidor en nuestros tap rooms. Finalmente nos dedicamos a la Importación y Distribución de Cervecerías reconocidas para que puedas disfrutarlas a un excelente precio en tu bar preferido.

El mercado global de la cerveza fue valorado en 530 mil millones de dólares en 2016 y se espera que alcance los 763 mil millones de dólares en 2021, con un crecimiento anual compuesto del 6.0% previsto durante el periodo 2016-2021. (Latest Research: Global Beer Industry 2017-2022)

En poco tiempo hemos logrado tener aceptación en este mercado logrando cerrar contratos importantes con cervecerías de otros países además de brindar siempre un espacio para los productores mexicanos.

Consideramos que la cerveza artesanal no es una moda y es algo que recién esta comenzando. Por lo que queremos ofrecerte espacios para que puedas producir, maquillar y disfrutar de este líquido que ha tomado una importancia relevante en el país.

 

¿Que hemos Logrado?

  • Apertura de dos Tap Rooms & Beer Stores
  • Importación Exclusiva de dos cervecerías importantes de Estados Unidos
  • Catas y eventos con Brew Masters de Cervecerías reconocidas de Estados Unidos y México
  • Incubación de algunas cervecerías locales
  • Alianzas Comerciales con Bares e Importadores en México

 

¿Por que necesitamos de tu ayuda?

La distribución es un reto que sufren muchas marcas del mercado, por lo que necesitamos consolidar la infraestructura que hemos estado construyendo a lo largo de un año.

Queremos traer más y mejores ingredientes para tu cerveza. Debido al crecimiento de la producción la demanda por insumos y equipo cada vez crece más.

Queremos traer las mejores cervecerías de mundo. A lo largo de este año hemos logrado traer las mejores cerveceras de Estados Unidos a los mejores precios del mercado importado, es por eso que queremos seguir creciendo para ofrecer los mejores precios.

Espacio para tu cerveza. Queremos crecer con BrewPubs y Tap Rooms para ofrecer un espacio para ti productor y importador, un espacio dedicado a catas, cursos, lanzamientos y porque no a la maquila de tu cerveza.

story:
Vegetarian catering and restaurant, Zagreb, Croatia

short description: 

Our 20 years of experience in vegetarian tourism across the Adriatic coast make the opening of a local restaurant in Zagreb our logical next project. 

However, our success depends on your good will and help. This campaign is intended to raise the funds needed to cover a part of the initial expenses of our vegetarian all-you-can-eat&drink restaurant - #FoodHarmony.

______________________________________________________________________

Podrži nas i nagradi se ručkom ili CD-om Sound Bath, ljetovanjem, gong kupkom...

______________________________________________________________________


Why open a restaurant in the middle of an economic crisis?

Come on!! There’s no better time to spread optimism, passion and strength of conviction than an economic crisis, and this is our way to help people live more affordable and healthy lives.


Friends from Slovenia, you are especially invited to contribute because we are considering Ljubljana for our next stop in this journey! (keep in mind that we are starting off in Zagreb, so we must be gooood and prepared for this next step).

______________________________________________________________________

Sudjeluj u prikupljanju sredstava za novi vegetarijanski restoran u Zagrebu.

______________________________________________________________________


Our well established know-how...

What we already have is 20 years of know-how (vegetarian restaurant on the Adriatic coast), delivery vehicles, kitchen equipment, hardworking people. In short, only one little thing is lacking, the money to cover some of the expenses, e.g. the rent.

  • We intend to raise the money to cover some of the expenses.
  • The money would cover prepaid lease for space (beautiful fantasy place in Zagreb), a little marketing, interior decoration... and we really need a new stove. Or two to be precise.

First: fantasy place = What we have in mind is a surface of approx. 100 m2, interior decoration = modern chairs, colourful tables, swing chairs, bar, self-service line, terrace - enclosed for market/trade (organic groceries from our trusted suppliers).

Delivery vehicles = our vehicles are equipped with thermo boxes which keep the temperature and freshness of the food, ensuring high quality delivery. We won’t make you wait for hours to get a reasonably-priced meal delivered to your office. We will make it possible for you to track the progress of the vehicle with your order on our website.

To be clear: we do not dream about money, we do not dream about power,we dream about high-quality foodand doing what we really enjoy. We also intend to employ our friends, share the excitement, have satisfied customers who can NOW finally choose healthy food at no extra cost (vs. junk food) and have a family restaurant; a happy place for happy people.

Please support us so we can do an excellent job

If you are not just around the corner (Zagreb, the capital of Croatia – the future capital with the best restaurant/catering in the world) you can:

    • help us get the word out and give a word of mouth about our campaign

    • buy our products, like lavender cushion or Sound Bath CD (first edition with a special thank you note from Vedran!)

    • or have a vacation on the Adriatic (island of Pašman) with our voucher card!

______________________________________________________________________

All you can eat&drink vegetarijanski restoran u Zagrebu. Kampanja je uspješna jedino uz prikupljenih 5.000 EUR - pravovremenim uplatama potičete druge da uskoče u vlak na ovom ukusnom putovanju.

______________________________________________________________________

Here are some photos, just to give you an idea of what we imagined for our restaurant:

salads

salads - catering

meals

meals - catering

chickpea coffee, tea, soya milk

   

smoothie

______________________________________________________________________

Cilj kampanje: "All you can eat&drink" vegetarijanski restoran u Zagrebu + brzi catering zdrave hrane u Zagrebu. Kupite s popustom.

______________________________________________________________________


What we would offer and why?

FIRST - WHY?

During the last couple of years (or decades to be precise), there’s been a noticeable upward trend in the popularity of vegetarian food. This type of cuisine doesn’t put a strain on the body, yet provides sufficient energy and vitality if properly balanced, i.e. if basic nutritional needs are met. This kind of food also contributes to the preservation of our planet’s basic resources, since the growing of foodstuffs used in vegetarian cuisine requires 10 times less resources then the production of food of animal origin.

All these reasons encourage modern people to partially or completely change their dietary habits by excluding meat and other animal products from their diet for a variety of reasons and to varying extents. People resort to vegetarian food for medical, ethical or religious reasons and purposes. 

AND SECOND - WE WILL OFFER:

    • healthy and favourably priced meals

    • easy to order, reliable and fast delivery with our "thermo" vehicle

    • vegetarian (vegan) restaurant with all you can eat*& drink** lunch offer

      *Self service meals, salads
      **Drink: tea & chickpea coffee, soya milk

Eggs and meat are not used in our dishes. We plan meals with the optimum nutrition ratio in mind: 20% proteins, 40% carbohydrates, 40% low-energy food. That goes for the catering part at least. 

But of course, in the restaurant every guest can choose a meal to his/her liking, and after all, we mustn’t forget that this will be an all you can eat & drink type of restaurant.



Challenge... Yes it is.

A smoke-free and alcohol-free restaurant.

Food without meat and sugar.

We are aware that this is not something a majority of people would choose. Providing quality, imaginative, abundant and affordable restaurant and catering services capable of attracting enough people to cover the costs is always a challenge.

But we have:

  • 20 years of experience in no meat / no junk food diet

  • an excellent selection of healthy organic groceries (the beautiful Croatian countryside has so much to offer)

Best friends in the world (who also cook great food))

______________________________________________________________________

Kampanja je uspješna jedino uz prikupljenih 5.000 EUR. Ako ne sakupimo ciljani iznos, paypal vam vraća uplaćeni iznos u potpunosti.

______________________________________________________________________

Please support us so we can do an excellent job

If you are not just around the corner (Zagreb, the capital of Croatia – the future capital with the best restaurant/catering in the world) you can:

    • help us get the word out and give a word of mouth about our campaign

    • buy our products, like lavender cushion or Sound Bath CD (first edition with a special thank you note from Vedran!)

    • or have a vacation on the Adriatic (island of Pašman) with our voucher card!

Thank you all, and share joy and happiness!

And remember the food@harmony brand.

It would be a great brand because we are great at what we do!

We are an extended family

  • Nataša:  held responsibility for finance and for lot of big and small stuff 

  • Darko: a master of healthy lifestyle with a weight-loss track record of 60 kg (i.e. 130 lbs) lost

  • Vedran: a Gong master (yes, we plan to hold seminars and Sound Bath in our little vegan shelter). Listen to his great music here (and buy CD :) ) 

    And last, but truth be told, the first: 

  • Vesna: everything start with her. The Harmony Program is her brainchild and it she who taught us how to live healthy and content lives. See what she’s done for the last 20 years on  www.harmony.hr


A couple of shots of some perks:

Lavanda cushion, Harmony t-shirt:

Sound Bath provided by Vedran, Gong Master

Website banner:

Mosaic portrait:


Help make it happen

for Food.Harmony - vegetarian restaurant with delivery and its team!

story:
iTumpang®

Motto: Practical Solutions For Easy Transportation

Synopsis:

iTumpang® is an app under development for Singaporeans to travel from one point to another with convenience on a bike with a safe rider with good track record.

It also enables us to understand abit more about riding; to appreciate and analyse what kind of road situations that our bikers are facing daily on the roads.

iTumpang® creates jobs for bikers without any current job or for part-timer who wants to earn the extra cash. It supports the rider’s community in Singapore. A new source of income for riders and the best way for consumers to reach your destination fast and cheapest rate.

This service will help Singaporeans to have an alternative to travel 24/7. Some may call it as “bike-taxi” like how we see and experience at countries like Thailand, Cambodia & Vietnam.

Not only iTumpang® will allow you to reach your destination faster, cheaper and stress-free;

Its utmost aim is to promote good road safety, culture & discipline among fellow road users.

iTumpang® works in an app which enables you to book services through your Apple or Android phones apps.

We would love everyone to contribute towards this new project which will definitely ease the transportation issues in Singapore.


iTumpang App Development 

Total         $10,000.00


List of Items                  Cost

App Development         $7,000.00

Laptop                                 $1,000.00

Portable WIFI Printer $500.00

Office Furniture                 $2,000.00

iPad                                 $500.00

Rental of Office Space $1,000.00


Thank you everyone for taking your precious time to read and know about this project and thank you for all your love and support. This project won't be possible without your generous donations.

We hope to start making the app by end of sept 2015

Thanks & Regards,

Muhammad Shahir & Joel JJ Singh.

This project won't be possible without your generous donations.We hope to start making the app by end of sept 2015Thanks & Regards,Muhammad Shahir & Joel JJ Singh.

story:
Why should you have VIDEO CV?


In this job market where the supply-demand balance is totally unbalanced, the solution is to stand out from the others!
Get out of the line and show you future employer, who you are, what you know and what you are! The Video CV puts you in front! Innovative, Efficient and Effective - the Video CV helps you differentiate and successfully reach the desired employer's attention.

Who are we ?

We are a group of 3 people, summing up more then 20 years of experience and expertise in Recruitment, Job Hunting, Headhunting, Executive-Search, Outplacement and Candidates Evaluation. We've put all our Capabilities and Services in one single place we've called Redline.


Imagine a line taking you from here (where you are right now in your professional life) to where you want to go. First step is to assess the "As-Is" of you: Personal Profile, Professional Competencies and Professional Experience to date - We are the sum of our experiences !
Next step is to define your "To-Be": What you want To Be, What you want to Do and What you want to Have - professionally speaking. Now, see this red line connecting your As-Is with your To-Be in the most Effective and Efficient way.

This is what the Video CV does !

The Purpose of it all

All the raised funds will be used to:

  • Educate the Employers and the Candidates. We will do Seminars, Forums, Workshops and Webminars to assess and prove the value added by the Video CV based recruiting.
  • Promote Meritocracy. We'll be able to reach the right people - true professionals, well-prepared, high-performers  and we will enhance their chances to get in front of the desired Employer.
  • Make Video CV accessible to everyone. By extending our production capacity and equipment base and by promoting the benefits, we can offer this service to everyone all over the world
  • Perks..it is ! We're making available to you all of our expertise and experience and we offer you the right solution for what you need at this point in your professional career.

A sample of our work

Filming a Video CV is an intense, beautiful and profound experience.
Here are some Behing the Scene moments from one of our Video CV:

Video CV: Now it is possible !

No matter where you are, All it takes for you to get it is to contact us:

stelica.gheorghita@redlinesuccess.ro

0040 732 420 732

  • We can make it happen together !


There's always a way you can help !

Some people just can't contribute, of course, the money can be an issue sometimes. No biggie, You can still make this happen ! if you belive that the Video CV will shorten the time spent to get a new job and will paint a better image, than the text cv, of who you really are then:
  • Please share our Campaign to all the people you hold dear
  • Contact us and tell us your opinion
  • Talk about us with your friends and relatives.
Friends who care, SHARE !

Obstacles and Solutions

Reaching the goal is a road, where the SUCCESS is not a target but a characteristic of the trip. In reaching the target we might encounter some obstacles, but we have solutions !
O: Lack of visibility of our crowdfunding campaign .
S: We're working intensly to promote the campaign and to reach as many people as possible.

O: Need for more details: how and where we'll record them ? where will the video cvs be stored ? how to use them ? how can we do it for someone  who lives in UK or  US or Italy?
S: We have the solutions ! For absolutly every queries you might have please contact us:
stelica.gheorghita@redlinesuccess.ro
0040 732 420 732


The Impact of YOUR contribution


  • Upon the target reaching of this campaign we will be able to make Video CVs for anyone - no matter where this person is located.
  • Through the new acquired equipment and the use of internet we will be able to film, produce and execute the Video CV.
  • By using their Video CV, the true professionals can capture the attention and generate interest on the side of the desired employer.
  • We have been doing this for some time now and with your contribution we can finally extend this service to the world.
  • 1$ can make so much difference ! Don't hesitate and support us to make the Job Hunting a pleasent process.
  • A special newsletter, containg the use of the funds and the progress of Video CV creation and usage, will be sent out periodically to all Contributors, including success stories, special cases and achievements from Redline in its mission to make raise awareness and create as many Video CVs as possible.
An warm: Thank You for being part of this great experience!

story:
Greenbleez goes for the green!

Hello, everyone! I'm Margee Barth. One part creator, one part magician, another part die-hard recycler. The main mission of Greenbleez is providing outstanding products that contribute to reducing post-consumer waste. It is also important that each one expressed individuality while bringing back the high quality of American made craftsmanship. The marketplace is ready for eco-conscious gifts and here's our solution!


My background is one that started in design at a very early age with a few sprinkles of entrepreneurship. I worked as a Costume Designer for 12 years, moved into Illustration work, then Fashion. I became very disenchanted with the big fashion houses and the incredible waste factor I had witnessed. At that point, a problem had presented itself and I was driven to find a solution. 
Started designing for a company that was interested in remaking  from collected materials in a 7 story warehouse. I successfully developed 4 product lines for 2 seasons per year for 3 years. I opened a retail store, merchandised, Created "Art" pieces from recycled materials and launched "Recycled Art Workshops".  Trained sewers, introduced production techniques and standards. Opened wholesale accounts and positioned the company in "green" manufacturing.


We need to raise $15,000 

                                           PLUS $2000 for supplies and materials               

  • Each and every reward will be hand made by me...yes this is a Limited Collection. You will be a part of Greenbleez history! 
  • THIS IS A FIXED FUNDED CAMPAIGN. If we don't raise the amount we'll be extremely saddened. Several years have been invested in R&D, establishing relationships with retailers and craft markets, state tested and approved, state certified for resale along with certification of "green" sustainable practices. We must protect design/intellectual property. Without the legal protection and brand positioning, we can not risk continuing.

The Impact

Your contributions will benefit children, planet, and people. You can feel good about giving a product that leaves a softer carbon footprint and expresses individuality. Supporting high-quality American made products. That are truly keepsakes and part of a Limited Collection. 

  • We believe by contributing to reducing consumer waste we are ensuring a planet for our children and theirs.
  • Sustainable manufacturing practices and movement towards a circular economy.
  • Provide income with a sustainable wage for employees.

Risks & Challenges

We promise your Limited Edition Greenbleez product will be delivered by November 28, 2015, just in time for Holiday giving!

I'm sure some of you are thinking how in the world will she deliver a high-quality product all by herself?

Here's how:

I have production experience and systems in place. Over 20 years working in small production. I have trained sewers and have production techniques from my Industry days.

 Greenbleez production has been going for 3 years by myself and I have never missed a deadline or NOT been stocked at a show.  I have been producing for this campaign for 3 months.

  • I know what I can produce without compromising quality. The production numbers are quite feasible. Production of inventory has been ongoing since Greenbleez's beginning. We're always sewing!
  • All my current stores know that it is necessary for me to protect the product and must be done now. They are willing to wait out a (HOLIDAY) season if it means the difference between no inventory for their Holiday season to ensure future success of Greenbleez  products. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that some people just can't donate. That's okay. What you can do is make BIG, LOUD, NOISE by sharing on facebook. Retweeting on twitter, Liking on  Pinterest. Sharing on Instagram...make NOISE...we like pots and pans personally!

  • Share the campaign while having coffee, at parties or any other social events...we're all about sharing and spreading the luv!
  • We've provided share tools to make this a simple click..and away we go!

story:
Hello, my name is Marcin,

     I am young and motivated person.
since the early childhood, i was very curious in a technician things, especially when i get any new toy i always need to explore how did that works;)
till now nothing has changed i think.
After school i went to my first work when i just could further develop in my technician side. I worked in a office equipment service (that was a great job in all)
now i am 26 i am going to start with my own business.

My Target:

I want to open a slight business which would be designed to solving any people problems with IT equipment. Computers, MFP printers and every little thing that could be  damaged. Even a hair dryers;)

In the future i want to build a chain of service points in the different small places, than everyone could be able to repair his own broken things, without traveling a lot of miles to bigger cities.

This is my primary wish (since few years) but without money this is impossible.

I have good knowledge and experience in a field of a different repairs.

but I no have any money to do something with that.


My point is, to get the money for buy or rent a small headquarters.

I want to buy all of tools and accesories needed to different repairs,

and that is unfortunatelly very expensive.

So I have a big request for you friends.
Please, help me with that, I will be so grateful when I receive your help.

story:
Short Summary

 

Welcome to our Indiegogo campaign! My name is Brandon Kemp, and the Nassau Night Market is my dream baby. Before moving back to The Bahamas, I traveled to nearly 40 countries, volunteering with a non-profit organization. One of the most striking countries I lived in was Taiwan, famous for their night markets. Parking lots, streets, and parks are transformed into one of their strongest expressions of culture and economic activity. My experience there inspired me to bring that concept home. 

 

When I returned to The Bahamas, I was shocked by 3 things: 

  1. Our downtown nearly completely shuts down after 5pm. In other capital cities, revenue in downtown areas dramatically increase after 6pm, but ours doesn't stay open long enough to experience that.
  2. Other than the straw market, and two Bahamian restaurants, there is very little representation of Bahamian culture and products in the downtown area. 
  3. A wave of entrepreneurship has been washing over the islands. We found over 150 small businessmen working at bringing their food, drink, or artisan products to the market! 

 

I knew that the perfect way to tackle these three "shocks" would be to bring the Taiwanese night market concept to downtown. In December, we approached the government and Downtown Nassau Partnership with the idea, and they immediately jumped on board. Allowing us to use Market Slope as our home. With exciting entertainment, flavorful foods, and precious products, we transform our little street into a bustling center of economic opportunity for all and an unforgettable exhibition of Bahamian culture! 

Not only are we creating a new activity for Bahamians and tourists to enjoy, but we're providing local entrepreneurs with a platform to gain exposure, grow their business, and take their products to higher levels. By supporting the Nassau Night Market, you support an entire movement of Bahamian entrepreneurs trying to make their impact on the world. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

Although the Nassau Night Market has been growing slowly but truly, we've been limited in taking it to where we want it to be due to the high costs of renting equipment. As the event grows, more and more is needed to keep it operating, and we thought now was the perfect time to invite the public to join us in helping take the event to an all time high! 

With $30,000 we will be able to purchase: 

  • 4 portable generators
  • 10 tables
  • 50 chairs
  • 1 trailer
  • 2 Fender sound systems
  • 10 tents
  • Event signage
  • NNM currency
  • Outdoor lounge furniture
  • Flood lighting

 

The Impact

Since December 2018, we have seen over 50 vendors sell their products through our festivals, and thousands of visitors enjoy their time there. When the Bahamian market is flooded with quality, authentic, Bahamian products, you can say that you were apart of making it happen.  Downtown will now also have a safe space for families to enjoy a night out and experience Bahamian culture first-hand. 

Together we can be the change we want to see:

  • More successful Bahamian entrepreneurs
  • More Bahamian representation downtown 
  • A family-friendly nighttime activity 
  • A platform for upcoming artists to gain exposure
  • Quality food and drinks downtown until midnight (and possibly beyond)

 

Like they say, Upward, Onward, Forward, Together!

 

Risks & Challenges

This won't be an easy task! Nothing worthwhile is. There's a possibility that it will take a while for things to really catch on, but word spreads fast in Nassau, and with the right marketing we are sure to draw a crowd. 

For the past 6 months, we've seen that despite having a small marketing budget and not much equipment to work with, the passion and dedication of the vendors and planners has seen many weeks of success and celebration. We are confident that with your support and our exciting re-launch, the Nassau Night Market will sky rocket towards its full potential. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone will be able to contribute financially. But there are more ways you can help: 

  • Share this Indiegogo campaign 
  • Bring your friends and family out to the Nassau Night Market

 

Thank you for joining us :) With your support we will be able to re-launch the Nassau Night Market, stronger and better than ever!
