8.  Now,
what I do know for a fact is that moist air is heavier than dry air, so the air
will actually exit through the screen bottom board of the hive, while new air
enters from the top (yes, we may or should develop some sort of vent…)
9.  Also,
reduced entrances are easier to defend from robbers, intruders and make it
somewhat more difficult for hive beetles to enter.
10.  Most
wild colonies or those found in houses have very tiny entrances.
11.  A
reduced entrance is better for bees because temperature will not change as
fast, which is better for brood.
12.  Bees
tolerate a lot of heat, in fact their preferred temp of 34 Celsius is a hot
temperature, so in general cold is the enemy, not heat.
13.  Hot
air evaporates more water, so temperature regulation gets easier for bees as
air approaches their goal temp.
14.  Warre
hives, Japanese traditional hives and many other have bottom only entrances. 
15.  I’ve
always had bottom only entrances with no problems… but I do use screen bottom
boards…
So yes, I do have screen bottom boards, I do have the same
concern as you but there are many solutions to this problem.  My pledge to
you is that if regardless of this project becoming funded, we will continue
testing to get this concern off our minds.  I include myself again with
you.  I personally tried to include (and perhaps will) more entrances but
at the time we were concerned about pricing, but perhaps we should add more
entrances.  I do agree
So I guess what I’m trying to say is that part of the experience
of crowdfunding is getting valuable feedback such as yours.  Honestly, you
are the first beekeeper other than me, that expresses this concern (others may
have it but not express it)  I will think of a way to include a solution
before the campaign is over.
And as I state in my campaign timeline and budget, there is
still going to be another engineering round before the final product is
launched.  And I assure you we will solve this potential problem…
Thanks again for your interest in Hive Genie



1. So How Powerful does the Hive Genie really is?  There are a lot of claims of what it can do.

To put things in perspective lets compare Hive Genie with some famous computers:
The AGC (Apollo Guidance Computer) which was the computer in the command module of NASA's Apollo missions and helped astronauts to control the module's navigation path to the Moon and back, had 64 Kbytes of memory and operated at a speed of 0.043 MHz.
The Hive Genie has 32 Kbytes of Program memory but operates at 16 MHz.  So this means that the Hive Genie runs 372 times faster than the Apollo Guidance Computer, but has only half the memory for programming.  That's OK though, we are not flying to the moon, we are only relaying information to the cloud and controlling a few add ons!  Plenty of power.  The rest of the program is on the cloud where we can interpret all the data gathered and trigger alarms.  In some ironic twist, our "Mission Control" is on the cloud!  Fascinating times we live in!  

Photos courtesy of NASA, Top: Apollo Mission Take Off.  Bottom, Apollo Guidance Computer that was in the Command Module.





2. Mario I've just read your web page - Quite a
lot of claims but I figure presently you only monitor-
1.  Bees
going in and out - numbers. How does it know internal hive numbers?
2.  Hive
weight with a probe under the Box on one edge?
3.  Ambient
Temp inside and out side the hive - temperature probe
4.  Ambient
Light - light sensor
5.  How
does it tell you what the Queen is laying? Does it come equipped with a camera?
6.  How
does it know about infestations? Is there a way or means of detecting foreign
invaders?
7.  Does
it detect and understand the hive pheromones?
What specifically does it presently actually
measure?
I understand you have used open source and that others can then use your code
to "Add On" functions, apps etc and the possibilities are
"endless"
Is it wireless.
Does it require a phone chip?
How do you access the cloud, does it do Android/ Apple or OS only?
More information would be useful
It has WiFi.  if you
don't have WiFi signal in your hive, you can buy a router in Amazon for $30 USD
that can solve this problem and use the cell phone network to connect to the
cloud.
It is an Arduino based microcontroller.  We have engineered in such a way as to leave
3 to 6 pins for output, that is control things...  I will now answer your questions in order:
1, About counting bees. 
Let's assume that you have 30,000 foragers in your hive (which is
typical average), so in the morning, 30,000 bees will go out, the counter
counts how many bees go out, as they complete their rounds, some will come back
and exit again.  So the number of bees
out will be changing over time, but at the end of the day only three things can
happen:  The number of bees that came
back is less than the ones that left. 
This is the normal thing, you expect to loose around 1000 bees at the
honey flow per day.  Your Queen can lay
more than 1900 eggs a day so you are fine. 
If you loose say 5000 a day, you can safely assume that some pesticide
is killing your bees.  Your Queen won't
be able to keep up you may loose your hive in as little as 5 to 10 days!  And perhaps call it CCD!
The other thing that can happen but would be rare, is that
the exact number of bees that exited came back in.
The third thing would be you get 20,000 bees more into your
hive, therefore africanization.  Now, if
the activity doubles and the weight decreases, then you are being robbed.  If all the bees are going out and no bee is
coming in, then your bees are about to swarm. 
 You have may be a couple of hours
to catch them.  Hive Genie will let you
know within minutes of any of these things happening!
2. Weight is measured by a probe under the front end of the
hive and we just double the weight.  It
is a rough estimate but the trend is what you need.  Over time with your personal feedback you can
figure out a correction factor.
3. Yes temp probe inside and out and the same probe can
measure relative Humidity.
4. Ambient light detector is important so if you have a lot
of nocturnal activity, then moths may be coming in or your bees are under
attack by a skunk or something like it.
5. OK, to determine if the Queen is laying we keep the
count.  Let's say 30,000 bees exited
yesterday and 29,000 came back.  If today
another 30,000 exit, then you can assume that the Queen is laying at least
enough to replace the death toll.  On the
contrary if 29,000 go out today, and tomorrow 28,000 and so on, you may have no
Queen.  Also, when the Queen is laying,
the temperature is pretty stable at around 33-34 ºC and if there is no Queen,
temp inside the hive will vary throughout the day. 
So counting bees bidirectionally actually tells a very good
story of what is going on inside and outside of your hive!
About the camera: 
SORRY it does not for two reasons:
A. The image signal takes a lot of space in the controller
so we wouldn't be able to count or weigh bees, which in my mind are the two
most important pieces of information.  A
camera only tells you what is going on in the parts you can see, as weight and
count tell you the whole story, even about foraging dangers.  Also, the camera can only tell what you
personally see, as where with numbers you the software can trigger alarms 24/7
B. A camera and servos to move it would cost as much as a
GoPro, in which case you just go and buy a GoPro or a surveillance system.
I am not saying that a camera is not a good idea, but for
now it is not a priority.  Maybe if lots
of beeks ask we can develop something in the near future.
6. I think this is explained above.  The fact that all the alarms are on the cloud
means that as we gather more info we can fine tune and correlate more things...
7. Currently it does not have a nose; maybe in the future we
can find a sensor that detects this! 
Exciting isn't it?
Actually with our prototypes we can measure:
Bees bidirectionally
Temp and humidity
Weight
Light intensity
So we tested all this and we are refining the alarm system
triggers as we learn more.  Since our
alarm system will be on the cloud, we can constantly fine tune it and develop
new alarms when enough data reveals more correlations to other events.
Hope this info is useful, will be glad to answer more
questions...

story:
My name is Michal and I own a small computer store, which was founded by my father in 1993. Besides selling IT, I also deal with servicing and managing computer networks. The store is located in Turnov in the Czech Republic (Central Europe). It is a small historic town with 14 thousand inhabitants. In our store we have always strived for a human and friendly approach when dealing with our customers. For us, a customer is not just a person who brings us money, and we do not make him/her buy the most expensive goods either. We place emphasis on a friendly approach, trying to give our customers good advice and honest recommendations. We always provide them with individual advice, respect their wishes, recommend several options with the best price-performance ratio; we also take into account their financial possibilities and, if possible, look for cheaper solutions. Time dedicated to our customer is always very important to us.

Unfortunately, this approach is nowadays unable to compete with low sales prices that are consistently offered by large e-shops and chain stores or their massive advertising. I would be very grateful if I could, with the help of your contributions, modernise my existing business so that it is competitive, but still does not lose the human-cantered approach to the customer. I wish to create a store where our customers can do their shopping without being rushed and where everything can be tried first in order to ensure maximum customer satisfaction. A store where everyone can seek advice and help for their serious but also smaller problems which they have not encountered yet. People are often ashamed to visit a large service that might be too busy to deal with such a problem (because it is unprofitable for the service) or would charge excessive money. My store would also provide the public with the opportunity to learn basic computer literacy (e.g. individual training for parents, consultancy for children and students - help with homework they struggle to handle, training for seniors who would like to learn to use a computer or the Internet in order not to feel excluded in the world of modern technologies - why not be in touch with other seniors, read interesting posts or watch TV over the Internet).

I would like to offer our customers not only a good range of goods but also extra services, which cannot be found at one point anywhere else.


Vision of our above standard services:

- Possibility to thoroughly and with no time limit test the goods offered at the store. (Are you looking for a new laptop? We can help you select a specific model according to your requirements. If you are interested, take it to a quieter part of the store with comfortable seating, try to use it, test its writing function, check how it handles the speed and graphics of your favourite game, which might be the reason why you are getting it, etc.)

- Problem solving consultancy. (Are you struggling to run your e-mail client? Bring your laptop to our store and your problem will be quickly resolved over a cup of coffee with the help of our technician)

- Service and challenging repairs when the preliminary price is always consulted in advance and, if necessary, a cheaper solution is sought

- Home service and consulting services directly at the customer’s residence (for customers for whom standard opening hours are inconvenient, for those who are unwilling or unable to get to our store, for seniors, mothers on maternity leave, etc.)

- Possibility to connect directly to a customer’s computer and solve the problem almost instantly via remote support

- Individual training of computer literacy

- Several computers and tablets, which can be used by our customers for free!

- Relaxation area with a coffee vending machine, a seating area and free WiFi

- Workshops for schools (the risks of social networking, risky online behaviour, etc.)


What will the money be used for:

- Moving store to larger premises

- Local advertising in the city (spot on a radio, billboards)

- Strengthening the existing staff from 1 (me) to 3-4 employees

- Expansion of our product assortment

- Acquisition of new store equipment

- New website including e-shop with a collection pointin the store


I will very much appreciate it if you decide to help realise my dream. You will not only help save the family business and promote the tradition, but also give the thumbs-up to the personal approach in business. Thank you.


Other Ways You Can Help

Just spread the word! Send the indiegogo link to anyone you can. I appreciate your help. Thanks for even taking the time to look over my project!

story:
Thank You For Visiting TheLRoomBNB's Indiegogo Campaign

TheLRoomBNB is "NOT FINISHED"

With Your Contributions we can transform TheLRoomBNB 1920's home into a modern place of relaxation for women (as the above bedroom).

There were many problems with the Indiegogo payment system during our campaign such as if your browser was not 8 or higher it would not take the payment.

Please go to  www.TheLRoomBNB.com website secure PayPal to donate the Perks still apply.  Thank you 

Please Donate Today To Help Complete
This Wonderful Place for Women

(The "L" Stands for Ladies)

Current Condition of 2nd floor Bedrooms

 

Condition of front of house before repairing front steps, replacing rotten wood porch, installing railing and landscaping

Your Pledge will help us finish the beautification of every room in TheLRoomBNB House (see bottom of page for projected beautification photos)

  •  House Renovations

    Construction Materials:  Wood, Paint, Flooring, Plumbing, Interior Doors, Storm Doors, New Windows, Fireplace
    Landscaping :     Plants, Flower Beds, Gravel
    Quality Furniture and Accessories: Carpeting, Lighting, Lamps, Beds, Tables, Chairs, Cabinets, Sofas, Out Door Furniture
    Major Appliances: Industrial Dish Washer, Washer, Dryer
    Pay Licensed: Carpenters, Electricians, Plumbers
    Buy General House Needs: Linens, Towels, Bath, Kitchen, Cleaning and Maintenance Supplies

What's TheLRoom and a "Mini Break"?

TheLRoomBNB (the "L" stands for Ladies)
is a new, wonderful welcoming woman's space to relax and de-stress

"Mini Breaks" are an EXPERIENCE that every women should have.

Women need regular "Mini Breaks" to relieve the pressure of always having to push thru at work or home in the interest of success and pleasing others. 
This pushing thru behavior is the cause of an increase in woman's illnesses such as sleep and eating disorders, strokes, heart attacks, depression, and misplaced negative aggression towards co-workers and loved ones.
 

TheLRoomBNB is being designed as a 21st Century new paradigm in the Bed & Breakfast Industry. A group of visionary inter-generational, ethnic, and gender diverse women are spearheading this project with E. Clement Swan, Founder. They realized that women needed occasional relaxing "Mini Breaks".
These "Mini Breaks" have positive long lasting health and socialization benefits for women, their families and people they interact with.

WHY DO WOMEN NEED TheLROOMBNB...
Plus MINI BREAKS?

  Because it's a matter of life and death......


Nearly 50 percent of American women feel they don't have enough free time.

*Stress

*Diabetes - Heart Attacks - Strokes

Women with diabetes have a shorter life expectancy than women without diabets.

Women account for just over half of the total heart disease deaths in the United States each year.

Approximately 55,000 more women than men have a stroke each year.

*Depression 

Women experience twice the rate of depression as men, regardless of race or ethnic background.

THE GOOD NEWS IS...
With Your Donation Today to this campaign...
Women will have TheLRoomBNB
to De-stress, Relax and Engage with their peers. 

Long range plans are to open LRooms in every major city.



Although TheLRoom is for ladies, we value the men who care about their wives, girlfriends, mothers, sisters, and all women.

We are thankful that Men have also generously donated along with women.


OUR LOCATION IS AMAZING!

The first LRoomBNB is in trendy, "Old North" Durham, NC

This 1920‘s home is located in a flourishing area within walking distance to Downtown Durham, shops, restaurants, cafe's, food trucks, bars, Durham Performing Arts Center (DPAC), Carolina Theater, the Central Park Farmers Market, Durham Bulls Stadium, Duke and North Carolina Central Universities. 
Minutes’ drive  from RDU Airport.  Amtrak, Greyhound and Mega Bus Stations are conveniently located in the heart of Downtown.

Current LRoom home needing renovations

New York Times feature article
"Corner Of Durham, NC Comes To Life". 

Over the past months, the loudest bangs have been heard in the Central Park District near the corner of Rigsbee Avenue and West Geer Street" 
Yes, TheLRoomBNB is literally down the block from The New York Times all aforementioned places; location... location... location. 

Please "Donate Today" and Help Spread The Word!


What a selection of wonderful unique rewards, some are pictured below

Something for everyone.

Many of rewards are designed and/or produced locally.

Ladies Style Lavender T Shirt ~ Do Not Disturb I'm Taking A "Mini Break" and
Do Not Disturb Door Hanger - Funder Perks

T Shirts "Every Woman Deserves A Mini Break" Lavender Ladies style and

I Support Women's "Mini Breaks" full sized Small to 4XL basic white T shirt great for men & women - Funder Perks
Why not get one of each shirt to show your full support for "Mini Breaks" or give as gifts.


Funder Reward

Girl's Night Out... relax with friends, food, fun and Exhale


Funder Reward

In Loving Dedication Plaque Name Plate - Add her name -
Honoring A Woman (Past Or Present) Who Has Touched Your Life
In A Wonderful Way.  The plaque will be hung in TheLRoomBNB.


Funder Perk for you or give as a gift.

Relaxing Massage and "Mini Break"

We will also contract services to further enhance your stay: Massage  ~  Healthy Diet Coaching  ~  Meditation  ~  Yoga ~ Acupuncture ~ Reiki  ~  Mindfulness Training ~ Manicure/Pedicure and Personal Chef Services.


TheLRoomBNB Head Chef  is Janice Escott, Host of Radio Show "Say Yes To The Chef"; Former Owner of a B&B in California; Le Cordon Bleu, London, Certificate Holder and Retired Lead Chef at Southern Season in NC. 
She'll prepare wonderful made from scratch, fresh ingredient dishes and desserts. 


Funder Reward Sunday Brunch For 2

Enjoy Orchid Sunday Brunch at TheLRoom with Friends

More About TheLRoom:

  • A place to get away from job and household stress;

  • Rental Space available to host Meet-ups, private business meetings, girl's night out, receptions, baby-bridal showers, parties, seminars, lectures etc.

  • A Safe place for to relax and enjoy friends

  • A place to study or work on that project, book manuscript, or just nap; 
  • A place with women centered events, that is comfortable and affordable; 
  • A clean comfortable environment without you doing the cleaning;
  • Great conversation or solitude in nature or; relax with a good book,
    DVD or CD from our library; 
  • A unique gift shop with women centered Hand Crafted art, greeting cards, jewelry, clothing and novelties, many one of a kind items

TheLRoomBNB's greatest impact to the local and global community is a
Happier, Healthier Woman... which is tied to the very old saying...

"If Mama's happy everybody is happy"!

On a more serious note, TheLRoomBNB is and will continue to utilize many local workers, services, resources and products especially those offered by women.  Buying and using local services will absolutely boast Durham's and the Triangles economy.

TheLRoomBNB employees will be paid Livable Wages

Ms. Swan is a member of the Durham Living Wage Project certification committee.  Livable wages is one of the single most important issues today for the well-being of American families especially women head of household homes.


Risks and challenges:

We had pre-fundraising events which gave us the funds to take possession of TheLRoom home to get a closer look into the "bones" of the house. By doing this and having a soft opening we've been able to pinpoint some further interior and exterior fixes that have been included in our list. 
Over the past few years we have developed business relationships with licensed professionals who can immediately address our needs.

The Durham business community is very helpful.

Like and Share us on Facebook

https://www.facebook.com/thelroombnb?ref=hl

Email... Tweet... Text... Instagram it to ALL your contacts and tell EVERYONE you know! 

Women and supportive men WE can make this happen and soon have LRoom's for women in every city 

Projected Front Porch Design After Funding


Thank You So Much...Yours in Peace, Health and Prosperity,

E. Clement Swan, Founder


Projected Design of Purple Bedroom when LRoom house is completed with your funding

     without you doing the cleaning; 
Great conversation or
     solitude in nature or; relax with a good book, DVD or CD
     from our library; 

A unique gift shop with women centered Hand Crafted art, greeting cards, jewelry, clothing and novelties, many one of a kind items




TheLRoomBNB's
greatest impact to the local and global community is a
Happier, Healthier Woman... which is tied to the very old saying...
"If
Mama's happy everybody is happy"!
On
a more serious note, TheLRoomBNB is and will continue to utilize many local
workers, services, resources and products especially those offered by
women.  Buying and using local services will absolutely boast Durham's and
the Triangles economy. 
TheLRoomBNB
employees will be paid Livable Wages
Ms. Swan is a member of the Durham Living Wage Project certification
committee.  Livable wages is one of the single most important issues today
for the well-being of American families especially women head of household homes.

 



Risks and challenges:
We
had pre-fundraising events which gave us the funds to take possession of
TheLRoom home to get a closer look into the "bones" of the house. By
doing this and having a soft opening we've been able to pinpoint some further
interior and exterior fixes that have been included in our list.  Over the past few years we have developed business relationships with licensed professionals who can immediately address our needs.
The Durham business community is very helpful.


Like and Share us on Facebook 

https://www.facebook.com/thelroombnb?ref=hl

Email... Tweet... Text... Instagram it to ALL your contacts and tell EVERYONE you know! 

Women and supportive men WE can make this happen and soon have LRoom's for women in every city 





Projected Front Porch Design After Funding

Thank You So Much...Yours in Peace, Health and Prosperity,E. Clement Swan, Founder

Projected Design of Purple Bedroom when LRoom house is completed with your funding

story:
McClary Bros.

McClary Bros. manufactures Drinking Vinegars, a Colonial-era cocktail and soda mixer. We have the perfect mixer for craft cocktail enthusiasts and individuals looking for a natural alternative to traditional soda

AND 5% of all the funds we raise goes to Forgotten Harvest, one of the largest food rescues in the country, to relief hunger in metro Detroit!

And we're growing like crazy...

 Our business has been experiencing massive growth very quickly! Currently, our vinegars are made at Hopeful Harvest, a subsidiary of Forgotten Harvest- one of the nation's largest food rescues. But our office/order fulfillment/testing kitchen happens in the space they can spare and we fit in where we can. We need to move into our own space and develop ways to be more efficient in how we operate. That's what we love your help with...

What We Need:

So we need some extra help to get all these piece in place, we have some of the funds, but here's what we need help with:

  • $20,000 of what we raise will go toward the purchase/improvements of the building
  • $20,000 is for kitchen equipment & upgrades
  • $10,000 is for shipping and office equipment

What you get for helping us:

We are really excited about these perks, not just your average t-shirt or bumper sticker...

  • $5: Name a Cocktail (or soda). Drink names are hard, but you can help! Our brand ambassador creates craft cocktail recipes and craft soda recipes for different restaurants, bars and for our marketing materials. With just a $5 contribution to our effort: you submit a name for a cocktail, he'll develop a recipe with that name, we'll tell you where/how the cocktail recipe gets used!
  • $25: You will be the coolest cat in the kitty litter with our McClary Bros. 8oz stainless steel flask. 
  • $40: Ready to make a cocktail? Then our McClary Bros. cocktail shaker is exactly what you need!
  • $75: A pair of gorgeous McClary Bros. copper mule mugs (stainless steel lined, of course because vinegar & copper don't get along)
  • $125:A home bar set of all three- the flask, the shaker and the mule mugs
  • $125: The Taster's Club. Periodically throughout the year, we will send you samples of new micro test batch flavors. You vote on your favorite and the winning flavor gets made!
  • $175: Two tickets to the 1st Annual McClary Bros. Harvest Party! (Oct 2016) The party will feature area bartenders competing in a "Shrub Off!" cocktail competition and we'll be announcing new flavor releases for the holiday season. This is the event of the year, you do not want to miss it!
  • $300: Behind the scenes tour of McClary Bros.! At this level you'll get a private tour for two with our production manager, you'll get to see where our vinegars are made, taste flavors in production and take some vinegars home with you!
  • $300: Two tickets to a pairing dinner. McClary Bros. participates in a variety of pairing dinners with local restaurants and local distilleries in several cities. With this level you'll get two tickets to the dinner of your choosing (we'll announce them as they're scheduled)
  • $500: Design your own flavor! You get to work with our R&D team to develop a flavor of your choosing. You get to name it yourself and we'll create a microbatch release of your flavor that will be available for sale on our website. But for all your hard work, you'll get a case to keep for yourself (this can be done in person, but doesn't have to be- if you aren't in Michigan no worries, we can still work with you to develop your flavor)
  • $1000: Brand Consulting with our CEO, Jess Sanchez McClary. We are VERY proud of our branding, packaging, logo, etc. and at this level, you will have a meeting (and lunch if you're local) with our CEO to get some help on your own branding. This includes 3 phone calls and an in-person (or video chat) meeting.
  • $2500: At this level, our CEO, Jess Sanchez McClary, will speak at your event. Entrepreneurism, Branding, Local Food, Bootstrapping 101, she can speak to it all and can bring some energy and insight to your corporate event.
  • $5000: Ever wonder what it's like to be part of our team? At this level you can find out! You and a friend will join us for a tasting room event at Tales of the Cocktail 2016 in New Orleans. You'll work behind the scenes at this "trade show of sorts", we'll put you up in a hotel for the 3 days of the event and you'll get to hang out with us and ask all of your most burning questions. Oh, and we'll be drinking a lot of shrub cocktails. 

Helping feed Detroit

And we have to make our goal or we get nothing! We decided to use a campaign that requires us to meet our goal AND we decided to do this not only to save 5% in fees, but so we could give that 5% directly to Forgotten Harvest, one of the country's largest food rescues. For every dollar donated Forgotten Harvest is able to make 5 meals to help relieve hunger in metro Detroit which means by reaching our goal, you're helping create over $12,000 meals!

Next steps

So let people know about us, keep enjoying our delicious Drinking Vinegars and stay in touch with us on instagram/twitter/facebook @mcclarybros and remember #BrosBeforeThose

story:
Short Summary

Nubub is a new social platform that allows you to control who you share with and what you share. You can create an inner bubble which is perfect for a child, then choose who is allowed in and what they can do within. Nubub is a network that will give you the control and security you deserve. You have the power to decide who sees your sentimental moments. We are a site that gives you an area to use without constant app invitations and irrelevant posts.Not only will you have an area to connect and share but you can form a bubble for each child in your life and no one will see or be able to search for them unless they are invited in, then they will have the chance to share and follow those special moments and be able to leave messages and notes that will stay in a timeline with pictures and videos. Use Nubub as a time capsule, so in years to come you will be able to look back at all those amazing moments and see when each event occurred and who you shared them with.

People deserve the safety and security that Nubub brings to online social media.

Everything about the current business is built including registered company, legal, banking, Trademark and accounting. We have had the front end of the website built and only require the software to be completed to go live. 

 

The Impact

Online social media is the current and future of peoples lifes, and people deserve security and safety in this current day. All other social media are about sharing information; and this information goes viral. Nubub lets you share information with who "you choose" No one can search for you or find you without being "invited in". Our market research has proved that the potential for this new social media is extensive.

Do you really know who is able to view pictures or status updates involving young children on current social media?

With Nubub people will have that comfort and control when sharing pictures or status updates, as they have the power to only select who they wish to involve in their online area. 

What We Need & What You Get

We require your help to raise £40,000 which will be used to complete the software build so we can release our site for you all to use for free.  As a thank you for your contribution you get to choose from one of our special unique perks.

Other Ways You Can Help

We would be grateful if you could share this indiegogo page to as many people as possible to help increase our chances of reaching our target.

Other ways to spread the word about Nubub and our concept;

Follow us on Twitter @Nububofficial

Like our Facebook page  www.facebook.com/nububofficial

If you have a question about Nubub, feel free to contact either;

james.bryden@nubub.com jeremy.williamson@nubub.com

story:
Tending an indoor cultivation means to take care of a lot of things in order for your plants to grow strong and healthy. Keeping the optimal development conditions can be time-consuming and demanding for you, especially when you can’t be around your cabinet all day long.

          We present you Growmotics, a control system that helps you achieve maximum performance by keeping the perfect conditions for you. Growmotics adapts to the necessities of your plants and optimizes the use of the electrical elements of your cabinet.

          With Growmotics now you can be in full control of your grow box from anywhere, whenever you want. Simply place the Growmotics sensor inside the cabinet and plug your gear into the Growmotics device to take your crops to the next level.

          Growmotics allows you to remotely monitor and control everything that happens in your cabinet. With the free app you can track temperature and humidity values acquired by the sensor in real time. Growmotics will keep these values in the optimal range for your plants according to their cultivation stage and inform you if any additional care is advisable.

          Growmotics is simple. Here is how it works: Place it next to your cabinet, plug the USB sensor, put it inside and plug your gear into the device. That’s it. Growmotics will manage the electrical elements to keep the environment in perfect conditions according to the selected growth plan.

          The Growmotics app allows you to schedule a custom plan if you feel up to it and will inform you in case anything noteworthy happens in your cabinet. Growmotics watches over your crops!. You can even watch your plants in real time from anywhere with an IP cam. And don’t worry about privacy. Every single byte transferred and stored is heavily encrypted for your safety. Growmotics will also guide you suggesting additional cares and products to make the best out of your crop and remind you of necessary tasks.

Meet the Growmotics device:

          The Growpedia is a complete encyclopedia compiled by a team of experts in the field of indoor growing. It comprises all the information you need for your plants to grow strong and healthy.

          We want to help you improve your indoor crops and get the best out of your growing box. That’s why we want to share with you the knowledge compiled in the Growpedia for free. Guides about growing different species, advices to keep your plants healthy and answers to troubleshoot any issues can be yours for free.

          All we ask in return is that you help us spread the word about Growmotics. Share the Growmotics Indiegogo page in twitter (don’t forget the hashtag #growmotics), facebook, tumblr, blogs, webpages or any other platform. Just send us a link or a screenshot when you share it to sharegrowmotics@growmotics.com and we will send you the Growpedia in .pdf format to your email when the project ends.

          The idea behind Growmotics started with a plain and simple necessity. Why do people who love indoor growing have to spend a lot of time and effort attending their plants? Taking proper care of a grow cabinet takes a lot of time, and that can sometimes interfere with our social lives, make a dent in our free time or occupy our minds when we are busy. 

          Problems like keeping track of a cultivation schedule or even having to stand up and go physically to the cabinet to activate a device or just to check the temperature when you are warm and cozy stroke us as an unnecessary burden. Having a strong background in domotics and after developing several projects involving Raspberry Pi, we immediately started to devise a solution to all these problems.

          In the beginning it was just a small project about tracking temperature and humidity values remotely, but we realized that we could add features like control of the cabinet gear, automated schedules or the growpedia and offer a complete growing experience to the world.

          Soon we started to design a prototype to test the system, prepare the communications protocol and the server, develop the app and the web space and that way Growmotics started to become a reality. Now you are part of the next step, where we want to bring Growmotics to each grower in the world to improve the performance of their crops.

          Our plan is to use the funding to take the next steps required to turn the Growmotics project into a reality. Some of these objectives are the following:

  • Contact suppliers and acquire the materials (electronics, plastic injection moldings) necessary to assemble Growmotics on a large scale.
  • Ensure Growmotics is compliant with quality standards such as RoHS or the CE marking certificates.
  • Contacting experts to compile the most exhaustive Growpedia possible.
  • Reinforce server and web security.


Risk And Challenges 


          We are positive about the plans for the future and the timeline we established. However it would be oblivious to ignore some factors that could influence the final outcome of our product.

          Our policy is to work only with good and trustworthy suppliers to provide us everything we need to build Growmotics. However we are dependent to a certain point on that suppliers and any delay in our supply chain could make some effect on the production timeline.

          Delays could also happen due to estimated delivery times. We will try our best to bring you Growmotics as soon as possible, but keep in mind that delivery times are just an estimation. So please be patient if you are expecting Growmotics and it takes a few days extra for you to receive it.

          Finally we want you to understand that our goal is to bring you the best product possible. That means an exhaustive control and testing stage. If we find some detail that needs to be polished and we have to push back the release date a little, our policy is to do whatever it takes for you and your plants to enjoy the best Growmotics possible.

          We’ll keep you informed through updates and if any issue arises you’ll be the first to know.

story:
Dear Sir / Madam,

Our foundation’s aim is to help life quality in disadvantaged countries.

This is primarily directed to reduce the shortage of food and medicine in these places.

We believe it is important that children living there, receive adequate education, even outside their home country.

Usually the country is not capable providing the study fees, but we strongly believe, that among these children there are several outstanding talents, and willingness to show it. We are to help them with this.
There are also cases, when life-saving surgery needed but patients have no money to afford, and they turn to foundations. We would like to give support in these situations also.

 It is important to collect donations, because 1-1 dollars merely does not reach the targeted children, only if it specifically collected and distributed responsibly, taking every circumstances into account.

It is important to keep money in reserve, in order to unexpected disaster situations we could act promptly and effectively. When tragedy happens in the world everyone is trying to help in general.

But why should we wait for this?

If the necessary money is available, we can put life saving and disaster mitigation to the first place, instead of trying to collect money and donations in the critical days.


Please help the needy, small amounts are also counts.

Thank you!

Word Fountation Team

Yours Sincerely

story:
More car for sick children can help them go to hospital or nearby ambulance and save their lives in rural India

Do you know about 5000 children below the age of 5 children die in India every day? About 30 per cent of these deaths are caused by pneumonia and diarrhea alone.

Lack of timely access to transport in rural areas, often during the night, deter the parents from taking their sick children to the hospital.

In India, state of Bihar ranks fifth highest in terms of death of children below five years of age. The phenomenon is known as Under-5 Mortality Rate (U5MR). As many as 70 children per 1000 live births die every year in the state.

Rural Bihar contributes majority of the under 5 deaths due to pneumonia and diarrhea. Parents of children affected with pneumonia and diarrhea find it difficult in getting state-run ambulance. Sometimes, getting cars for hire is also challenging.

Surveys show parents wait for 6 - 8 hours during the night when most children get exhausted after fighting with pneumonia and diarrhea. Parents start to go to hospital in late morning.

Government health departments may not be able to add more ambulances due to limited budgetary allocation for the health sector in near to medium term. Besides, addition of more ambulances stationed at a distance of 25 to 50 km away may not be cost-effective as well.

See the recent news (below) of how ineffective ambulance service has affected health delivery.

iCARE

  • iCARE adds about 300 cars to the existing fleet of 1-2 government ambulances serving about 120,000 people in rural and remote India.
  • There are about 3 to 5 cars available with families in every village.
  • iCARE enables our children reach hospitals and receive lifesaving care, without having to waste their precious seconds waiting for cars.  
  • iCARE will be able to pick up the patients within 10 to 20 minutes, a significant improvement over 40 – 60 minutes wait for ambulances.

How iCARE works

 

Scale and impact

Your help will help us achieve

  • Every dollar you invest in iCARE will help improving the chances of saving the lives of the children.
  • Your support will help us demonstrate to the Ministry of Health, other ambulance providers, Donors, and NGOs how iCARE model can help overcome limited pool of ambulances.

Progress so far

  • We have done a survey among the car owners in the villages to gauge their interest in helping their neighbors in medical emergencies. We found awesome response! More than 90 per cent people were interested to support iCARE.
  • SocialWell is currently implementing a web and mobile application Bihar Child Health Tracker (BCHT) in the project area. BCHT has registered all providers, under 5 children suffering from pneumonia and diarrhea, and their referrals to the district hospitals.
  • We have formed partnerships with leading health NGOs to include the iCARE component in the ongoing projects targeted towards maternal and child health.

Key Aspects of iCARE

  • The iCARE model demonstrates a cost-effective model of improving reach and coverage of cars in emergency medical transport in rural and remote areas.
  • iCARE model can be integrated with existing state-run ambulance system.
  • When ambulance remains pre-occupied, local cars can be dispatched.

About iCARE Team

  • SocialWell is an Indian social enterprise founded in 2016. SocialWell is located in Bhubaneswar, India.
  • iCARE was conceptualized around 2013 and we took field surveys, feedbacks from potential users, car providers, health workers, and experts on the effectiveness and feasibility of the idea.
  • After 3 years of extensive background work, we have assembled an awesome and passionate team to give iCARE a shape and take it way beyond this pilot.

Reporting to donors

  • MIS data on requests for car received and car dispatch
  • MIS data on children served through iCARE
  • Project review meetings

Recent news

  1. Dumka baby pays with life for ambulance apathy

  2. Tall claims fall flat, baby born on roadside
